column3: Me wanje kekanemunk Kitche Manito uhsâgeinunk , ōnje uhgebuhgitenunk obemátizzewin keenowint ōnje ; giya keenowint ketá buhgitenámin kebemátizzewininánin kekânissenánig ōnje .

Bwaw kubbekosa wekoondewinink , ope Jesus kakandunk otepiegun ochichesanik , che máját , che nuhguttunk áke , che ezhát ōsemán ōnje tebinowa otánishanâbamun oge ságeán ; oge sâgeán nánázh che waquâsag .
Owwanan Kitche Manito gá nishkâtizzetowáwâjin nemetunnuh tusso kekenonowin ? kânuh uhgew áwissewug mutcheizzhewabizzewin gá gegishkungig , uhgew oweowwewân buhgwuttuhkumigáng gá buhpongesininne ?
Quiuk azhewabizzidjig uhbenocheug izzhewabizzig , kago izzhewabizze kago azhewabizzeyagobun magwouh uhnōch uzzhizzhewabizzeyag , magwouh uhkekanduhzewag kago :
Kitche Manito omowōndonán menik tiabwatunzinit , kokkinná keche sháwanemát .

Nenōndowâ nowwiuhe newewât áwase uhmutwa ekettōt , ningo tebiegun puhquazhegun mámashqut bazhek shománeka , nisso tebiegundush squazhishshug , bazhek shománeka ; ângwâmizzin , kago banájetokan pemeta giya shomenâbo .
Tuhbussebuhgitinumōk keowwewán anosumeet Kitche Manito , weendush keguh ōmbinik .
Onje oge onuhgindán ogezhiguttinik che tebákonunk áke , Quiuk 'ow Aninne ōnje , uhnew gá onábomajin kokkinná aninnewun wawane gekekandumonán uhge ábejebát ánuh genebonit .
Shemágunishugdush menasagâwunzhe owawoqun otozhetōnâwâ uhbezikkōnáwân ōshtegwâninik , miskobeenzikowâgundush obeenzikonáwân .
Neendenanemág eu ōnje waskenegidjig equawug keche onâbamewât , che netáwigeáwâtuhbenocheun , che kunwandumowât wegewam , keche menásigwâ miátáwizzininit ningōtono keche mutche gegetonit .
Tabwa-andumōk ōsemá , weowwink neendiá uhgamá tabwa-anemisshig uhnokewinun ōnje .
Nebowin giya mutcheishkota ishkota kitchegumeeng oppuhgitchegâta . Me o-o aneka nebowin .
Kishpin e-e getotungebun , táge kuhgwâtuhgito , aquo ákewung , ge takoshin besáságewichegat weow uhwabenunk mutche izzhewabizzewinun .
Nemetunnuh tusso kekenonowin , ogunnowâbomán ga izzhewabizzinit buhgwuttuhkumigáng .
Me eu ōnje nekânissetōk , miáwunjeitteyungoon che weessinneyung bábeittetá .

Neendená ope biákinunk ako ningōtwâchink ubgokewusegun binnádush áke kitche nuhningishkâ ; gezisdush kitche muhkuttawizze tebishko muhkuttawaginōnk obewiyum gá ōnje ozhichegâta , tibbeke gezisdush misqueeng ge ezhenágooze ;
Equawug onebomewân nayáb menáwug , uhbemátizzinit ánintdush buhshunzháogowizzewig kuhgwâtuhgeáwug , kâ enandubzewug che we bemátizzewât owushema omeenwandánâwâ puhkân ábejebáwin :

Pauldush otinnân , neengebuhbuhkittaogonánig apiche mizzhishuh , mámázh Neromanewemin , beenjwabinnegonánigdush kepáquotewegumigōnk , nōngumdush newesâgizzegonánig mámázh ? kagat , kâween ; tebinowago tuh be-ezháwug che sâgizzeumintwâ .

Onje o-o , kago bisshegwâtizze kago , kago nisshewa kago , kago kemote kago , kago guhnowishke kago , kago we otâpenumowâ kago kewejetuhkewamágun otieem ; kishpin giya minowâ anduhgogwan guhgequawin , mego o-o mámowy , sâgeikōg kewejetuhkewamágunewâg azhe ságeittizzoeyag .
Kokkinná aninnewug o-o anandumowin ga gishkungig ebenitōnâwân weowwewân Kitche Manitōn azhe bènizzit .
Neendaink nemeenwandum Kitche Manito otepákonegawin .
Mojegandumōk Kitche Manito ōnje , gâgineek , minowâ giya ketinnenim , mojegandumōk .
Neengegwaketádush owwewâbundumán e-e ganonigoeyán . Ope gá gwaketáeyán , neezhwâswa ozâwâ shoneá wâsâkoninjegunâtigōn neengewâbundánun ;
Owwanan uhnew gá mushkâwittowâwâjin odikitowin , che peendegasigwâ otunwashemonowinink , kânuh ween uhgew tiabwatunzigwug ?
Kokkinná gá benegánetumowwidjig gamotishkewug giya nisshewashkewug ; manishtânishundush kâ onōndágoosewân .
Bemetágunetōk , tuhbussebuhgitinumowikōg ketogemámewâg keowwewân , kokkinná kotájewinink kâween atuhgo mennoizzhewabizzewât bakátizzewât kishpin giya miázheninnewugizzewât .
Otozhetōnâwâ wâezhekuhgenowiskewât owwe bátámáwât , ekettowug mozhug wuhow aninne mutche eketto , etunk o-o uhnumeawegumik giya tebákonegawin .
Kokkinná iuheen Kitche Manito tebandánun , ween gá totonunk che mennoinnowamunk Jesus Christ ōnje , ween gá meninunk , uhnokewin mennoinnowandewin .
Nekânissetōk , kekinowâbomikōg mamándáwizzidjig gá gegetojig Kitche Manito onozowinink ga izzhewabizzeyag che beoyag che kuhgwâtuhgitoyag .
Guhtuh izzhewabutdush , owwagwan ga ezhe nuhnândumōgwan Kitche Manito otuhnozowinink , tuh bemátizze .
Ekettōnk , Amen : tuhsháwandágooze , tuh kitchetwâwizze , tuh nebwâkâ megwache-enint , tuh mennoizzhewabizze , tuh mushkâwizze , Neenkitche Manitomenán gâgineek . Amen .
Osuhsagâwinewân kago tuh izzhewabusinōn , áqutcheiuhe weowwewáng uhpuhpezekuhumowát wenisisewân , ozáwâ shoneá uhmuhtindumowát , uhbezekoniawât .

Kago águtchekan Kitche Manito odikitowinink , kago águtanemisshekan Kitche Manito otowwâkânun aweyán , ánint otâpenun kotuhgitowin Kitche Manito omeenwâjemowinink , Kitche Manito omushkâwizzewin ōnje .
Weenowâ ōnje menno izzhewabizzeán neow , giya weenowâ che mennoizzhewabizzewât tabwawin ōnje .
Uhkowâbig , mushkâwetōn iuheen ashkoonegâtagin , wiashowwissingin che nebomuhguk : kâween nemikkunzenun ketuhnokewinun quiuk che izzhewabuk anosumeet Kitche Manito .
Akonisewâtdush mezhinowa osegwabenán otomotansim sebeeng , giya mokidjewun nebegōn , kokkinná misqueeng ezhenágwutōn .
Ween ōnje , me wanje kushketoeyáng uhbeotittumáng o-o quiuk izzhewabizzewin wanje nebowweyáng nemojegandámin Kitche Manito okitchetwâwizzewinink .
Kekekandánâwâ o-o , kâ oweuh bashegwâtizzit , kâ giya keuh wânizzit , kâ giya oweuh suhságizzit aninne wuhow uhnōch azhetwât , e-e anduhgosinōk Kitche Manito giya Jesus rist otogemáwewinink .
Mushkâwandumowin ōnje , Abraham ope nandomint keche ezhát otuhnuhkewinink eu ga menint che tebandunk , tabwatum májádush , kâwdush okekanduhzeen tibbe ga ezhágwan .
Kago kewushquabe kago shomenâbo ōnje , mutcheizzhewabut o-o ; mooshkenag koshuh Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun ;
Nebewá oguh ezhe nopenutánâwá ga ezhe bátázewât ; uhgew ōnje ga ezhe tabwawinewung , gutuh mutchetuzzhinjegâta .
Ween ōnje niyazh keenowint tuhgomuhgut ga ōnje otissinunk ōsemá bazhek Ochichâgwun ōnje .

Uhtuzzhemintwá miátáwizzidjig tiabwatungig , neenge enandámen neenge ozhebeámen kiut , kâween otá kunwanduhzeenâwâ eu enákonegawin , meatuh che metágwietumowât muzzenitchegunun siáságewenintwâ , misque giya ga buhnábáwat , giya bisshegwâtizzewin .
Peterdush eketto , Ananias , wagonan wanje ezhetahayun uhgenowishkemut Kitche Manito ochichâgwun , uhzhishkoonumun ánint o-o gá innuhgindag âke ?
Eu keche ōnje uhbenoche-ewissewunk iázhuh che ezhe uzzhawabinegōsewunk , che bábámewinegosewung uhnōch guhgequawinun aninne oguhgianizzewin ōnje , uhgácheshinowât we wiazheinungwâ ;

Kânuh kekekanduhzeenâwâ mache izzhewabizzidjig che peendegasigwâ , Kitche Manito otogemáwewinink ? Kago wuhnisshin kago ; kâ bashegwâtizzidjig , giya uhnōch kago manitokajig , ka giyâ wiyayaquawidjig ,
Umbasino kago bonetosetá onuhquashkotátink , ánint anishanábag aeendotumowât ; umbasino guhguhgâzōndetá , owushemadush minowâ wiábundumingin takoshinomuhgut gezbigut .
Eu ōnje banájetōg kebuhkazewinewân , uhnew ákeeng ayágin ; bisshegwâtizzewin , wenizzewin , mutche enandumowin , sáságizzewin , me eu sáságewinint muzzineneen .
Máno keenowint , gezhigutōnk ayáyunk , uhnesátizzetá , uhbezekumink uhgoōwin mushkâwandumowin uhságeittink giya ágōshtegwânaowin , buhgoosanemowin uhbemátizzeyunk :
Kâween Kitche Manito kegemenigoosenán ochichâgomá gwasint meatuh mushkâwizzewin ságeittewin giya ápiche mushkâwâg náguttuhwandumowin .
Ween neenkekanemá aketōt kunwandumowâsewintdush oguhgequawin kuhgenowishke , kâween tabwawin ogegishkunzeen .
Mooshkenatōg nemennowânegoozewin ayeezh che enandumag che sâgeitteyag che bazhekwunk ketenandumowinewâ .
Opedush enandumōg , wetuhkonáwât , kâ oweuh aninnewun otânginnegooseen , ōnje kâ muhshe otepiegun ochichesasininne .
Keche mennototumowát che wânutizzewât , mennouhnokewinink che washowandumowát che megewawât .
Oguhguhnonáwân otinnáwândush , kishpin gemutche totunzikobun kâ ketá , ge betosenonim .

Ween kanowandunk gezhigut okunwandumowân Kitche Manitōn , ween kanowandumowâsig , Kitche Manitōn gezhigut ká okunwanduhzeen ; ween wâsinit oweesenetowân Kitche Manitōn ōnje megwach otinnân Kitche Manitōn , weendush wâsinissig owesenetowâsig Kitche Manitōn megwachenát Kitche Manitōn .
Keguh pâpenanemōm che enandumunk mushkâwandumōk kekotuhgetowinewâng mozhuk uhnumeág .
Oluhnonándush shemágunisshe ogemán che kunwanemánit Paulun , aenandunkdush che izzhewabizzit kokkinnádush anowamájin we beuhnoketágoot , máno oguh beuhnoketágōn .
Kokkinná kago oguhbikán kotuhgittowin , kokkinná kago tabwatum , kokkinná kago onundowandán .
Me debishko azhe iáwungid uhchichâgomá mushkâwandumowin , azhebe-egâtagigo , neengetabwa-andum me wanje gegetoeyán ; neenowint giya neentabwatámin , me wanje gegetoeyáng .
Binná keguhgâzomineme , nekânissenátōk , quiukquanemikōk uhgew quiuk izzhewâbizzisigook , niandumeikōg uhgew nánuhmandungig , neezhokomowwikōg nánuhmizzidjig ; kago oweuh ositáwanemá kago .
Ako nánunewátdush mezhinowa osgenán otomotansim áwase onámátábewinink , otogemáwewindush kokkinná kushkedibikutinne ; otuhtukqundánâwân otanuhnewewán azhe wesuhgandumewât ,
Menik tiabwatungig o-o guhgequawin tuhmennoinnowanlewug , tuhshâwandágoosewug , giyadush Kitche Manito otuhnishanâbamun tuhshâwandágoosewug .
Me wuhow aninne gá ezhe nissetotunk Kitche Manita oguhgequawin ; gooshkooze ochicâgōnk mozhuk uhnoke guhgequat Kitche Manito oguhgequawin , meatuh John obaptizewawin kakandunk .
Eu ōnje , kokkinná májeyag kokkinná kago giya manequayag kokkinná giya anuhnokeyag kokkinná totumōg ga ezhe kitchetwâweyag Kitche Manito .

Uhchichâgomá gá meninágoon kegegishkowâwâ kâ oweuh aninne keta guhgekimegoosewâ kago mego o-o uhchichâgomá gagekiminág kokkinná kago tabwawinewun kâweendush kuhgenowishkewinewunzenōn , ketá beenjinuhwânashkowâwâ uhchichâgomá azhe guhgekeminág .
Tebishko weowwemá uzzhochichâgoseeng ubnebomuhguk me giya mushkâwandumowin uhnokewin tuhgoosinok azhe nebomuhguk .
Opedush o-o aketōt , puhquazhegun ototâpenán obábokobetōt megwatch otinnân , Kitche Maniton , anosumenit kokkinná medush bokobetōt azhe wesenitdush .
Oshebeumowâtánig uhmetágwietumowât muzzenitchegunun , bisshegwâtizzewin giya wânuhkin giya misque .

Pauldush otinnân , Kitche Manito keguh bussittōnaōk giya keen wiábishkiegâzoeyun , ōnje kenámátábe emá tepákonegayun tepákonegawinink , ketuhnokedush , che bussittonaogoeyân , uhmutche totumun tepákonegawinink ?
Kaw kago bátázewin ogegishkunzeenâwâ uhgew , nopenuhjig Jesus Christun , kâ weyâsemá onopenuttunzeenâwâ , meatuh Uhchichâgomá .
Onje Kitche Manito kegeinoumágonán kâween ween nishkâtizzewinink , meatuh keche bemátizzeyunk Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ ōnje ,
Tuhmájádush che wiazhemát anishanâban mizzewa ákeeng ayájig Gog giya Magog , che mowōnjeintwâ che megâzowât : andusshewât nagow kitchegumeeng azhenuk me azhenowât .
Ahnint me azhewabizzeyagobun , kege gesebeginegâzōmdush , kege benechegâzōmdush , quiuk kege izzhewabeigōm , Jesus Kitche Manito otuhnozowinink , giya Kekitche Manitomenán Ochichâgwun ōnje .
Eu ōnje máno neendenandánun ono iuheen , kâweendush neendágutchese , ōnje neenkekanemá ween uhtiabwatowug , neenkekanemá uhkushketōt che kunwandunk e-e gá menug , nánázh e-e gezhigut che ochichesag .
Mozhuk uhnumeáng kokkinná uhnumeawinun kechichâgowâng mozhuk uhkowâbeeng uhnumeáng , uhnumeatumowik kokkinná uhnumeájig :

Paul , giya Silvanus , giya Timotheus , otozhebeumowâwân anumeánidjin Thessaloniaink , Kitche Manito Osemá ōnje , giya Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ , keguhshâwandágoozim innuhwandewinink Kitche Manito Kōsenán ōnje giya Kitche Manito Jesus Christ .
Kebakâtizzewinewâ máno kokkinná aninnewug oguh kekandánâwâ ; Kitche Manito bazhew já .
Aquoche mejeyag o-o puhquazhegun , giya menequayag o-o menequâchegunink kewâbundiewanâwâ Kitche Manito onebowin nánázh keche tuhkoshink .
Uhnumeawin mushkâwandumowin guttuh ōnje bemátizzewug wiákoozidjig , Kitche Manitodush oguh pusegweendenán , kishpindush ge mutcheizzhewabizzit tuh mennoweshâwandágooze .
Megwach neendená Kitche Manito ween anoketowug gata nōsug , ōnje bánuk enandumowin ōnje gâgineek kekunwanemin anumeáyánin tibikuk giya gezhiguk .
Otitánâwân wudjewun giya ázbebekōn buhtuhgwooshkokowisshináng gázheshináng che wâbomiseumint uhow námátábewinink námátábit , onishkâtizzewindush Mánishtânishans :

Ween watowugât , máno tuh nōndum Ochichâgomá anát anumeanidjin : Ween anewishkunk neenguhmená che mejit kiátuk manna , wabishke asin neenguhmená , uhsineengdush ōshke onozowin oshebe-egáta , eu oweuh aninne kakanduhzik meatuh 'ow mánint .
Osáságizzewinewá ōnje , kuhgiazhe keezhwawinun ōnje keguh onuhgumigowâg keche átáwawât keowwewân : otebákonegawinewâ kiut ōnje , kâ beomuhgusinōn , uhbátámintwâ kâ nebámuhgusinōn .
O-o ōnje Kitche Manitōn oguh ezhenázhuhogowân kache sōngunk wuhnisshinowin keche ōnje tabwatumowât kuhgenowishkewin .
Kitche Manito otuhnozowin pâpenochegâtane magwaiuhe miátáwizzidjig keen ōnje , eu azhebe-egâtag .

Nōngum tibishko Jannes giya Jambres , gá ezhe nuhmuhchetowâwât Mosesun , me uhgew giya weenowá azhe nuhmuhchetumowât tabwawin , aninnewug bagishkunutinik onáguttuhwandumowinewâng , uzzhakewajig mushkâwandumowinink .
Menik ságeugwâ , neennuhnebekimág neembuhshunzhawág ; eu ōnje , ángwâmizzig , ánwanindizzōk .
Me eu ōnje mennoweshâwandágoozeyunk kemushkáwandumowininánin ōnje , nemennoenanemánán Kitche Manito , Jesus Christ Neenkitche Manitomenán ōnje ;
Tuttebábundumázo , iyángwâmandun keguhgequawin , o-o uhtotumun keguh ōnje bemájetōn keow giya uhgew bazindōkwâ .
Neenge buhshunzhawâg , nebewá tussink , andussink uhnumeawegumigōnk neenge totowâg keche nánebekemáwái Kitche Manitōn , neenge gitche nishkanemág miátá otanong neenge izzhenizzhowâg .
Weyâsemá uhnokewin nágwitchegâta , me ono , bisshegwâtizzewin , wenizzewin .
Mego eu , ween kategat , kâween ningōt inábuhtizzisse , ween giya ságáunjegat , kâ ningōt inábuhtizzisse , Kitche Manito koshá megewa menekân
Kokkinná tatussin azhe menigoeyag uhbeoeyag che tuhko think Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ :
Nenōndándush gegetowin gezhigōnk , nebewá nebeen matwawagin inwawin , kitche uhnemikeeg anwawât inwa ; nenōndán mutwawag mutwawachegun :
Kokkinná mamándáwizzidjig owetokágōn otuhnozowinink ōnje owwagwanun ga tabwatágōgwan tuh menowwe sháwandágooze omutche izzhewabizzewin .
Uhgew nandowâbundungig quiuk izzhewabizzewin mákindungig oguh menán gâgega bemátizzewin .

JOHN otoshebeumowân názhwâswawânuhgizzidjig anumeájig Asiaink : Keguh shâwandágoozim , giya innowandewin dush ween ōnje nongum wiáwit , ween gá áwit , ween giya ga áwit ; giya nazhwâchejig Ochichâgomág anosumisinik onámátábewin ayájig ōnje ;
Pauldush eketto , kagat John baptizewa , baptizewawin ánvanindizzowin ezhe guhgequa ; otinnândush anishanâban keguh tabwatowâwâ ween ga be nopenuhzhit , me 'ow Jesus Christ .

Kitche Manito okekandán ga totunk che bemájeát quiuk azhewabizzinidjin kuhgwadebanemintwânin , giya che kunwanemát macheizzhewabizzinidjin nánázh e-e gezhigut ope che tepákonegang keche buhshunzhaogowizzewât :
Nōngumdush nowutch wanissheshin tuhnuhkewin onundowandánáwâ eu gezhigōnk tuhnuhkewin ; me eu ōnje ká águtchese Kitche Manito Okitche Manitomewân keche enintwâ , oge ozhetowân gezhá kitche otanuh .
Uhsheengandumun che nōndumun meendemoyá gegetowinun , iyângwâmandun keow , Kitche Manito otuhnokewinink .
Ezháwugdush uhmungutayánik áke ogewetáskánâwâ anumeájig okuhbashewinewâ giya siágitōng otanuh : ishkota gezhigōnk beōnje názhuhkemuhgut uhgonigowât .
Oguhgâzomán che baptizeintwâ Kitche Manito otuhnozowinink , okuhquajemáwândush ukkowa gomá tussogwun emá che iát .
Ketenandum keenigo tebinowa che suhgábeginutwâbun kagebeengwajig keche wâsashkumowutwâ kushkedibbikutōnk ayájig ,
Me o-o gá wâweendumonung gâgega bemátizzewin .

Nebwâkâwindush ishpemink wanjemuhguk , benut , bakâtut , wângowut , mámázh keche nundotumink kago mooshkena keshawâtizzewin , menno menekânewun , kâ owushema apetanemowin tuhgoosinōn , kuhgianizzewin tuhgoosinōn .
Osemá osâgeán oguisemá , ogemenándush kokkinná kago oninjeeng .

Kâween Kitche Manito buhbakekâtizzisse owâweendumágawin , ánint aninnewug anandumowât ; keenwazh kuhgwâtuhgito keenowint , ōnje kâ enanduhze oweuh che banátizzit , kokkinná onundowanemán che ánwanindizzonit .
Apadush kokkinná aninnewug izzhewabizzewât azhewabizzeyán , kokkinná aninnewug tebinowa ayát oge menán Kitche Manitōn bazhek o-o tinnouh , minowâ bazhek , e-e tinnouh .
Nopenuttumōk keshawâtizzewin , nundowandumōk ochichâgomá shâwandágoozewin , owushema apetandumōk che guhgequayag .
Onje Kitche Manito ween gá totunk che wâsáyág , ween wâsayá kemenigonán ketaináng owwe kekandumoninunk Kitche Manito okitchetwâwizzewin anosume skezhik Jesus Christ .
Bazhek aninnedush Jewew , Apollos ezhenekâzo , Alexan driaink genege , natágegetōt aninne ogitche kekandán mazan iegun Ephesusink be-ezhán .
Jesus giya ween azhe sáságewitchegaát anishanâhan , tebinowa omisqueem ōnje anishanâbag che ōnje benizzowât ge kuhgwâtuhgito áquchink otanuh .
Ono iuheen ekettōn , kuhgândwan , guhgequan kokkinná mushkâwizzewinink . Kago oweuh keguh pâpenotágose .
O-o mizzhishshowwenágwuchegâtag , owâbundi-itink Kitche Manito sâgeinunk , ōnje Kitche Manito obeizzhenázhowân ákeeng biazhegwunit Oguisun siágeájin , konemá ketá ōnje bemátizzim .
Nōs ápadush uhgew gá mezheunik che wejewewât uzzhiáyân , oguhwâbundánâwâ neengitchetwâwizzewin gá mezheun ; ōnje kesâgenábun bwâ ozhetōng áke .
Banájeiggowint ezhissininne azháwât nisshewuhnátizzewât :
Aquo iyáwunk kitche sáságewitchegaweninne ween gezhigōnk gá iezhát , ween Jesus , Kitche Manito Oguisun mushkâwe menjimenuntá o-o uhnumeawin .
Oge otissigōn kitchetwáwizzewin bisshegandágoozewin Kitche Manitōng ōnje , ope watisigōt tinnouh gegetowin kitche kitchetwâwizzewinink , me uhow siágeug Neenguis , ween ápiche nemeenwandum .
Bazhek Uhchichâg kokkinná iuheen andotunk , anandunkigo otezhemámenán kokkinná aninnewun .

Ako newewât mezhinowagdush onōndágomotōn , ánintdush gezis banátizze , ánint e-e giya tibeke gezis , ánint giya uhnungwug , me ánint azhe kushkedibbikuk , ánint e-e gezhigut , kâ gewâsayásinōn , ánint giya tibikut .
Kokkinnádush Greekug ototâpenáwân Sosthenesun , nâgânizzit uhnumeawegumigōnk obuhbuhkittawâwân tebákonegawinink ; Galliodush kâ papámanduhzeen ono iuheen .
Eu ōnje owwe otâpenáwân minowâ oge me-egowândush ,
Me eu ōnje , wanje wunemikowwisewunk ánuh áqutcheiuhe aninne weow banátut , anámiuhe aninne ashkum ōshkenágweá andussogezhigut .
Marydush ningo tebabishkojegun ototâpenán , kachesunnáguggindag pemeta , osinnegenumowândush ozittáning Jesusun ; kesezittawândush wenesissun ; omooshkenamágootdush wegewamink .
Mushkâwandumowin ōnje nukkowa nogishkâ emá eu áke wiáweendumowint miáwukeeng miátáwizzinidjin emá tunnuhke mutche-eginōnk tá , mámowy Isaacun , Jacobun giya , sazekizzinidjin mámowy wâweendumowutwâ .
Nekânissetōk nopenuzzheshig , mámowy kekinowâbomikōg uhgew wiábomeuminjig anosayáng .
Buhbemewetátig mámáshqut kebemewunánewân ; me o-o ga izzhewabizzeyag che tabwatumag Christ otebákonegawin .
Kewâbundánâwâdush aninne quiuk azhe ozhichegâzōt uhnokewinun ōnje , kâween atuh mushkâwandumowin ōnje .
Anneen ga ekettoeyunk ? Kitche Manito nuh mutchetotum ? Kâween pâpish .
Ween nánuhmutinik omushkâwandumowin , otâpenik , kago guhgânjetowâ kago che tabwatunk .
Megâtimdush gezhigōnk ; Michael giya omezhinowamun omegânáwân genabeekōn ; mutche genabeekdush , megâzo mámowy omezhinowamun ,
Nishkâtizzig , kago mutcheizzhewabizzig kago : kago gezis tuh pongeshimose kenishkâtizzewinewâng ;

Kago mutchetotátewin ázhetá mutchetotátekago , kago iázhetá kezhe guhnonik kago , tiuhgwutchigo keguh shâwanemág ; ōnje kekekandánâwâ kenundomigōm o-o keche izzhewabizzeyag , konemá keguh ōnje shâwandágoozim .
Ween biezhenazho-ōt newejewik : ōsemá kâween ezheke neennuhgunigoose kokkinná o-o aeendotumán ono iuheen ezhemeenwandum .
Eu ōnje nebowwig , tabwawin kechepinitizook , kekákemewâng átōng quiuk izzhewabizzewin .

Kiátukin iuheen wiábomudjig neengitchenikâng , giya neezhwâswa ozâwâ shoneá wâsâkoninjegunâtigōn . Neezhwâswa uhnungwug me uhgew mezhinowag neezhwâswawân anumeájig : neezhwâswa wâsâkoninjegunâtigōn me neezhwâswân anumeájig .

Kewâbománán Jesus ween punge nōndás gá enuhgemint mezbinowag , apetandágoozewât ōnje uhgwâtuhgitōt nebowin , owewoquânit kitchetwâwizzewin mennobemátizzewin ween Kitche Manito oshâwanjegawin kokkinná aninnewun ge ōnjena .
Onje Kitche Manito ween anokeet keowwewâng che enandumag che izzhewabizzeyag ga ezhe meenwandunk .
Ono iuheen , aninnuhgook , neenpápenanemowin keowwewâng tuh iá , kepâpenanemowindush tuh mooshkena .
Paul , Jesus Christ otanonájin , Kekitche Manitomenán gá Bemáje-ewat otenandumowin ōnje , giya Kitche Manito Jesus Christ apanemoeyunk ;

Me giya tibishko equawug ga izzhewabizzewât , tibishko che ezhenágwutinik ga uhguewâjin , keche iyuhgutcheengwânewât , ozâm keche onánegoozissigwâ , kago keche kegishkunzikwâ wenesisewâng giya ozâwâ shoneá che uttosigwâ , giya megissun , che muttemásigwá , giya kache innuhgindag uhguewin ;

Opedush buhshunzhaegun otozhetōn , bemenuhquânasink ogesâgitchenázhowât kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk , giya manishtânishun giya pezhekewun : geseegwabenán , wiyáyázhetōnnuming shoneá ogwanuhbewabenánun otopowinun :
Ween kege ozheigonán Christ ōnje mennouhnokewinink eu Kitche Manito , gá inounk kiut gá izzhewabizzeyunk .
Siágeinuhgook , kago mámuhkâtandun kago , o-o ishkotang azhenágwut kuhgwadebanindewin ga guhgwadebanemigoyag , kago go miátáwuk andotátingin che izzhewabuk ;
Umbasino pâpenanemotá , mojeganduntá , kitchetwâwanemátá ; Mánishtânishans owetegandewin tuhkoshinomuhgut , owewun ázhia gegezhetá .
Otâpenumōk wewoquân shâwandágoozewin , Ochichâgomá otuzzhowweshk eu Kitche Manito odikittowin :
Owâbomándush bazhek mutche totowwemint , otowwe wejegâbowittowân wâtokowwájin , onesándush uhnew Egyptianun .
Keenowádush nekânissetōk kago iakoozik kago , quiuk keche izzhewabizzeyag .
Uhkowâbig , mushkâwegâbowig mushkâwandumowinink , aninneeng izzhewabizzig , sōngizzig .
Kagat , kege otâpenánâwâ Moloch omutche-egin , giya kemanitomewâ Remphan otuhnungomun ; mazanichegunun , gá ozhetoeyag che uhnumeatumag : áwâs ewada Babylonink keguh ezhewinnenimdush .
Eu ōnje nekânissetōk , mushkâwegâbowik mushkâwe meenjimenumōk kokkinná gá guhgekimigoeyag , neengegetowininán ōnje giya nemuzzenieguninán ōnje .
Ween Kitche Manito kege gezhetáigonán o-o iuhe ōnje , giya kegemenigonán ánint Ochichâgwun .
Máno equa oguh we kekandán keche pezân uhbit kokkinná tuhbusanemowinink .
Kishpin ningōtono enint okewanze tuh neezhewug nissewug ga wetokâzojig che bezindowwintwâ .
Iyuhnumikotátig wawane che ojeendeyag . Christ otuhnumeájin ketánumekagōnâwâ .

Weáguseun otuhpuhgitōnâwâ ōshtegwânewâng , ázhequawug , uhmowwewât , iázhequawât , ekettōnk , tiá ! tiá ! eu kitche otanuh , kokkinná uhgew wanápequânidjin kitchegumeeng ōnje wânutizzewug , owânutizzewin ōnje ! ōnje ningo tebiegun ge ápiche banáshichegâzo .
Binnah Osemá azhe sâgeinunk , keche ezhe weenigoeyunk Kitche Manito oguisun ! áke wanje kekanemigoosewung kâ oge kekanemigooseen .

Giya keenowâ ōskenowatōk , tuhbussebuhgitenumowikōg okewanzeug keowwewán ; kagat kokkinná andussheyag tuh tuhbussebuhgittenumátig keowwewân , uhgweyeuk ketuhbusanemowinewâ : Kitche Manito onuhgânán kachetwâwanemonidjin , omenándush shâwanjegawin tuhbussanemonidjin .

Kitche Manito kâ meenwanduhze che izzhewabuk , ( kâween pâpish , ) Kitche Manito tuh tabwa máno kokkinná aninnewug tuh kuhgenowishkewug , azhebe-egâtag , kedikittowinun tuh tabwa anjegâtawun , kokkinná keguh unnewishkágo , ope tepá konigoeyun .
Me bowōnje ezhát kokkinná wetuhkobenát uhnumeánidjin , ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewug otuhnonáwân :

Kuhkenowishke ōnwâchegajig iábuneeg ukko magwa anishanábag , tebishko ga ezhe iáwat kuhgenowishke guhgequajig magwaiuhe uzzhiáeyag , oguhbetōnâwâ gemōch mutche guhgequawinun , tebishko ágoonwatumink Kitche Manito uhgishpinunigowâjin , oguh betázōnâwâ kezhesag che banájentwâ .
Me ōnje , ánjigo wenesáwât , ōnje kâweenigo atuh begobetōt , unwabewinnegezhigut : eketto giya , Kitche Manito ōsun : mego debishko Kitche Manito , weōw , ototán .
Kemenno tuzzhememin nekânissetōk , ōnje kenáguttuhwanemin kokkinná kago , kekunwandánâwâ tebákonogawin gá ezhe meninnuhgook .
David koshá tuhtepájemá , neengewâbomá Kitche Manito , gâgineek anosummeskezhik ; neengitchenikkâng iá , kâween pâpish neendá beenjinnetáse :
Onje kege ánje negim kâween eu ga begishkunut , Kitche Manito odikittowin ōnje , eu bamátuk giágegasink .
Weendumátik mamáshquut kemutcheizzhewabizzewinewân , uhnumeatumátig mamashquut , konemá keguh ōnje nojemōm . Sângunk anumeawin , quiuk izzhewabizzit anione otuhnumeawin nebená apetandágwut .
Kagat , kagat , ketenenim , ween tiabwatowwit tuh gâgega bemátizze .
Kâ keguh nuhgunissinnōnim , chebwâ nuhniandumag keguh beotissininim .
Kitche nebená ; giya uhnánōch izzhewabizzewinun ; weenowâ netam wanepuzh ge menáwug Kitche Manito oguhgequawin .
Uhnoketâgaweninewetōk , tabwatowikōg tabaneminágook weyâs ōnje , che sagizzeyag che nuhningishkâyag , che bazhekwunk ketaewân Christ ōnje ;

Uhgamá kenisshebábenotumowâ innuh omennoshâwanjegawin , uhsásebishkátandunk oweuh nashkeigoojin , kânuh kekekanduhzeen Kitche Manito oshâwanjegawin , ke ezhe suhgábeginigoeyun keche anwanindizzoeyun ?
Me o-o azhe tabwa-anemunk nandotumowungoon kago kemenigonán anandungin che meninunk .
Nōngum Kitche Manito ween mágewat buhgoosanemowin máno keguh totonim che mennowânegwandumag che innuhwandeyag uhtabwatumag , che buhgoosanemoeyag Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun omushkâwizzewin ōnje .
Gá tuzzhe suhsuhgáquo-ōnt emá , ketegânink ; ketegâninkdush , ōshke jebágumik tuhgoo , kâ oweuh aninne muhshe ussáse .

Ahwasedush tuhkonán mámowy gagenowishkinidjin mamándáwizzit gá muhmámándátotuminit anosuminit , uhnew gá wiazhemájin uhgew áwaseun wazhebe-egâzonidjin uhgew anumeátowâjig omuzzininnemun , uhgew nayazh ishkota kitche gumeeng gá ápuhgeninjig eu chiágetag ozáwâsqukanag ōnje .
Eu ōnje , keshânganeminág , buhkuttat , usshumik , gâshkunábágwat , menihik che minnequat , eu totumag uhkuhkuhzhan keguh oguisetowâwâ ōshtegwânink .
Máno Christ odikitowin keguhgegishkánâwâ kokkinná nebwâkâwinink , kuhgekindink guhgânzōndink mamashkōt , nuhgumowinun ochichâgo nuhgumowinun uhnuhgumoyag sâgeag Kitche Manito ketaewâng .
Onâbamemátook , sâgeikkōg kewewâg , kago nishkenuhwâ kagwânik .
Oweuh aninne giya equa tiabwatungig , iáwâwât shegán oguh bumeáwân , kago anumeájig kago oguh tebáunzeenâwâ , konemá guhtuh kushketowug che bumeáwât quiuk shágáwinidjin .
Me o-o ekettowin Kitche Manito gá meninunk gâgega bemátizzewin , o-o bemátizzit Oguisun ogegishkumine .
Ween ayáwât Oguisemá otián bemátizzewin , ween ayáwâsig Kitche Manitōn Oguisinne kâ otiáseen bemátizzewin .
Oguisemádush wânukke-enág keguh wânukkeem kagat .
Eu ōnje ketenaneminenim che nōndáshâgwanemosewag neenkotuhgitowinun ōnje neenkotuhgitowinun keenowâ ōnje .
Kâween otuhnoketowâsewâ Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christun , meatuh tebinowa omisutáwâ ; menno ekettowinun nennogegetowinun ōnje owiazhemigōnáwân kagebátizzidjig etaewân .

Omooshkenashkágōnâwâ kokkinná mutche izzhewabizzewinun , bisshegwâtizzewinun , mázheninnewugizzewinun , sáságizzewinun , sheenganindewinun , kuhgâwanindewinun , nesittewin , nishkanindewin , kuhgianizzewin , mutche totumowin : bagwuhnoondidjig ,
Eu wanissheshink gá menigoeyun kunwandun Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun ōnje eu gagishkumunk .
Ween kategâtumowât oweyâs , oweyâs ōnje oguhmámōn begishkuhnut ; ween kategâtumowât ochichâgwun , ochichâgomá oguhtotágōn che mámát gâgega bemátizzewin .
Kago giya kuhgwadebanemásetá Christ , ánint uhgew gá azhe kuhgwadebanemáwât , uhge banátizzewâtdush , mutche kenabegōn ōnje .
Kâ mutcheizzhewabussinōn , kâween tebinowa atuh kunowâbundizzemuhgussenōn , kâ wanuhpuhusinōn che nishkâtizzink ; kâ mutche enanduhze ;
Buhkákáquânun otiáwâwân pewâbeko buhkááquânink ezhenágoozewun ; uhmutwa ângawât bazhekokasheeg mawinnuhzhewâwâjin owwe megâzowât inwawanewun oningwegunewân .
Bwâ takoshinámbán , bwâ guhguhnonugwâbun , kâ mázheninewugizzewin , tágeiáseenâwâ , nōngumdush kâ kago otuggwunuhunzeenâwâ omázheninnewuggizzewinnewâ .
Nebwâkâkundow uhgew áqutchink ayájig , mozhuk che ōndumetáeyag .
O-o kekandumink kegata keowinánin ge tuhgoo suhsuh gáquowâ weowemá mutcheizzhewabizzewin che bánáchichegâtag , náagutchdush ketáuhnoketunzemin mutcheizzhewabizzewin .
Me o-o onejânisun azhewâbundiewawât otizzhewabizzewinewâ giya Mutche Manito onejânisun ween quiuk andotunzik kâ Kitche Manitōn ōnje negisse , ween giya siágeásig wekânisun .
Onje mutche náguttuhwandumowin , osheengandán Kitche Manito , kâ tuhbusse buhgittinnegâtasenōn Kitche Manito otepákonegawin , kâ giya tá izzhewabussinōn .
Me neendá wanje onánegoosink , neendanenew pâpenanemomuggut , giyadush neweyâs tuh inwashemomuggut buhgoosanemowinink .
Neendikitdush uhgew miátáwizzidjig ono iuheen siáságewinnáwâjin Mutche Manito siáságewinnáwâjin , kâween ween Kitche Manitōn ; kâween kenundowanemissenonim keche owekâneyag Mutche Manitōg .
Uhnumeawegumigonkdush iáwug Antiochink ánint mamándáwizzidjig kagequajig , Barnabas , Simeon , Niger ezhenekâzo , Lucius Cyreneink , giya Manaen , Herodun giya Saulun mámowy ge wejenetáwiggeendewug .
Kago oweuh aninne keguh wiyazhemigoose omutche geowin ōnje , ânga , ono iuheen ōnje Kitche Manito onishkâgewin ototissigōnâwâ uhgew tiabwatunzigook .
Otonewân otá ge báánâwân owiazhemáwán ayándussotawizzinit guhgequawát iuheen anandágoozissigwâ che guhgequawât shoneá ōnje .
Ween okekanemán ga bugittinnegoojin : me wanje ekettōt kâween kokkinná kebenezisseem .
Kagat , kagat , ketenenim , ween squandamink wanje peendegasig manishtânishun owegewamink , bázhittota ningooche , me gamotishkidjin giya nashewashkidjin .
Ogooshquanánâwâ quiuk izzhewabizzewin , ningooche ezhe wuhnishinōg , onopenutánâwâ Baalam , Bosor oguisun , otizzhewabizzewin ween gá siágetōt tebáumátewin mutcheizzhewabizzewin ōnje .
Miátáwizzidjig giya Jewug giya onegânezemewân ope gá 'zhetáwât we mowwenaegawât owwe bemosinnuháwát ,

Otinnândush minowâ , me nissink , Simon , Jona oguisun , kesâge innuh ? Peterdush osittáwandum ōnje otinnân nissink , kesâge innuh ? Otinnândush , Neendogemám , kokkinná kago kekekandán , kekekandán sâgeinnán . Otinnândush , usshum nemanishtânisshemug .
Kâween pâpish kago tuh peendegamuhgusinōn ga ōnje wenuk giya kago mutcheizzhewabizzewin giya kago kuhgenowishkewin : uhgew atuh wazhebe-egâzojig Mánishtânishans omazaniegune bemátizzewinink .

Uhowdush equa manitowagin , giya misquagin , agwidjin , ozâwâ shoneán matindungin , giya miskâziswâbeekōn giya megissun , ozâwâ shoneá minequâchegun takonunk oninjeeng mooskena mutcheizzhewabizzewin weenizzewin obisshegwátizzewin .
Owushemadush kokkinná iuheen , bezekumōk keshawâtizzewin , me e-e tákobizzoon quiuk izzhewabizzewin .
Jesus oguhnonán , ekettodush , tepiegun ochichesa , Aninne Oguisun che kitchetwâweint .
Keen ezhe guhgekemut aninne keche bisshegwâtizzissig keen innádush ketá bisshegwâtiz ? Keen shânganemutwâ muzzenineeg , ketá pâpenotowân innuh Kitche Manito ?
Mutcheizzhewabizzewin , kokkinná uhnōch mutche enandumowin ge uhnokemuhgut neowwink tepákonegawinink ōnje . Tepákonegawin tuhgoosinōk , mutcheizzhewabizzewin nebomuhgut .
Neenguhmuhkumág keow uhgew uhnoketowudjig , nōngumdush keguh ezhe anonin uzzhiáwât miátáwizzidjig ,

Onje neenowint tebinowa neenkuhkepátizzeminábun ukko , kâ ukko neenge tabwatunzeminábun , newiazhemigominábun ukko , uhnōch enandumowinun mennowânegoozewinun neendenuhnokeminábun ukko , mázheninnewugizzewinink guhgâwanindewinik , neenshásheenganindeminábun ukko .

Ketizzhe guhgâzomin anosumeet Kitche Manito , giya Kitche Manito Jesus Christ giya gá onuhgiminjig mezhinowag che tabwatumun che kunwandumun ono iuheen , kago owushemá apetanemákan bazhek aninne bazkek apetanemut , kago o-o aeendotunkan .
Kago wabenun kago kemushkâwandumowinewâ , guhtuh kitche tebiegâta o-o .
Minowâ giya enandágoozewug keche nebwâkâwât , kanowandungig iuheen .
Gá izzhewabukdush Joppaink iá nebená tussogwun Simonun asakaweninne owetegamán .
Kânuh kekekanduhzeenâwâ Kitche Manito otuhnumeawegumik , áweyag ? Kitche Manito Ochichâgwundush kegegishkowag ?
Me eu ōnje nekânissetōk , wanje mushkâweta-ayunk , che peendegaeyunk owushema apetandágwuk wegewâm , Jesus omisqueem ōnje ,
Minowâdush Jesus otinnân , neenguh májá ezháeyán , keguh nundowâbomim kemázheninnewuggizzewinnewâng keguh nebōm ; azháeyándush kâ keguh be-ezháseem .
Pezekumōk eu ōnje , Kitche Manito uhge onuhgiminág , manoizzhewabizzeyag , giya siágeigoeyag , keshâwâtizzewinun mennoizzhewabizzewm , tuhbusanemowin , nokâtizzewin , keenwazh kuhgwâtuhgitōng .
Aninne enandunk che otoskenegamug , neendá nopenuhnink , keche iáeyán me giya neendoskenegam keche iát : oweuhdush aninne otoskenegamemug , nōsun oguhgitchetwâwanemigōn .
Wawane oguh kuhnowanemán andussotawizzit , kokkinná onejânisun oguh tuhbusse buhgitinán :
Eu ōnje , mámowy nuhniandumōk , uhmushkâwandumeittig tebishko andotumag .
Me o-o ekettowin gá nōndumag wiazhkut wazhetōng áke che sáságeittink .
Konemâ me o-o mennoizzhewabuttōgwan omá o-o wanebek o-o kotuhgitowinink , neendikit mennoizzhewabut , aninne keche izzhewabizzit .
Bazhek aninne Pharisee , Nicodemus ezhenekâzo nágânizzekundowât Jewun .
Mego tebishko bisshegwâtizzit equa Rahab , kánuh ge ōnje ezhichegâzōse uhnokewinun ōnje ope bándegunát anoninjig uhge májenázhowâtdush puhkán enuhkuhkayá ?
Anewakdush , guhtuh bemátizze buhbenenekat , kishpin mushkâwandumowât keshawátizzewât , mennoizzhewabizzewât beneta-awinink .
Uhgew anishanábag Israelug Omanitomewân oge onábomán , kōsenánin opusegweendenán magwouh miátáwizzeáng uhtuhnuhkewât Egyptink uhsōnginekanit oge ōnje sâgizzeán .
Kitche Manito okekandánun otaemán , ween wetokowân miátáwizzinidjin omenándush ochichâgwun o-o gá ezhe meninunk giya keenowint ?
Ween aketōt , kago bishegwâtizzekan ; giya eketto , kago nisshewakan . Binná kishpin bishegwâtizzissewun , nisshewayundush , me e-e bokobetoyun kokkinná tebákonegawin .
Nemenágdush gâgega bemátizzewin ; káwekâ tuh wunneshinzewug , kâdush oweuh neenguh gitcheninjebinnegoose .
Kitche Manito gezhawâtizzit keguh tuhtuhkokâttumoigowâ Mutche Manito wiebuh . Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ uhshâwanjegawin keguh wejewigōnâwâ . Amen .
Tuh anumeakâzowug , kâween quiuk tuh uhnumeásewug ; metágwietun e-e tinnouh .
Me debishko ga ezhe bazhekwunk keowinánin Jesus Christ mámowy , kokkinnágo mámowy keowinânin che ápiche bazhekwunk ;

Me o-o nebwâkâwegeezhwawin , ketenenim keche guhgequayun mozhuk ono iuheen , konemá uhgew tiabwatowâjig Kitche Manitōn tá iyângwâmandumōg quiuk keche izzhewabizzewât , ono iuheen me wanissheshingin giábuhtuk aninnewug ōnje .
Mazaniegundush mooshkena tabwawinewun , eu aketomuhgut , Abraham ogetabwa-anemán Kitche Manitōn uhginjegâtanedush quiuk izzhewabizzewin che áwunk ; Kitche Manito anowamájin ge ezhewená .
Nekaunisetok , Jesus Christ , Gachetwâwizzit Kitche Manito omushkâwandumowin iyáeyeuk , oweuh pekinōnk keche apetanemásewag .
Ogōndágunewân bákissinōn jebágumigōn ; otanuhnewewân wiazhingamuhguttinnewun .
Aninnewug otá ságeáwán wewewân tibishko azhe sâgitowât weowwewân , ween siágeát wewun osâgitōn weow .
Ahneen ga ekettoeyunk ? miátáwizzidjig uhge nopenuttunzikwâ quiuk izzhewapizzewin , uhge otittánâwâ nuh quiuk izzhewabizzewin , eu quiuk izzhewabizzewin mushkâwandumowin ;
Uhmejimenumink kiátukin mushkâwandumowinink , beneta-awin .
Uhgew giya tiabwatuminit otogemámewân , kago oguh bâpizzhemásewân ōnje wekânisemáwewug ; máno tuh uhnoketágawug ōnje nebwâkâwug sâgeáwug ánintdush otián kashketōt . Ono iuheen guhgequan , guhgâzōn .
Kishpin ánint tabwatunzigwâ eu tabwa-anduhzeeng me uhbanájeintwâ ánint ánuh uhtabwa-andumowât Kitche Manitōn ?
Bazhekdush shemágunish , oshemágun obuhzhebowân Jesusun weowwinink , bâbegadush , misque ōnjegâne , giyadush nebe .
O-o neenguggequawin ; sâgeittig , azhe sâgeinnuhgook .

Kago bazhek kebuhkazewin uhnoketunkan mutcheizzhewabizzewin : buhgittinumowik Kitche Manito keowewân , tibbishko gá nebōngin gá ábejewâtdush kokkinná giya kebuhkazewinnewân menik Kitche Manito quiuk izzhewabizzewin che uhnoketowint .
Kâween neenowint neendá izzhewabizzissemin uhgew azhatájig che banátizzewât uhgew atuh tiabwatungig che bemátizzinit ochichâgwun .
Me kokkinná Israelitug guhtuh bemátizzewug azhebeegâtagigo ; Zionink tuh ōnjebá Gabemáje-ewat , ween oguh ikkoonunmowân miázheninnewugizzewin Jacobink .
Niyazh ogenesáwân Kitche Manitōn Jesusun , giya omamándáwizzemewân , giya neengemutchetotágonánig ; kâ oniandumeásewân Kitche Manitōn onishkanemáwân kokkinná aninnewun :
Kishpin ketwan we mutcheizzhewabizzeyunk , ánuh kekandumunk quiuk izzhewabizzewin , kâween kago kiábe tuhgoosinōn sáságewitchegawin mutcheizzhewabizzewin ōnje ,
Kege pusegweendenán mámowy genámátábeigonán gezhigōnk uhbewinink Christ Jesus ōnje ;
Eu ōnje ningooche buhgittinumōk kuhgenowishkewin , quiuk tabwawin ezheguhnonik kejetuhkewamágunewâg : babazhek buhkazewinun ketáwemin .
Uhgew kâween neengemenásenánig che gooshquawabin neumintwâ ningo tebiegun , konemá quiuk meenwâjemowin , gâgineek keguh gegishkánâwâ .
Eu ōnje kishpin oweuh aninne kushketōt miugwawin che inwat , tuh uhnumeá che we kushketōt keche ánekuhnotunk .
Sauldush mozhuk mutche gegeto , mutche enanemát uhnumeájig , ogemá sáságewitchegaweninne otizzhánun .
Nōngum kebe otissin , ono iuheen iekettoeyán ákeeng , neempâpenanemowin che mooshkenát weowwewâng .
Pápenanemók , ōnje ánint ketiánâwâ Christ okotuhgitowinun ; ope ogitchetwâwizzewin nágwutinik keguh mennowânegoozim .
Enábeándush , neengewâbomá , nowōgâtajig áwaseug ákeeng , buggwutch áwaseug giya , babámotajig giya , benásewug babámissajig giya .
Nōngumdush kokkinná ono kegegezekánâwân , nishkâtizzewin , mázheninewugizzewin , sheenganindewin , mutche geezhwawin , bisshegwâzetágoozewin , ketōnewâng ōnje .
Onje tibbishko iezhe uhnokewât , iá emá uzzhuhnokeet , ( bebuhgewiánegumigōn uzzhozhetowât . )
Kago mutcheizzhewabizzewin keguh ogemá kundágooseen keowink keguh wemámázhetōn che mutcheizzhewabizzissewun .
Uhgew towug anishanâbag , neenguhgâzománánig Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ ōnje , quiuk wawane keche uhnokewât , che mejewât tebinowa opuhquazhegunemewâ .
Gata ōsamágdush goosewug uhguhgâwandumowât oge átáwanâwân Josephun Egyptink , Kitche Manitodush ogewejewiggōn Joseph .
Bazhekdush , Agabus ezhenekázo , pusegwe , Ochichâgomá ōnje otebátotán che kitche buhkuttawinnewung kokkinna anegoquág ákeeng , medush shegwouh gá izzhewabuk Claudias Caesar ogezhiguttomun .
Gá iekettōt ono iuheen uhchicheengwunitá , uzzhuhnumetumowât kokkinná .
Uhgew Christun tabanemigoojig oge suhsuhgáquoánâwâ weyâs , mámowy enandumowinink .
Nekânissetōk náguttuhwandumōk che mennowânegwandumag ope ezhe pongeshinag kuhgwadebanindewinink .
Kishpin ekettoeyáng newetokâzomin , magwa kushkedibikut bamosayáng neendá kuhgenowishkemin , kâ quiuk neendá izzhewabizzissemin .
Owâbundándush , gezhik bákishkânik , kitche otossowindush benesábeginumowâ gezhigōnk ōnje .
Parthianug , Medug , Elamitug , Mesopotamiaink andánukkejig , Judeaink , Cappadociaink , Pontusink , Asiaink ,
Konemá ga ezhe niandumeag , Kitche Manito ketá enosam netáwigitōg kokkinná wanissheshink uhnokewin ashkum mushkâwandumag Kitche Manito otenandumowinink .
O-o guhgequawin kemenin , neenguis Timothy , gá azhe ōnwâtumink kiut konemá uhgew ōnje , me ga ōnje mennomegâzoeyun kitche megâzowin .

Gah eeshquâ izzhewabuk ono iuheen nenōndánun kitche nenebená gegetowinun nebená anishanâbag , gezhigōnk , ekettōnk , Alleluia : Shâwandágoozewin , kitchetwâwizzewin , mushkâwizzewin , tabwandungin Kekitche Manitomenán :
Keenowawdush gá neboeyag kemutcheizzhewabizzewinewá kegebemájeigowâ .

Kâween ketá kushketoseem che menequâchegayag Kitche Manito omenequâchegun , giya Mutche Manito omenequâchegun , káween ketá kushketoseem che weseneyag Kitche Manito otuhtopowinink , giya Mutche Manito otuhtopowinink .
Bisshegwâtizzewindush , giya wenizzewin , suhságizzewin ago eu keguh ezhe tuzzhemigoweem andussheyag , menik ga numeáyag ;
Uhgew bánizzidjig kokkinná iuheen weenowâ ōnje benuttinnewun : uhgewdush wânizzidjig , tiabwatunzigook , kâ kago benussinnewun onágutuhwandumowinewân wânutinnewun .

Kokkinnádush nōndowâjig , mámukkâtandumōg , ekettowugdush , kânuh wuhow iáwisse gá banájeát uhnumeánidjin o-o nozowinink Jerusalemink ? Me eu ōnjittâ bowōnje ezhápun omá owwe tuhkonát owwe ezhewittowât ogemá sáságewitchegaweninne ?
Nōngumdush owushema kitche sáságewitchegaweninnewe owushema apetandágwutinne wâweendumágawin wiánekuhnotunk wazhissink owushema wanissheshink wâweendumátewin .
Kishpin bemátizzeyán , Christ ōnje , kispin neboeyán owushema nemennoizzhewabiz .
Neendabwatámin o-o ween miáje menno uhnokeet ketaewâng guttuh ezhe uhnoke nánázh Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ ogezhiguttōm :

Kekekandámin Kitche Manito Oguisun takoshin gá meninunk nebwâkâwin che kekanemung ween quiuk izzhewabizzit weowwinkdush ketiámin ween tiabwat Kitche Manito Oguisun , Jesus Christ me o-o quiuk Kitche Manitōn giya gâgega bemátizzewin .
Kishpin kushketoeyag mennoinnuhwandeyeuk kokkinná anishanâbag .
Umbasinno mushkâwe meenjimenuntá ekettowin , neendângwâmandumowininánig ; ( ween gá wâweendumágat iângwâmandum ; )
Innuhwandewin kenuhguttuhmonim , neendinowandâsowin kemeninim , kâween áke azhe megewat , ketizzhe menisinonim .
Eu ōnje gâgineek kemushkáwandámin , ōnje kekekandámin magwouh omá uzzhiáeyunk keowwenáng wâsâ ketōnduhbetowwânán Kitche Manito .
Oweuh aninne nōndunk neengegetowin , tiabwatunzikdush , kâ neen tepákonegase ; kâween neembe tepákonuhzeen áke , neembebemájetōn áke ,
Kâween ween Cain gá izzhewabizzit gá mázheninewugizzit gá nesát wekânisun : wagonandush gá ōnje nánát ? ánga otizzhewabizzewin mutcheizzhewabutinne , wekânisundush quiuk izzhewabizzewun .
Kokkinná menissun ozhemomuhgutōn giya wudjewun , kâ mikegâtasinōn .
Me eu ōnje bazhek uhnew ōnje negeittewug weendush tebishko gá nebōngin anandágoozinidjin , andusshewât uhnungwug gezhigōnk giya nagow tuttebao kitchegumink bamissink tuzzhewug wanje netáwigidjig .
Nōngumdush Kitche Ogemá , giágega bemátizzit , kashketoseeng keche wâbomint , ween atuh nabwâkât Kitche Mánito , máno kitchetwâwizzewin tuh menittim , gâgineek . Amen .
Uzzheketōt anegōk , gosik Kitche Manito kitchetwâweik ; tebiegun otebákonegawin ochichesane ; uhnumeatowik ween gá ozhetōt gezhik giya áke kitchegumme giya mokidjewun-nebegōn nebeen .
Ono gezhiguttōn , ope anebátienowât tabwatungig , ningōtinkigo kekândewug Greekug giya Hebrewug ōnje oshegámewân uhgeinneintwâ e-e gezhiguk uhgemátuhonittink .

Me o-o agoeyag che izzhewabizzeyag ; ōnje Jesus Christ giya ween ge ōnje kuhgwâtuhgito keowwenánin , uhgenuhguttumonunk che kekinowâbominunk ga izzhewabizzeyunk , keche násábáunag gá unne ezhe tuhkokeet :
Magwouhdush uhge wejewináng uhge ekettoeyáng oweuh uhnokesig , kâ tá wesenese .
Kitche Manito azhe sâgitōt áke , me wanje megewat onezheka oguisun , owwagwan ga tabwatumōgwan kâ tuh wunnisshinze , tuh gâgegâ bemátizze .
Mutche Manitodush , nuhquatum eketto , neenkekanemá Jesus , Paul giya neenkekanemá ; owwanan koshá keenowâ ?
Newâbomádush áwase , ogemág e-e giya ákeeng giya omenisinomewân mowōnjeittewug owwe megânáwât uhnew bamomigoot bazhekokazheeng , giya omenisenomene .
Adramyttiumink tuzzhe nábequân neembozemin , nemájeáshemin neendenandámin chegebeeg Asiaink che unne enásheyâng , Aristarchus Macedoniaweninne Thessalonicaink andánuhkeet newejewegonán .
Nágutuhwanemik uhgew takobizzojig tibishko uhtuhgwipizoeyun : nágutuhwanemik uhgew kuhgwâtuhgitojig , tebinowa keowwewâng weowwewâng ketiám .
Kokkinná menik aeendotumag , aekettoeyag , Kitche Manito Jesus otuhnozowinink guhtuh tuhgo , megwach uzzhenint Kitche Manito giya Oōsemá ween ōnje .
Ween gagekemint , ekettowinink oguh nezhokumowân gagequanidjin , kokkinná mennoizzhewabizzewinun .

Kâdush kago , Kitche Manito omenáseen tebinowawizzewin , kâ pâpish menik knhnága chetukokeet , owâweendumowân ánowy che menát tebinowawizzewin , giya onejânisun che bemátizzinit , kâdush muhshe onejânississe .
Oguggiazhebumeándush neendinowamáguninánin giya omázhebumeán nōsenánin , me gá ōnje sâgitchewabinnáwât , otōshke uhbenoche-emewân , nánázh che bemátizzissigwâ .
Peterdush unneságáum , giyadush uhgew bazhek otoskenegamun , obeotittánâwândush jebagumik .
Me o-o mozhuk wâkoochetoeyán che totumun gâgineek quiuk che izzhewabizzeyán anosumit Kitche Manito , giya anosumit aninne .
Uhmutwaáskáwât tegowug kitchegumeeng , uhbetawetowât tebinowa otuhgutchewinewâ ; wanisshingig uhnungwug , uhgew kanowandumowinjig makuttawâg kushkedibikut gâgineek .
Onje kâween aninne neengemenigoose , kâween aninne neenguhgekimigoose , Jesus Christ koshá neengewâbundi-ik .
Magwouh uhge mutcheizzhewabizzeyunk mushkâwizzewin mutcheizzhewabizzewin tepákonegawinink uhnokemuhgut keowewáng owwe kushketomuhguk nebowin .
O-o guhgequawin neenduhnonigo che guhgequayán ( quiuk neendabwa Christ ōnje , kâ neenguhgenowishkese , ) keche guhgekemugwâ miátáwizzidjig mushkâwandumowinink tabwawinink .
Ween kunwandunk oguhgequawin Kitche Manitōn weowwinink iá giya ween Kitche Manitōn weowwinink iáwus me o-o wanje kekandumunk keowwináng uzzhiát Ochichâgwun gá meninunk .
Kago oweuh aninne tebinowa weow atuh oguh mennototunzeen , kokkinná aninnewug bakânizzinidjin giya oguh we mennototowâwân .
Tebishko ienandumōnk mámowy kago kache apetandágwukin papámandun kago , tuhbusandumōk keowewán tebishko uhgew tabusandágoozidjig , kago nebwâkâwandun kago keowwewân .
Máno kokkinná weesuhgizzewin , nishkâtizzewin , sheenganindewin , ōmbegizzewin , mutchegegetowin ningooche tuhbuhgittinegâta , kokkinná mutche enandumowin giya .
Neenge ezhichegâz che uhnoketumán meenwâjemowin , Kitche Manito otinuhnokewin gá menigoyán keenowâ ōnje che tabwatoyán Kitche Manito odikittōwin .
Oshtegwân wenizzissun mánishtânish obewi-ink ezhewâbishkânewun gonink ezhewâbishkâne ; oskezhikōn misqukkuna ishkotang ezhenágwutinewun ;
Kokkinná iuheen keenowâ ōnje , me eu kitche nebewâ shâwandágoozewin , nebewá megwach uzzhekettowât , che ōnje kitchetwâweint Kitche Manito .
Ween májit neweyâs , giya manequat nemisqueem , iá neowwink , neendiádush weowwink .
Otinnândush , neendabwatum , Neendogemám , keen Christ , Kitche Manito Oguisun , neendenandum , wâtakoshingebun ákeeng .
Ahwunjishdush anegōk mushkâwetágoosewug anoninjig kuhgequawât , otuhpeechigo bobokobetōnâwâ puhquazhegun , giya uzzhuhnumeáwât .
Kege sâgetōn quiuk izzhewabizzewin kege sheengandán mutche izzhewabizzewin , me eu ōnje , Kitche Manitōm , Kema nitōm , kegetotág che pâpenanemoeyun owushema azhe pâpenanemowât kewejetuhkewamágunug .
Jamesundush ogenesán John wekânisun uzzhowweshk ōnje .
Metágwietun kuhgepáche ieendotumowinun , bōchigo owushemá guhtuh uhnemutche izzhewabizzewug ;
Ween shânganemát wekânissun nisshewashkid , kekekandánâwâ nashewashkid kâ kago gâgega bemátizzewin ogegishkunzeen .

Gá eeshquâdush weessinnewât , Jesus otinnân Simon Peterun , Simon , Jona oguisun , nowutch innuh kesâge azhe ságeutwâ uhgew ? Otinnândush , á , Neendogemám , kekekandán sâgeinnán . Otinnândush usshum nemanishtânisanshemug .
Uhchichâg omenán bazhek aninnewun nebwâkâgegetowin , bazhekdush Uhchichâg omenán , kekandumowin .
Neezhink azháwâtdush Joseph nissetowwenátewug wekânisun Joseph anowamájindush weendumowâ Pharaoh che kekanemát .
Ween siágetōt bemátizzewin , nundowandunk che wâbundunk wanissheshingin gezhigutōn , máno oguh kunwandán ota nuhnew che mutche gegetosig , giya otōn wekâ che mutche gegetosig , kuhgianizzewinink ;

Kokkinná anishanâbag tiabwatungig , bazhekwuninne otaewân giya bazhekowun ochichâgowán ; kokkinná aninnewug otebinowawizzewinnewâ , kâweendush meatuh neendebanduhzeen ekettowug , kokkinná otiemewân mámowy tebanjegâtawun .
Kege weendumonenim , netam eu gá kekandumán , Jesus Christ ezhe ōnjenat kemutcheizzhewabizzewinenánin , azhebe-egâtagigo mazaniegunink .
Ween weowwink mikám mamándáwizzidjig omisquemewâ , giya anumeájig , kokkinná giya nasinjig ákeeng .
Miátáwizzidjigdush , ope o-o nōndumowât pâpenanemowug okitchetwâwetōnâwâdush Kitche Manito odikittowin menikdush gá guhgegininjig che gâgega bemátizzewât tabwatumōg .
Ween aketōt ono iuheen eketto , kagat onjittá bâbega neenduhkoshin ; Amen . Me tebishko be-ezhe tuhkoshinin Kitche Manito Jesus .
Ono iuheen neen wanje kekandumag azhewâbomeyag , uhtotumán me o-o totumōg Kitche Manito otinnuhwandewin máno keguh wejewigōnâwâ .
Kago ween miátáwizzingin totowâ kago mikowwâmik , wawekânisingin totowik .
Tuttebábig kago oweuh aninne keguh banájeigoosewâ kuhgianizzewinink ōnje , ono gata gegetowinun ōnje , ákeeng ezhetwâwin ōnje , kâween Jesus Christ ōnje .
Negân neendizzhegânje owwe otittumán kekinnowáchichegun che kushketoeyán atátink Kitche Manito aninunk ween Jesus Christ ōnje .
Ween gá buhgittinunk weow keenowint ōnje , che bemájeinunk kokkinná mutcheizzhewabizzewinink , che beneinunk ween weow ōnje , gá onábominjig anishanâbag che mennoizzhewabizzeyunk .
Kagat , kagat , ketenenim , ween bazindunk neen gegetowin , uhtabwatowât bi-ezhenázhuhonidjin , tuh gâgega bemátizze , kâtuh tuhgwâtuggittose , oguhbekán nebowin , ototitán bemátizzewin .
Weendush gaguhnozhit ozâwâ shoneá suhkáoon otián owwe tebánuk otanuh , sqândamun giya owâkiegunewung .
Tuh banátizzewug ope waquiág ; Omanitomewân me omissuttáwân , ogitchetwâwinewâ me otágutchewinewâng , ákeeng iuheen onáguttuhwandánâwân . )
Kago bâbega tuh we izzhewabizzisse ; konemá bâbega we kitche apetandunk weow , guhtuh pongeshin Mutche Manito obanáje-ewawinink .

Siágeinuhgook , ope wazhebeumonuhgook wawane tuzzhindumink ōnjittá bemátizzewin , enandágwut keche oshebeumonuhgook , che guhgâzominuhgook , wawane keche megâzoeyag mushkâwandumowin ōnje ningōtink gá menintwâ anumeájig .
Uhbe mowwenaogowât , ōnje e-e guhgekemâwât anishanâban ábejebáwindush tuhgomuggut uzzhekettowât Jesusun ōnje .
Omutcheizzhewabizzewinun gezhigōnk tuhgoshinomuhgutinewun , Kitche Manito okunwandumágōn omutcheizzhewabizzewinun .
Jesusdush minowâ betukoshin Canaink Galileeink , gá tuzzhe ozhetōt shomenâbo nebe ōnje . Bazhekdush kache ne gânandágoozit , oguisun ákoosewun Capernaumink .
Kago ketimishke kago uhnokewin , tuh gezheshawâtizzewug kechichâgowâng , uhnoketowag Kitche Manito .

Ween ánuh káwekâ kewâbomásewâ kesâgeáwâdush ween , ánuh kâ kewâbomásewâ nōngum ketabwatowáwâdush , ke pâpenanemōm , kâ tá kushketoseem che ekettōnk apeeche pápenanemowinewunk , mooshkená kitchetwâwizzewin :
Me o-o wanje kekandumunk uhgegishkowunk giya ween gegishkonunk , ōnje ogemenigonán Ochichâgwun .
Otossowin atta mooshkena shewâbo ; omooshkenabunáwândush skiebánun shewâbo ōnje , hyssopinkdush otussáwân skiebánun , otonininkdush otattowâwân .
Ween gá bemájeinunk mushkâwizzewin kushkedibbikut che ge banájeigoeyungobun , kegebenigonán otogemáwewinink siágeájin Oguisun :
Binná nekânissetōk ketenenim , náguttuhwanemik uhgew amemegonátizzidjig bapámanduhzigook o-o ezhetwâwin anduhzhekumunk metágwaetowikōg .
Uhgamá uhnokewin , umbasino uhnoketá , ketuhnokewininánin , weendush guhgequat , máno oguh tuzzhekân oguhgequawin :
E-e gezhigut kâween kago keguh kuhquajemisseem . — Kagat , kagat , ketenenim , wagotogwan ga nundotumowâwagwan ōsemá neenduhnozowinink , keguh menigowâ .
Anámiuhe eu wâkiegun eke otanuh muhmuzzenitchegâta uhnōch azhenágwuk sanegukin uhsineen , netam eu gá ozhisitóng jasper ; wiánekasink , sapphire ; akonissink , chalcedony ; akonewmk , emerald ;
Nōngum 'ow kakandunk ge ezhe mennototunk ōnjittádush we mennototunzik me e-e mutcheizzhewabizzit .
Gegetowin beōnzitágwut námátábewinink ekettōnk , uhnumeatowik Kekitche Manitomenán kokkinná keenowâ menik watoskenegameminág keenowâdush menik gwasag uhbenocheitōk giya kitche anishanâbatōk .
Onje omá kemánátwamin , ōnje kenundowandámin , keche uhgwuhniegâzoyung kewegewâmenáng gezhigōnk ōnje .
Máno kokkinná aninne , oguh wekekekandánâwâ otinuhnokewinewân , medush e-e che mennowânegoozit tebinowa weowwink , ezheka kâween ween bakânizzit ōnje .

Kishpin oweuh aninne enandunk weow , quiuk izzhewabizzissik ōshkenequan ōnje , kishpin ta ápeettizzit , kishpin ōnjittá we izzhewabuk anandunkigo máno tuhtotum , kâween mutche izzhewabizzisse , máno tuh wetegandewug .
Keguh sâgitchewabinnegowâg uhnumeawegumigōnk : kagat , tuh ochichesa pichenuk cheizzhewabuk , oweuh nesik , neenniandumeá Kitche Manito guhtuh enandum .
Minowaw bazhek kekinowâchichegawin newâbundán gezhigōnk , mámuhkâtuhkumik , neezhwâswa mezhinowag squâch neezhwâswa nebowinun otiánâwân ; uhgew ōnje Kitche Manito onishkâtizzewin mooshkena .
Jesusdush otinnân , kishpin gá mutche gegetowânan tebátotun , gá mutche ekettowânan ; kishpindush gá mennogegetowânan ; wagonan wanje bukkittaoeyun ?
Me giya keen aninnán , quiuk neendinowamágun , nezhokomow uhgew equawug wâtokowwidjig meenwâjemowinink , Clement , uhgew giya ayeezh anokeyâng , otuhnozowinewân mazaniegun obemátizzewinink átanewun .
Ogesegwabenánâwâ anumeájig mamándáwizzidjig omisquemewâ kemenágdush misque che minequawât , ōnje enandágoozewug .
Kâween pâpish ketá izzhewabizzissemin . Ahneen ga ge teyung , kegebonetomin mutcheizzhewabizzewin , áneen gayábe ga ge-ezhe kegebemátizzeyunk ?
Ahwase wiáwepun , kâdush áwisse , ween me e-e neezhwâchewât , ween me bazhek názhwâchejig , nisshewunnátizzewininkdush ezhá .
Ahneen o-o aketomuhguk mazaniegun ? sâgitchewabenik awâkânewit equa mámowy oguisun ; awâkânewit equa oguisun , kâween oguhtiáseen otawizzewin mámowy tabandunk weow equa oguisun .
Uhgew ōnjittá ga wewánuttizzidjig kuhgwadebanindewinink nuhgwâgunink pongeshinōg , nebená bátáizzhewabizzewinun , kuhgebátandumowinun , uhnew banátizzewât aninnewun .

Metoswadush ashkunug , wiábomutwâ áwase gagishkowâjig me uhgew ga sheenganemájig bashegwâtizzenidjin , oguh nisshewuhnájeán oguh peengwoshshâgitōn , oguh mejinâwâ oweyâsine oguh châgizzewâwân ishkotang .
Oweuhdush aninne sâgeát Kitche Manitōn , Kitche Manitōn okekanemigōn .
Wagonandush , owushema nuh kemennoizzhewabizzemin azhewabizzewât ? kâween ; kâ ningooche kegewâbundi-innenim kokkinná Jewug giya miátáwizzidjig mutche izzhewabizzewug .
Pezhekeensundush , otozheáwân ono gezhiguttōn , osáságewináwândush uhnew muzzenitchegunun , pâpenanemowugdush , gá totumowât tebinowa oninjewâng .

Ahnintdush aninnewug uhgew nasigosigwâ gá totumowât oninjewân ōnje , káween otá uhnumeatowâsewán Mutche Manitōn giya ozâwâshoneá muzzinineeg , giya shoneá , giya ozâwâbeek , uhsineen , giya metigōn ; uhnew wiábemuhgusinōn , nōndumomuhgusinōk giya bamosamuhgusinōk .
Onje kekekandámin menik ga ezhe gosittowungebun Kitche Manito keguhgâzománánig aninnewug , mizzhishuh kewâbunduhánáwâ Kitche Manito keowwenánin ; neendenandumdush qundigo kewábundiïgōm neowwenánin .
Magwaiuhe ketiáminábun giya keenowint kiut , magwouh 'zhizhewabizzeyunk mutcheizzhewabizewinink magwouh 'zhonejânissemigoeyunk nishkâtizzewin tebishkogo ánint bakânizzidjig .
Nebewá giya ekettowinun ieketto , ekettōnk , bemájeittizzook pukkawinikkook uhgew mache izzhewabizzidjig anishanâbag .
Kishpin weyâsemá bemátizzewin kenopenutumag keguh nebōm ; kishpindush Uhchichâgomá onje banájetoyag oweyâsemá bemátizzewin keguh bemátizzim .
Mazaniegun azhebe-egâtag akettomuhgut , owwagwan ga tabwa-anemágwan kâ tuh áqutchisse .
Netam aketoeyán megwech neendiná neen Kitche Manitomun Jesus Christ ōnje , keenowa kokkinná ōnje kemushkâwandumowinewâ tuzzhinjegâta anegoquág áke .
Neenkekandámin nekânissenátōk Kitche Manito uhge onuhgeminág .
Owushema tussink kago ápiche we keshawânotátig mamashqut : keshawâtizzewin tuh ōnje uhgwuhniegâtawun nebewá mutcheizzhewabizzewinun .
Opedush gá gezhowawât Italyink keguh enáshemin , Julius shemágunisshe ogemá Augustus otoskenegamun , Paulun mená giyadush ánint kepáquo-ōnjig , che unnekunwanemát .

Mosesdush Kitche Manito otoskenegamun otonuhgumonun onuhgumōnâwâ giya Mánishtânishans onuhgumōn , ekettōnk , Kitche apetandágwut mámuhkâtuhkumik ketuhnokewinewân , Kitche Manito Kache Apetandágoozeyun ; quiuk tabwawinewun ketizzhewabizzewin , Keen wagemákundowutwâ anumeájig .
Tebishko waskenegidjig uhbenohheug , nundowandumōk quiuk totoshábo guhgequawinink keche ōnje netáwigeyag :

Nenōndán gegetowin gezhigōnk uhguhnonigoyán , ozhebe-egan , tuhshâwandágoozewug nabojig Kitche Manitōn weowwinink nōngum ōnje , kagat eketto Ochichâgomá , ōnje unwabewug otuhnokewinewâng otuhnokewinewâdush onopenánigonáwâ .

Quiuk uhnumeawin quiuk izzhewabizzewin anosumeet Kitche Manito giya Oōsemá , me o-o , che mowwutisát , gáwusshizzidjig , giya shágáwidjig , okotuhgitowinewâng , keche ningooche che muhkuttawâsininik weow omá ákeeng .
O-o neendikit kago oweuh aninne keguh wiazhemigoose kuhgianizzewinink .

Kokkinná bamátizzidjig gezhigōnk giya ákeeng , giya anámuhkumik , giya uhgew kitchegumink ayájig , kokkinná giya beenjeiube ayâjig nenōndowâg 'zhekettowât , tuhshâwandágooze , tuh kitche apetandágooze , tuh kitchetwâwizze , tuh kitche mushkáwizze , ween námátabit námátábewinink , giya mánishtánishans gâgineek giya gâgineek .
Wiánckashkágatdush mezhinowa nōndágwitōn , kitche wudjew chiágetagin ezhenágwut kitchegumeeng apuhgitōng : ánintdush kitchegumme misqueeng , ezhenágwut .
Osâgitchewabenáwândush otanong , obuhbemosinnááwândush ; wâtokâzojigdush ogezekánâwân obeenzikkowâgunewân Saul ezhenekâzo oshkenowa ozittánink obuggittinánâwân .
Minowâdush , uhnumeatowik Kitche Manito kokkinná andussheyag miátáwizzeyag , megwetch enik Kitche Manito kokkinná anishanâbatook .
Onje ween ōnjebámuhguk weowink ōnje , emá weowink kokkinná kago ween guhtuh kitchetwâwizze gâgineek . — Amen .
Wiábuninikdush , John owábundán Jesusun , obeotissigoot , ekettodush , binná Kitche Manito omanishtânishansemun , akoonunk mutche izzhewabizzewin ákeeng .
Mushkâwandumowin ōnje , bisshegwâch equa Rahab , ká oge wejenebomáseen uhnew tiabwatunzinit ope watissigoot uhnew nandowâtonidjin innuhwandewinink .
Gamotishkid unishigo wanje takoshink , owwe nisshewunnájetát : me wanje takoshinnán bemátizzewin che iámowât , konemá owushema nebewá oguhtiánâwâ .
Neendizzhewabizzewininán gezhigōnk áta , emá azhe nundowâbeyán , nundowâbomungid gá bemájeinunk Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ keche tuhkoshink .
Eu ōnje shuhshâwanindig eu ōnje tebishko Christ gá ezhe shâwaneminunk Kitche Manito okitchetwâwizzewinink ōnje .
Otâpin uhgew , kezhetán uhgew mámowy , ōndinumow kago che gâshkebátumowât oshtegwânewâng ; o-o totumun kokkinná anishanâbag anetágawât guhgequawin tabwawinnewunzenōk keen giya quiuk tepákonegawin .
Ga ōsemint o-o gewetázhowin uhgew gáwetázhegâzosigook , uhgew quiuk bamosajig Abraham omushkâwandumowinink , chebwâ gewetâzhoōnt .
Tátewugdush , Matthiasdush bukkenága , weendush owejewân , asshe bazhekwunidjin anoninjin .
Ekettōnk , shâwandágoozewug , uhgew mánoweshâwandágoozidjig , omázheninnewugizzewinewâ giya uhgew omutcheizzhewabizzewinnewá kiátuttinik .
Me uhgew neezh olive-metigōg , neezh wâsâkoninjegunátigōn anosumeet Kitche Manito ákeeng batuhkisininegin .
Kushkandumōk , mowwik , ázhequag , kebápewinewâ tub gwakesin che omowwewineyag , kemennowânegoozewinewâ che gwakesink che okushkandumowineyag .

Siágeinuhgook , kago nopenutun kago eu mache izzhewabuk , quiuk izzhewabizzewin koshá nopenutumōk ; ween manoizzhewabizzit , Kitche Manitōn otinowamán ween macheizzhewabizzit , kâ owâbomáseen Kitche Manitōn .

Ogeotisigōn izzhewabizzewin , gewetázhowin kekinowâtizzewin omushkâwandumowin chebwâ gáwetázhoōnt , kokkinná tiabwatumitudjin táōsemigōn ánuh gáwetázhegâzosigook quiuk izzhewabizzewin , konemá giya weenowâ tuh tuhgwuhgindumowâwug :
Ween gá nabōt kâ gayábe mutche izzhewabizzisse .
Mozhuk neembabámewetonun neowwenáng Kitche Manito Jesus Christ onebowin , Jesus Christ , obemátizzewin konemá neenguh gegishkámin neowwenáng .
Kokkinná onundowâbundánâwâ tebinowa otiemene , kâweendush Jesus Christ otiemun .
Mushkâwandumowin ōnje , Sarah mushkâwandum che onejânissit , ápiche gá kekât me ope 'zhonejânissit , ōnje uhtabwatowât gá wâweendumágoojin .
Me o-o ōsemá otenandumowin , ween biezhenázho-ōt , kokkinná mázhit , kâ kago neenguh wunnittoseen , minowâdush neenguh onishkânán isquâch che gezhiguk .
Neenowintdush , bazhek wiátuh manito ; ween kokkinna kago gá ozhetōt , kege gegishkágonán , bazhek o-o Kitche Manito Jesus Christ , ween kokkinná kago wanje bemátuk , keenowint giya ween ōnje .

Timotheusdush uhge ōnjebát uzzhiáyag , uhge beotissheumint neenge betágonán mennoinnuhkumigut keenowâ ōnje , kemushkâwandumowinewâ kegeshawâtizzewinewâ , gâgineekdush kemennonáguttuhwanememin kewewâbomindush , giya neenowint azhewâbominág ;
Opedush tuhgoshink , ogemá tabanemát manishtânishun , keguhtiánâwâ wewoquân kitchetwâwizzewin wekâ ga banátussinōk .
Onje eu uzhenandumung , ápiche kebuhguhketágoozemin .
Uhgewdush nowokâtat áwase apetandágoozidjig , ge ezhichegâzo keche otâpenint che bánájeint , omutche tuzzhindánáwân uhnissetotunzikwâ , guhtuh banátizzewug tebinowa obegishkunutomewâ .
Kâween ween buhbámanemát katemákizzinidjin wanje ekettose , ōnjedush gamotishkid , mashkemoot otián , uhbemewetōtdush bánuhummowint .
Kekekandámin , ketabwatámin Kitche Manito sâgeinunk . Kitche Manito sâge-ewawin , weendush azhe bemátizzit uhsâge-ewat , Kitche Manitōn ogegishkagōn giya ween ogegishkowunk .
Uhgewedush sashwashkájig , ope nasint Stephen , Pheniceink ezháwug , giya Cyprusink , giya Antiochink , meatuhgo Jewun gagekemáwâjin kâweendush oweuh bakânizzinidjin .
Kitche Manito otizzhewabizzewin ezhe niándumink , kitche apetandágwut .
Menádush che megânát anumeánidjin , che buhkinowâtdush : mushkâwizzewindush mená , che mámázheát kokkinná azheweenzonidjin kokkinná uhnōch anwanidjin , kokkinná anishanâbag .

Wagonan e-e kitchetwâwizzewininan ope buhshunzhaogowizzeyag tebinowa kemutcheizzhewabizzewinewân ōnje , bakágo ketotâpenánâwâ ? kishpindush mennotumunne ōnje kuhgwâtuhgitoeyagdush , bakágo ketotâpenánâwâ o-o Kitche Manito azhe meenwandunk .
O-o ōnje ween ge ezhe ánekuhnotunk ōshke wâweendumágawin onebowin ōnje uhgew nandominjig otáiánáwâ wâweendumágawin gâgega bemátizzewin .
Ahneendush ga ekettoeyáng ? mozhuk innuh keguh mutcheizzhewabizzemin che bátienuk shâwandágoozewin ?
Giyadush mutche andágoozewin , kuhgepáchegegetowin , ya bisinnáchegeezhwawin , kâween o-o onissheshinzenōn ; owushema onissheshin , megwetch che enint Kitche Manito .

Neendenáb , neengewâbomádush nagwazit bazhekokashe : onozowindush uhnew bamomigoot nebowin , mutche ishkotadush onopenuhnigōn : mushkâwizzewindush mená keche ábetá minowâdush usshe ábetá menik che uhnewishkunk áke che nieshewat uzzhowwesk ōnje giya buhkuttawin giya nebowin , giya áwaseug ákeeng ōnje .

Me eu ōnje mushkâwandumowinnewun , konemá shâwantágoozewin ōnje , wâweendumátewin keche sōngum , kokkinná ehbenocheug ōnje , kâween ween atuh tepiegat tepákonegawin , keen giya tabwatunk tibbishko Abraham mámowy kōsinán ezhe tabwatunk ;
Opedush gá tepákonewât newebuhgittinnegōg ōnje kâ kago mutche izzhewabizzewin neenge mutche izzhewabizzisse .
Me e-e kâween ween nanduhwandunk kago , kâween ween giya pamabuttōt , ween koshá Kitche Manitōn owâbundi-iggoot shâwanjegawin .
Kago giya bisshegwâtizzissetá , ánint uhgew gá ezhe bisshegwâtizzewât , neezhtunnuh usshe niswa tasso metoswâk pongesinōg ningo geshik nebowât .
Neowinkdush nemikán minowâ bazhek tepákonegawin uhmegâtemuhguk tepákonegawin ayáyán neendaink owâkânegoeyán tepákonegawin mutcheizzhewabizzewin ayáyán neowink .
Me eu ōnje bonetotá Jesus Christ netam omeenwâjemowin umbasinno wewâweenga gezhetátá , kago weká totunzetá ga ositáwandumeigoeyunk , umbasino muskâwanduntá keche mikkowwoyunk Kitche Manito .
Kago oweuh aninnewun oguh pâpenanemigooseen , baká ságitchesuhginekanit keche be otezhit ; neembeá che tuhkoshink mámowe wekânissemág .
Ahneen anábuhtuk , nekânissetōk , aninne kishpin nemushkâwandum ekettōt , iásigdush uhnokewinun ? mushkâwandumowin innuh otábemájeigōn ?
Ahnintdush Jerusalemink andájig , ekettowug kânuh wuhowisse aninne wânissint ?
Magwouh uzzhekettōt , obugittinnámonuttowân , otinnândush , otâpenik Kitche Manito ochichâgwun .

Kâ kekekanduhzigwâ Kitche Manito quiuk otizzhewabizzewin , tebinowa otizzhewabizzewinewâ quiuk izzhewabizzewin owwe ōnje ozhetōnâwâ , kâween tuhbusse buhgittenuhzeenâwâ weowewân che otâpenumowâpun Kitche Manito quiuk otizzhewabizzewin .
Ween tiabwatunk Kitche Manitōn Oguisinne ogegishkán ekettowin tebinowa , ween tiabwatunzik Kitche Manito kuhgenowishkeá , ōnje kâ otabwatunze ekettowin Kitche Manito gá iekettōt tuzzhemát Oguisun .
Kagat , kagat , ketenenim , ween tiabwayanemit , uhnokewinun , anunnokeyán me giya ween ga innunnokeet , owushemadush kitche uhnokewinun tuhtotum ōnje nōs eendizzhánun .
Kuhgekim uhnoketâgaweninnewug keche tabwatowâwât tebinowa tabanemigowâjin che niandumeintwâ kokkinná kago che ázhetawetunzigwâ .

Mozhuk uhkowábig uhkowâbomik ápiche konemá oweuh aninne oguh wuhnetōn Kitche Manito osháwanjegawin , konemá kago ga wesuhgegetashkágoon che ositáwandumeigoeyun nebewádush guhtuh ōnje nisshewubnátizzewug .
Minowâ giya , mozhuk keche mennotuzzhemint guhtuh izzhewabizze , ono áqutchink ayánidjin , e-e keche pongeshinzik uhguttátuhkumik Mutche Manito onuhgwâgunink .
Kokkinná andussheyunk kemenigomin shâwanjegawin Jesus Christigo ananeminunk .
Ahneka mezhinowadush osegwabenán otomotansim kitchegumeeng , nabōt aninne omisqueem ezhenágwutinne , kokkinná bamátizzidjig kitchegumeeng nebowug .
Kâween atuh uhwâbomigoeynn che uhnokeyun , andotumowât uhgew niandumeájig aninnewun , tibishko azheuhnoketowut Christ ketá izzhewabizzim , Kitche Manito ga ezhe meenwandunk izzhewabizzig ketaewâng ;
Quiuk keche enandumag ; eu kishpin mutche tuzzheminágwâ tebishko macheizzhewabizzingin , konemá tá águtchewug , ōnje uhguhgenowishkewát uhtuzzhindumink , kemennoizzhewabizzewâ Christ ōnje .
Me o-o giya otenandumowin , biezhenázho-ōt , kokkinná uhgew wiábomájig oguisemán , tiabwatowâjigdush tuh gâgega bemátizzewug ; neenguh onishkâbenádush ishquâch e-e gezhiguk .
Babegadush Kitche Manito omezhinowamun obuhkittawân ōnje , kâ okitchetwâweáseen Kitche Manitōn . Mosandush ogittumogōn nebodush .
Megwach ketenáná Kitche Manito Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ ōsun , ōsemá o-o shâwanjegawin , ōsemá kokkiná mennowânegoozewin .
Ahnint ogegooshquaetánâwâ o-o , ningooche ge-ezháwug uhpapáguhgebázetágoozewát ;
Kâ neendá águtchetunzeen Jesus Christ oguhgequawin Kitche Manito omushkâwizzewin che ōnje bemátizzewât kokkinná tiabwatungig Jewug netam , giyadush Greekug .
Kâ oweuh aninne otá ozhissittoseen bakânuk ezhetwâwin , meatuh nōngum ázhiá gá ozhissittōng , ween Jesus Christ .
Mánodush kokkinná andussheyag keguh sâgeáwâg tebishkogo azhesâgeittizzoeyag kokkinná giya wewemág oguh tabwatowâwân onâbamewân .

Keenowâdush gá neboyagobun kemutcheizzhewabizzewinewâng uhgewetázhegâzosewag keweyâsewâng ōnje ween kege benigowâ bemátizzewinink mámowy , kegemennoweshâwanemigowâ kokkinná kemutcheizzhewabizzewinewâ .
Kago buhtubbenungan megewawin gagishkumun , eu gá menigoeyun ōnwâchegawinink ōnje , giya okewanzeug oninjewân uhbuhgitinumōkwâ .
Newawbundahndush ōshke gezhik , giya ōshke áke , netam gezhik netam giya áke májámuhgut , kâ kago minowâ kitchegume tuhgosinōn .
Gâgineek mennowânegwandumōk .
Ono gezhigutōn aninnewug oguh nundowâbundánáwâ nebowin , kâdush oguh mikunzeenâwâ : oguh nundowandánâwâ che nebowât nebowindush oguh ozhemigōnâwâ .
Kishpin tabwa andumunk Jesus uhgenebōt minowâ giya uhge onishkát , ketá ezhe tabwa-andámin uhgew wâzeengwâmájig Jesusun , Kitche Manito onishkât minowâ .
Owwagwan ga ekettogobunan , Jesus , Kitche Manito Oguisun , Kitche Manitōn ogegishkowân , giya ween ogegishkágōn Kitche Manitōn .
Che gezekowag gata aninne ween banátizzit mutche esandumowin ōnje ;
Neen ishquandam ; oweuh aninne shábooshkowwit , ween tuh bemátizze , tuh peendega giya ságáum oguh mikân ga tuzzhe wesenint .
Bemosinnuháwug , giya táskebonáwug , kuhgwadebanemáwug , uzzhowweshk ōnje nánáwug , papákewáchetowug manishtánisshewyán giya kitche manishtânisshewyán agwewâjin , ketemágizzewug uhguhgwâtuhgeintwâ ;
Kishpin kekanemag ween quiuk izzhewabizzit : kekanemáwâ ween quiuk izzhewabizzinit Kitche Manitōn ōnje nege .
E-e go azhe guhgekimeumint Kitche Manito ekettōnk , kege onuhbe eninnim che wâsashkumowagwâ miátáwizzidjig che ōnje bemátizzewât anishanâbag ga áquo ákewung .

Kokkinná neengewabenámin gámotukin mutcheizzhewabizzewinun , kâween uhbamosang Kuhgianizzewinink , kâ newiazhemásenán oweuh , Kitche Manito odikitowinink , uhmizzhishshowwenágwitoeyáng quiuk tabwawin neenkekandumonánánig kokkinná azhewabizzeyung , anosumeet Kitche Manito .
Me ōnje ween Kitche Manito ogitche nikkânink gá ōnje ōnishkât ōsemádush gewâweendumágōn , che ezhenizzhuhumágoot ochichâgwun me o-o biezhenázhuhunk o-o wiábundumag omá .
Oshke aninnedush , kegebezikowâwâ , ween gá ōshkenánágwitchegâzōt kekandumowinink tábishko azhenágoozit gá ozheigoojin .
Jesusdush n'wândunk o-o , eketto , o-o ákoosewin kâween nebowinnewunzenōn uneshâ Kitche Manito ogitchetwâwizzewin , Kitche Manito Oguisun che ōnje kitchetwâwizze .

O-o guhgequawinink Kitche Manito omennoizzhewabizzewin mizzhishshowinnegâta , mushkâwandumowinink ōnje nánázh che mushkâwandumink azhebe-egâtag quiuk azhewabizzidjg mushkâwandumowin tuh ōnje bemátizzewug .
Weendush otunne májenán metigōn wâtuzzhesuhguhgáquo-ōnt ezhádush ewâda aninne weendibbegagunink ezhenekâtag ; Hebrewdush inwawin Golgotha ezhenekâtag .
Papuhkân kege ezhe mámenigomin menittewin , shâwanindewin kishpin we tebátotumunk , umbasinno tebátotuntá , mushkâwandumowin gá menigoeyunk :
Netam áwase missbebezheeng ezhenágooze , ánekáchdush áwase , pezhekeens ezhenágooze , akonissewât áwaseug anineeng enutangwa , akonewewât áwase babámisat megize ezhenágooze .
Iyângwâmizzig quiuk che ezhe bamosayag ; kago ween kagepátizzidjig azhewabizzewât , nabwâkâjigigo azhewabizzewât ;
Kâween pekinōnk enandágoozissewug Jewug giya Greekug ; mego uhow Kitche Manito kokkinná tabanemát , oshâwanemándush oweuh nanândomigoojin .
Ween Christ waquâsink tepákonegawin quiuk izzhewabizzewin kokkinná tiabwatungig .
Kago ween kago sunnuhgeno kago , máno kokkinná uhnumeawinink uhmegwachuhweint Kitche Manito weendumowik Kitche Manito azhenundowandumag .
Binná ono iuheen me o-o iásheiggoeyunk keche kekandumunk , keche nundowânduhzewunk o-o tinnowun mutche iuheen , gá nundowandumowâjin .

Obákenándush e-e weembápeká ningooche waquiásinōk ; ōnje puhquanadush emá weembápeká , tebishkogo uhpuhquanag ningekoozegunink ; gezis giya nuhnuhgezhik kushkedibekisen uhpuhquanag e-e weembápeká ōnje .
Kago oweuh aninne ogùh ezhe wiazheáseen wekânisun kago ; ōnje Kitche Manito oguh buhshunzhawân kokkinná andotuminidjin , gá ezhe weendumonángebunigo kiut .
Eu ōnje kishpin oweuh aninne Christun gegishkágoot , ōshke bemátizze ; gata iuheen ungowun , binná kokkinná iuheen ōshkeiewunōn .
Osemá osâgeán oguisemá , okekinnoumowândush kokkinná aeendotunk ; oguhwâbunduhándush , owushema kitche unnokewinun apetandágwuk ono , che mámukkâtandumag .
Ween gamotitukko , kago minowâ tuh gemotisse , tuh uhnoke menik kashketōt oninjeeng wanissheshink uhnokewin , konemá tá kushketōm kago keche menint katemágizzit .
Kezhá ozhissetōn wegewamink keche uhbeyán : ōnje neendenandum neenduhnumeawinun ōnje keguh menin .
Kago keguh ōnje papámewinegooseen ono papuhkânuk ezhetwâwinun onissheshin ōnje mushkâwitchegâtag mennoizzhewabizzewin kâween weyâs ōnje ningōt gá inábuhtusinōk , ánuh ge betuzzhekumink .
Kenundowaneminenim , nekânissetōk , ketá kekanemáwâg uhgew wâjeuhnokeminágook anewishkonágook Kitche Manitōn ōnje , guhgekeminágwâ ;
Onegeiggōndush , ekettowug ono ekettowinun ōnje ogosáwât Jewun , Jewugdush gegezhowâwug oweuh aninne Christ ezhe wenint tuh sâgitchewabenán uhnumeawegumigōnk .
Keenowint gáwetázhegâzojig ketáwemin ketuhnumeatowânán Kitche Manito Kechichâgonáng kemojegandámin Jesus Christ ōnje kâween ketuhpanemosemin weyâsemá .
Me o-o oguhgequawin che tabwa-andumunk Oguisun Jesus Christ otuhnozowinink , giya che sâgeitink mamashkōt ga ezhe guhgekimenunk .
Newâbomá minowâ bazhek áwase ákeeng ōnje mokeet ; neezhewun otashkunun mánishtânishansink ezhenágwutinne , mutche genabeekōnkdush ezhe gegeto .
Nekânissetōk kago uhbenocheing izzhewabizzekago , kenissetotumowinewâng ; kemutcheizzhewabizzewinewâng uhbenocheing izzhewabizzik , kenissetotumowinewângdush eninneeng izzhewabizzik .
Oweuh nuh andussheyag kuhgwâtuhgito ? tuh anumeá , oweuh nth mennowânegoozit ? tuh nuhgumo nuhgumonun .
Me eu ōnje ōmbenumōk oninjemán agotagin , giya kittegomág nánuhmizzidjig .
Kishpin nuhnândumag Oōsemá , ween tabákonunk kokkinná andusshewât aninnewug otuhnokewinewân , kâweendush oweuh owushema otuhpetanemáse , we kuhbikumōg menik omá ga iáyag che kotájeyag ;
Ketá enandám che betoeyag ; ge eeshquâ iyekumag Kitche Manito otenandumowin keguhtianâwâ wáweendumátewin .
Musakauwandumowin nandowandumink iuheen wiábunduhzewuk wanje kekandumunk .
Me o-o wanje ekettoeyán , nemushkâwetōn neendikittowin kago ezhe bamosakago ánint miátáwizzidjig azhe bamosawât okuhgebátizzewinewâng onáguttuhwandumowinewâng ;
Kago oweuh aninne keguh tebákonigoose , weseneyun giya minnequayun , gamá kewekoongawegezhigutomewân , giya otōshkegezisomewân , giya ketunwabegezhigutomewân .
Me wanje iáwât anosumisinik Kitche Manito onámátábewinink , otuhnumeawegumigōnk : ween námátábit námátábewinink oguhwejewân .
Pauldush nesândewa ogitchenázhowe oppuggizzo , eketto kago sunnágandun kago : kiábe bemátizze .
Eu ōnje máno neendenandum kokkinná kago uhgew ōnje gá onuhgiminjig konemá giya weenowâ che iámowât shâwandágoozewin eu Christ Jesus weowwink mámowy gâgega kitchetwâwizzewin .
Uhnumekotátig mamashqut che ojeendeyag che keshawânotáteyag . Keguh mennoinnowandim kokkinná menik Jesus Christ tabaneminag . Amen .
Buhgitinumátig mamashqut keowwewânche gosag Kitche Manito .

Keenowâdush ween siágeinnuhgook , ōnje kekekandánáwá ono iuheen kiut , ângwâmissig , konemá giya keenowâ ningooche keguh ezhe suhgábeginegōm kushkedibikutōnk miázheninewugizzit ōnje , kepongeshinōmdush tebinowa kemushkâwandumowinewâng .
Wewemátook , buhgitinumowik keowwewân tebinowa kenâbamewâg quiuk azhe izzhewabuk Kitche Manitōng .
Uhgew machetotungig genuhumow anosumewât kokkinná ánint konemádush tá kotájewug .
Umbasinno , kago tepákonittesetá minowâ , náguttuhwandumōk , koshá o-o kago oweuh aninne oguh uttowâwân wekánisun kago che bezogashinit .
Kitchetwâwizzewin mennoizzhewabizzewin , innuhwandewin tuh izzhewabiz kokkinná aninne quiuk izzhewabizzit , Jewug netam , giya weenowâdush miátáwizzinidjin ;
Otátaánâwân kitche ishotang , otozhindánâwâ anábuhtuhgánig uzzhoweshk ; neennuhmizzewinink ge sōngitchegâtane , sōngeta-awug mekâtewinink , otánuhwâwân menissinōn miátáwizzinidjin .
Náágutchdush , kago oweuh aninne neenguh megooshkârheiggoose , ōnje neenkushketōn neowwink Kekitche Manitomeán Jesus otisshichegawinun .

Kitche mezhinowadush ototâpenán gitche ásin besebochegunábekōnk ezhenágwutinne , obuhkobewabenán kitchegumeeng ekettōnk , me o-o tebishko eu kitche otanuh Babylon ga ezhe binnewabinegâtag kitche mushkâwizzewin ōnje kâwekâ minowâ guhtuh mikunzeen .
Keenowâdush , siágeinnuhgook , sōngetōg keowwewân kemushkâwandumowinewâng , uhnumeáng Kitche Manito Ochichâgōnk ,
Kago azhewabuk o-o áke izzhewabizzekago : gwakandumōk kenáguttuhwandumowinewân konemá ketá kekandám wanissheshink mánoizzhewabuk Kitche Manitá otenandumowin .
Neen nōndás neenduhpetandágooz anoninjig kâ neendá apetandágoozisse anonint che agoyámbán , ōnje uhge mutchetoumán Kitche Manito otuhnumeawin .
Kago sâgeto kago áke , gamá iuheen ákeeng atagin : kishpin oweuh aninne siágetojin áke ōsemá osâge-ewawin ká ogegishkunzeen .
Eu ōnje kâween ketá tepákonegase owagwanigo wiáwewunnan , oh aninne ; kishpin tepákonut oweuh kebátándán tebinowa keow , ōnje tapákonumun tebinowa keow ketieendotum .

Opedush James , Cephas giya John uhgew wiyâswanemōngig ope wiabundunk shâwanjegawin mánigoeyán , nemenigōg mámowy giya Barnabas , che mámowyitteyáng che we guhgekemungidwâ miátáwizzidjig uhgewedush che ezháwât gewetázhowawinink .

Shemágunishug gá suhsuhgáquowâwât Jesusun ototâpenánáwân agwidjin , onewyuggittōtōnâwân babazhek shemágunishug naningōtink zhuttag obeenzikowâgun giya . Obeenzikowâgun mizze wieguttinne ishpemink giya tubbuhzheesh .
Kuhgekemutwâ bakânizzidjig , kâween nuhgwuhnuh keguhgekindizzose ? Kagekemut , aninne kago kemotekan , keen innuh ketá kemōt ?
Wagonan ! kâween nuh kekekanduhzeenâwâ keowwewân Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun otuhnumeawegumik áwunk , ween gagishkowwag uhnew Kitche Manito gá meninnág ? kâween ketebanindizzoseem .
Christ osâge-ewawin keguhgânjenázhuhogomin ōnje o-o anandumunk , bazhek nebotumowat kokkinná ōnje ; kokkinná ge nebowug ;
Me ōnje , manobemátizzidjig wekânissetōk , ánint tabandumag gezhigōnk ezhetwâwin náguttuhwanemik anonint giya Kekitche Sáságewitchegaweninnemenán ween Christ Jesus ;

Kokkinna iuheen kewâbundi-innim andotumánigo totumag ketá bemájeáwâg nanumizzidjig che kunwandumag Kitche Manito Jesus odikittowinun aketōt , owushema onisshesnin oweuh aninne che megewat otiemun ween oweuh che menigoot .
Wetegandewin mámowy quiuk izzhewabuk giya nebágun benut , bashegwâtizzidjig , wâmzzidjig , Kitche Manito oguh tebákonán .
Nowwuggegâbowwe , beenjeiuhedush 'zhenábit , owâbundánun , bebuhgewyán neginōn uzzhuttanik , kâweendush peendegase .
Gegetowinun uhnemikewun wâsumowinun kitche nuhningishkâ áke wekâ azhewabusinōk aninnewug áko tuhnuhkewât ákeeng azhe kitche nuhningishkâg áke .

Ozitángdush neempongeshin uzhuhnumeatowug . Neendigdush , tuhtebábin , kago e-e totunkan : neen keejuhnoketágawenine bazhek kekánissewâ uhgew ayájig Jesus odikittowin ; uhnumeatow Kitche Manito , Jesus odikittowin me eu Ochichâgomá mamándáwizzewin .
Kitche Manito ogewâbunduhán Ochichâgwun ; Uhchichâgomá kakandunk kokkinná iuheen , kagat Kitche Manito kiátojin .
Wawane mennowâbomik mennowânegoozewinink Kitche Manito ōnje mennonáguttuhwanemikōg uhgew azhewabizzit azhewabizzidjig .
Uhbenocheittōk tabwatowikōg kenegeigowâg , kokkinná kago , me o-o niandumeint Kitche Manito .
Me o-o nemennowânegoozewinenán , ōnje neenkekandámin mennoizzhewabizzewin uhgosunk Kitche Manito , Kitche Manito oshâwanjegawin ōnje , o-o ketizzhewabizzewinenán ákeeng keenowâdush ōnje .
Ween ayát neenguggequawin , giyadush kunwandunk , ween neensâgeik weendush siágeit nōsun oguh sâgeigōn , neen giya neenguh sâgeá , neenguh wâbunduhándush neow .
Ono iuheen nebwákâwinink azhenágwuk enandumowin anumeawinink , tuhbusanemowinink , uhpapámanduhzeeng weow kâween kago uhtuhgoosinōk quiuk izzhewabizzewin che niandumitōng weyâs .
Otuzzhindánâwâ ketizzhewabizzewin anumeawinink , wawane bemewenintwâ quiuk keguh izzhewabiz :
Kuhgepáche guhgwatwawinun metágwietun , kekandumink uzzhozhetowât kekândewinun .

Kokkinnádush keenowint mizzhishuh keskezhigonáng , kewâbundámin Kitche Manito ogitchetwâwizzewin , tebishko wâbomochichâgwunink , me e-e tebishko azhe gwakenágoozeyunk kitchetwâwizzewinink giya minowâ kitchetwâwizzewinink , tebishko Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun andinit .
Kânuh owushema Jesus Christ omisqueem ( ween giágega bemátizzinit Ochichâgwun ōnje sáságewitchegat e-e weow , ) kânuh tuh ōnje benisinōn ketenandumowinewâ che uhnoketowag Kitche Manito ?
Eu ōnje Kitche Manito ogemenán tibbishko gá ezhe mezheumint uhnew tiabwatuminidjin Jesus Christun wagonan gá ōnje kushketoeyámbán ánowy mutchetotowwug Kitche Manito ?
Kago osittáwanemá kago Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun , ween ōnje ketuhkokewussiggōm che betōng gezhigut kunwandágoozewin .
Kunwandun eu ōnje o-o azhemenigoeyun , azhe nōndumun , mushkâweminjemeen , ánwanindizzoon . Kishpin uhkowâbizzissewun keguh otissigōn ope ananduhzewun che otissinán .
Uhbenocheitök , kago oweuh aninne keguh wiazhemigoosewâ , ween quiuk azhewabizzit , quiuk izzhewabizze tebishko Kitche Manito quiuk azhe izzhewabizzit .
Siahgeinuhgook , kago kokkinná tabwa-andun kago guhgequawinun , kuhgwadebandumōk , Kitche Manito keche oguhgequawinit , ōnje kitche nebewá kagenowishkidjig manitowâzojig geságáumōg ákeeng .
Me wanje kekandumonigoeyag aninnewetōk wekânisseōk , menowweshâwandágoosewin mutche izzhewabizzewin ōne , 'ow aninne kagekimegoeyag ;
Squawchdush , nekânissetōk , mojegandumōk Kitche Manito ōnje , kâween gwach suhnágusinōn che oshebeumonuhgook násáb eu , káweendush ningōt keguhtotágoseenáwâ .
