Oweuh aninne buhkutat , andát tuh wesene , keche ōnje mowōnjeittissewag keche mutche totumag . Ahnint iuheen pánemá takoshinán neenguh ezhichega .
Pilatedush otinnân uhnew , otâpenik tebákonik , ketebákonegawinnewâng . Jewugdush otinnáwân , kâ ezhe tebákonegawinnewunzenōn che nissint aninne ?
Nundowandumōk owushema apetandágwuk menittewin , owushemia azhe wanissheshink kekekinnoumonim .
Me uhtowuh sáságewitchegaweninne ga ge iyáwungobun , quiuk manito manoizzhewabizzit , benizze , wátokásik mache izzbewabizzinidjin : owushema apetandágoozitdush gezhik apetandágwuk .
Kokkinná kago neendá totum Christ ōnje , ween sōngeit .
Me 'ow Kitche Manito otenandumowin ketá mennoizzhewabizzim , keche bonetoeyag bisshegwâtizzewin :
Mozhuk uhnumeág , ukkowâbig , keche uhnumeáeyag megwetch che ekettoeyag .
Mosesdush oshemo , n'wândunk o-o ekettowin , miátáwizzedush e-e ákeeng Midian , andusshe iáwât neezh oguisun .
Aninne kâween tá wuhwewuhquaose , ōnje Kitche Manito ogitchetwâwizzewin ezhenágooze ; equadush aninne ogitchetwâwizzewin .
Máno Kitche Manito otinowandewin keguh ogemákundágōnâwâ ketaewáng , eu azhe nundomigoeyag bazhekwunk weowwemá , megwech enandumōkdush .
Quiuk izzhewabut , ween kokkinná kago gá ozbetōt , ope nebewá oguisemán kachetwâweát ween bemáje-ewatche quiuk ozitōt kokkinná kago okuhgwâtuhgitowin ōnje .
Ahnde wanjemuhguk nundobunewin kemegâtewinewâ ? kâween innuh kemázheninnewugizzewinewâ kenaguttuhwandumowinewân ōnjemuhgusinōn ?
Tebahtochegawta , bisshegwâtizzewin uhtuhgook , magwaiuhe uzzhiáeyag ; kâwekâ e-e tinnouh bisshegwâtizzewin tuhgoosinnōn miátáwizzidjig , bazhek kechewewit ōsun wewinne .

Kâween kago kuhgwadebanindewin ketotissigoseenâwâ , meatuh azhe iyotissigowât uhnochigo aninnewun ; Kitche Manito quiukkooze , kâween enanduhze owushema enik keche guhgwadebanemigooseyag keguhtenanemigoosewâ enikigo azhe kushketoeyag ; mámowy kubgwadebanemigowin oguh ezhissetōn ga ezne wemáshkumag , konemá me ga ōnje kushketoeyag che guhbikkumag .
Neenkekandán o-o ge májáeyán nanezânizzidjig mieengunug keguh chakishkágowâg che we banájeáwât anishanâban .
Me e-e giya azhe sōnganemoeyâng keenowâ ōnje Kitche Manito otuhnumeawinink , ketenandumowinewân giya kemushkâwandumowinewân , kokkinná kemutchetotágowinewân kekotuhgittowinewân ;
Kâ oweuh aninne wekâ wâbomáseen Kitche Manitōn , kishpin ságeitteyunk kege gishkowânán Kitche Manito osâge-ewawin , kemooshkenashkágomindush .
Paul , anonint , ( kâween ween aninnewun ōnje , kâween ween aninne otenandumowin ; Jesus Christ ōnje , giya Kitche Manito ōsemá ōnje , ween gá onishkânigoojin uhge nebōt , )
Náguttuhwanemik Jesus , gá ezhe megânigopt macheizzhewabizzinidjin keche iyakoozissewag keche nikâbunduhzewag kenágutuhwandumowinewâng .
Kishpin gá ketegánegowungwan mámowy onebowinink giya keenowint ga izzhewabizzeyunk gá izzhewabizzit uhge ábejebát :
Minowâdush eketto , pâpenanemoyeuk miátáwizzeyag mámowy otuhnishanâbamun .

Binnah Ochichâgomá gegeto , buhguhketágooze , eu opedush náágutch chegiuhe ánint tuh buhkawug mushkâwandumowinink uhwiazhemigowât kagianizzinidjin ochichâgomán Mutche Manitōgdush otisschichegawinewân ;
Guhgekim uhgew keche tubbussebuhgitinumowât weowwewân tabanemigowâjin , che tabwatowâwât otogemámewân , che gezhetáwât kokkinná mennouhnokewin ,
O-o kâ enanduhzewug keche kekekandumowât , Kitche Manito odikitowin ōnje , gezhigōn ge ōnje ozhichegâtawun kiut , giya áke , uhságebemuhkebun nebeeng giya anámebeeng :

Onje Christ ningōtink ge kuhgwâtuhgito mutcheizzhewabizzewin ōnje , quiuk azhewabizzit , quiuk azhewabizzissig ōnje , konemá ketá buhgumewinegonán Kitche Manito uzzhiát , uhge nesint weyâsink , tuhtátuhbeetdush ochichâgōnk :
Owushema tá ge onissheshin kekanduhzikwâbun quiuk izzhewabizzewin , uhgamá gá kandumowât , nayáb ezhe gwaketáwát uhnuhgutumowât guhgequawin gá menintwâbun .
Binná keguhgâzomineme , nekânissenátōk , Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ otuhnozowinink , keche metágwaetowagwâ kokkinná wekânissemág mache enosajig ; káween ween azhe guhgekiminág .

Onje bazhekigo ōnje mutche izzhewabizzewin gá ōnje takoshinomuguk ákeeng , nebowin giya , mutche izzhewabizzewin ōnje , me nebowin kokkinná bamátizzidjig wanje otissigowât ōnje kokkinná mutcheizzhewabizzewug :
Mewug uhgew mushkâwandumowin gá ōnje mámázheájig ogemáwinink , quiuk izzhewabizzewug , otiánâwâ wâweendumátewin , ogebuhumowân mishebezheen otōninne ,
Neembátáigomin , kâweendush neennuhgunnegoozemin , neen neeswabinnegázomin , kâdush neembanájeiggoozissemin .
Bisshegwâtizzetōk aninnewetōk , equatōk , kekekandánâwâ nuh innuhwandewin ákeeng me omiátáwizzewin Kitche Manito ? owwagwan ga innuhwandumogwan áke me Kitche Manito omiátáwizzemun ?
Opedush gá une shábooshkumowât Phrygiaink , giya Galatiaink , opedush ochichâgomá gagâzomigowât Asiaink che guh gequawât ;
Quiuk azhewabizzidjig nebwâkâwin , me o-o azhe gegeowât ; kago anámeta eketto kago , owwanan gezhigōnk ga ezháwan che ekettoeyag ? ( che be-ezhewinit Christ ishpemink ōnje ; )
Netam miáját owwe segwabenunk ákeeng otomotansim , ápiche kitche ákoozewin opongesinotágōnâwâ uhgew aninnewug ayájig áwase okekinowâchebe-egâzowin uhgewdush anumeatungig otizzhenágoozewin .

Opedush watâpenunk mazaniegun , newin áwaseug , giya usshenewin neezhtunnuh okewanzeug pongeshinōg anosumeet mánishtânishans , andusshewát nōndágomutchegunun otiánâwân giya ozâwâ shoneá omotiápekōnsun uhmooshkenawun manomágwukin , anumeájig otuhnumeawinewâ ono .
Owwagwan anandumogwan Jesus , Christ áwit , Kitche Manitōn ōnje nege : owwagwandush siágeágwan Osemán otá ságeán Oguisemán giya .
Kago nundowanduhzetá kuhgepách sōnganemowin , kago nuhnishkeittissetá kago guhgâwanindissetá .
Kago nuhnibbekimákan okewanze , menno guhguhnōzh tábishko waōsingin , ōshke aninnewugdush wawekânisingin .

Máno quiuk guttuh izzhewabut ketizzhewabizzewinewâ magwaiuhe miátáwizzidjig : ōnje , nōngum azhe mutchetuzzhemikwâ tebishko mache izzhewabizzidjig , konemá ope wâbundumowât wanissheshingin ketuhnokewinun , oguh kitchetwâweáwân Kitche Manitōn mowwuttissintwânin .
Tuzzhindumink ochânemandumowin , nemutchetotowâbuneeg ukko anumeájig , uhtuzzhindumink tebákonegawinne quiuk izzhewabizzewin kâwekâ neengemutchetotunze .
Okuhquajemándush , áneen ope uhnojemopun ? ekettowugdush , pichenágo , názhwâswa tepiegunak ákoosewin ogenuhunigōn .

Jewugdush ōnje magwouh ozhetáwât kubbekosa wekoondewin , kâ oweuh tuhge ogotasininne unwabewinnegezhigut , ( e-e unwabewinnegezhigut kitche gezhigut , ) okuhquajemáwán Pilateun , okâtun cheboquowunnaowint , ningoochedush keche ezhewenint .
Eu ápe Pilate neendáwâch che bugittinnát anandum . — Jewugdush ázhequawug , ekettowug , bugittinnut wuhow aninne , kâween Caesar keguh anowamáse . Oweuh wagemákâzojin , mutche totowân Caesarun .
Kago ketaewân tuh ishkissinzenōn ketabwayanemáwâ Kitche Manito , tabwayanemisshig giya neen .
Kago ween kago keguh sageiggooseenawâ kemiátáwizzemewâg ōnje , weenowâ uhgew keche ōnje kekandumonintwâ che banátizzewât keenowâ weendush ween che ōnje bemátizzeyag , Kitche Manito ōnje .
Kâween kegeonábomisseem , neendush kegeonábominenim , ketánoneninim che meneweyag , euedush meneweyag gâgineek tuh atta ; owwagotogwan ga nundotumowagwan ōsemá , neenduhnozowinink , keguh menigowâ .

Mushkâwandumowin ōnje , Abel owushema omennosáságewinán Kitche Manitōn , Cain azhe sáságewinát , ge quiukquandágooze , ge mennoizzhewabizzit , Kitche Manito otuzzhindán , eu sáságewitchegawin : mushkáwandumowin ōnje ánuh ánuhwe genebo kiábedush gegeto .
Mahno aninne keguh enanemigonán , Christ oguhgequaweninnemun áweyunk , kanowandungig gámotuttinik Kitche Manito otiemun .
Uhnungwugdush , ishpemink pongeshinōg ákeeng , tebishko kitche shomenâtig azhe pongesink shomenun , ope gwashquâshidjin kache notingin .
Me eu ōnje , siágeinnuhgook , ozhindumōk sáságewenintwâ muzzeninneeng .
Kago mutche izzhewabizzewin keguh uhnewishkágooseenâwâ , uhnewishkumōk mutche izzhewabizzewin che mennoizzhewabizzeyag .

Totow che kunwandumowât ono iuheen , guhgâzōm anosumeet Kitche Manito kago oguh tuhzhinduhzeenâwân guhgepáchegeezhwawinun , kâween ningōt tá ōnje mennoizzhewabusinōn uhnishigo che banájeintwâ uhgew n'wândungig .
Bazhew ezhe wequeeg Kitche Manito uzzhiát , giya ween bazhew tub ezhe weque uzzhiáeyag , benitōg keninjewân , mache izzhewabizzeyag benitōg ketaewân , keenowâ neezhwayug ayenandumag .
Kishpindush bazhek owushema apetanemag , bazhek apetanemag , kemutchetotám , kebanájetōm tebákonegawin .
Kâween Kitche Manito kegeigoosenán che wenisseyunk , meatuh che mennoizzhewabizzeyunk .

Kitche Manito onishkâtizzewin mizzhishshowenágwut , gezhigōnk ōnje , uhnishkâtizzetowât kokkinná , menik mache izzhewabizzinidjin ween , uhgew manjimenungig guhgequawin ; bakishdush mutche izzhewabizzewât .
Siágeinuhgook , umba ságeitetá : Kitche Manito sâge-ewawin ; kokkinná siáge-ewat , Kitche Manitōn ōnje nege , okekanemán Kitche Manito .
Ween áketōt wâsayág iá , sheenganemátdush wekânisun kushkedibikutōnk iá , nánázh nōngum .
Kishpin mutchetuzzhemigoeyag Christ otuhnozowin ōnje , keshâwandágoozim ; ochichâgomán ogitchetwâwizzewin Kitche Manito ketotissigōnâwâ ; weenowâ omutchetuzzhemáwân , keenowâdush kekitchetwâweáwâ .
Opedush gá suhgeninjenát , oweendumowân Kitche Manito gá totowât miátáwizzinidjin , Paul oguhgequawin ōnje .
Oweuh nuh andussheyag kekekandánâwâ nuh mutchetotumán ? quiuk ánuh tabwayán , áneen azhe tabwatowwissewag ?
Omutcheizzhewabizzewinewân , giya omázheninnewugizzewinewân , kâ minowá neenguh mikwandumowâseeg .
Kokkinná kago kekitchetwâweigowâ kokkinná gegetowinink kokkinná , giya kekandumowinik ;
Kekuhquajeminenim nekânissetōk Neenkitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ ōnje giyadush Uhchichâgemá osâge-ewawin ōnje uhnumeatumoweshig , uhnumeatowik Kitche Manito .
Anishanâban oguhnonigōn , ekettowug Mutche Manito ketiáwâ ; owwanan papánundonissik ?

Uhnew Kitche Manito gá ezhenázhowâjin , che sáságewitchegat mutche izzhewabizzewin ōnje , che kekandágwuttinnik quiuk otizzhewabizzewin , uhgew mutche izzhewabizzewinun gá gegishkungig che mennoweshâwandágoozewât Kitche Manito oshâwanjegawin ōnje ;
Oskenegeshug giya shemágunisshe ogemág nebowwewug emá , gepotiwawug kuhkuhzhan gá potiwawât ( kissenánink ) owwuzzowugdush ; Peterdush owejegâbowittowân owwuzzōt .
Pezekumōk kokkinná Kitche Manito otushwewin , konemá eh me ga ōnje shágozekumag Mutche Manito okuhgianizzewin .
Peterdush otinnân , Neendogemám , áneen ga ezhe kushketosewânan che nopenuhnisinán nōngum ? neenguh buggitinán neembemátizzewin keen ōnje .
Kitche Manito otinowandâsowin , eu kashketosink keche kekandumink , me ga ōnje kunwandumink ketaewân giya kenáguttuhwandumowinewân Christ Jesus ōnje .
Megwetcheweánán Kitche Manito Kōsenán uzzhioyung ; kenuhnibbekemándush aninne , uzzhioyung , ween Kitche Manito azhenágoozit gá ozhichegâzōt .
Kâweenigo kokkinná bisshegwâtizzidjig omá ákeeng , giya sáságizzidjig , giya wiazhingashkidjig , giya uhnōch kago manitokajig , kishpin e-e totumag ketá ságuhám ákeeng .
Kagat neenge-enandum tebinowa neowwink keche izzhe wabizzeyán keche mutchetotowug Jesus Nazarethink onozowinink .

Oskezhigowân mooshkenanig bisshegwâtizzewinewin , ká kushketosewug we bonetowát mutcheizzhewabizzewin ; owiazhemáwán nánuhmizzinidjin ochichâgomán ; otaewân kokkinná mooshkenawun sáságizzewin nánáguttuhwandumowin ; kuhgianizzidjig uhbenocheug .
Ween koshá anonint , kâ odebanemáseen , manishtânishun , wiábomát mieengunun takoshininit , onuhgonándush manishtânishun , oshemōt ; mieengundush onowutumán , osiswanázhowândush manishtânishun .
Eu ōnje , siágeinuhgook nekânisetōk , máno kokkinná aninnewug tuh kezhekâwug che nōndumowât , sebiskâch che gegetowât , sebiskâch che nishkâtizzewât .
Me tebishko Kitche Manito gá enákonegat uhgew gagequajig tá ōnje bemátizzewug guhgequawin .
Neen takoshin wâsayá ákeeng , ween tiebwayanemit , kâween kushkedibbikutōnk tuh táse .
Náágutchdush , Jesus , kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk , omikkowân , otinnândush , binná , kenojim ; kago minowâ mázheninnewuggizzekan , bōch owushema minowâ keguh izzhewabiz .
Kokkiná kago keshawâtizzewinink guhtuh izzhewabut .
Kishpin sâgeyag , kunwandumōk neeenguggequawin .

Tuttebábig kago ágoonwatowâ kago ween gegetōt ; wanowâ wiágoonwatowâjig uhnew gá gegetonidjin akeeng , kâ kushketosewug weozhemowât , áneen ga ge ezhe ozhemoeyunk kishpin gwaketowunk , ween wanje gegetōt gezhigōnk ?
Magwouhdush chebwâ kakanemut Kitche Manito kege uhnoketowág uhgew manitowissigook .
Keenowâ netam , Kitche Manito oge pusegwindenán Oguisun Jesusun , otezhenázhowân che be owwe shâwanemenág keche ukkowabenumonág kokkinná kemutche izzhewabizzewinnewâ .
Neenowinddush newetokámen kokkinná ono iuheen gá ieendotunk Jewug otuhkemewâng giya Jerusalemink ; ween gá nesint ge uhgoojindush metigōnk .

Ketuhnumeatōn , nekánisstōk Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ otuhnozowinink ōnje , kokkinná andussheyag mámowy tibbishko mego ga ekettoeyag , wekâ che buhkawenittissewag : awane mozhuk keguh mámowy ittim tebishko che enandumag che bazhekwunk ketebákonegawinewâ .
Keenowâdush ningōtink gá miátáwizzeyag kemutche uhnokewinewán ōnje nōngumdush kegetotágowâ che innowamag .
Ozhindun oshkenowa náguttuhwandumowin ; nopenuttun quiuk izzhewabizzewin , mushkâwandumowin keshawâtizzewin , innuhwandewin , mámowy uhgew wiáweninjig Kitche Manito otuhnozowinink , beneta-awinink .
Kishpindush weje ábejebámag Christ , nundowâbundumōk ono iuheen ishpemink ayágin Christ uhnámátábit Kitche Manito ogitchenikâng .
Netam mezhinowâ nōndágwitōt , mikquumenánewun , mámowy ishkota misque genigowesin , ákeengdush oppuhgitchegâta ; akonisewât metigōg châgizzowug , kokkinná wazawushquágin muskoosewun châgitawun .

Ekettowugdush , kemegwecheweininneme Kitche Manito kache Apetandágoozeyun , nōngum ayágin giya kiut ayágebun , giya pichenuk ga iyágin , ōnje kege otâpenumázoon kekitche mushkâwizzewin , kegeogemákundum .
Jesus guhnonándush , otinnân , kekandumumbun , Kitche Manito omegewawin , kekanemutebun wiáwit , nandotumōk che menuhut , ketá ge kuhquajemá , ketagemenikdush , bamátuk nebe .
Ope Christ ween kebemátizzewininán nâgoozit ; medush giya keenowâ , mámowy keguh mokeem ogitchetwâwizzewinink .
O-o oshebe-egâta che tabwayandumag , Jesus veen Christ , gâgega bemátizzit Kitche Manito Oguisun ; uhgewedush tiabwa-andungig , gâgineek tuh bemátizzewug otuhnozowin ōnje .

Keenowint Kitche Manito mámowy , ween kakanemát Kitche Manitōn kebezindágonán , ween kakanemásig Kitche Manitōn , kâ kebezindágoosenán . Me o-o wanje kekandumunk quiuk tabwawin giya kuhgenowishkindewin .

Ketuhgizzewug keweekoongawinink keskeshawâtim winink , ope wâjewekoongamikwânin , uhshundizzowât uhkeche jissigwâ : ánuhqutōn nebe anduhgoosinōk , puhbámáunk notin ōnje ; metigōg uhmenewewât naboquatagin , uhmenewewisigwâ nezhink nebowug , moniegâzowug ojebekâwewât ;
Obenáwândush wiákoozenidjin mikunâng , nebáguning obemeiussáwân Peter uhgowâtashink che bemeuhgowâtashkánâwân ánint .
Owushema kokkinná , andussink kokkinná kago , otâpenik buhkááquân mushkâwandumowin , e-e ōnje keguh kushketōm che nuhgânumag kokkinná miázheninnewizzidjig webewân .
Menik andotumag , quiukigo che enandumag totumōk , Kitche Manito ōnje , kâween ween aninne ōnje .
Konemá oweuh , tuh bisshegwâtuhkumik izzhewabizzit , gamá guhgepáchieendit Esau izzhewabizzit ween ningooshkumowin weyâs , gá onje átáwat kokkinná azhe tebandunk .
Azhequawugdush minowâ kokkinná ekettōnk kâween wuhow aninne , Barrabbas koshá . Barrabbas gamotishkid .
Tuhbuhbuhgitinumágawug , tuh gewushquawug , tuh kitche apetanemowug , oguh sâgittōnâwâ mennowânegoozewin , owushema ga ezhe sâgeáwât Kitche Manitōn .
Eu ōnje , Kitche Manitōn kitche ishpemink oge ezhe ōmbinegōn ogemenigōn onozowin owushema apetandágwut kokkinná onozowinun .

Kâween neenge nopenuttunzemin kuhgianizze ádissokânug , ope kakandumoninág Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ omushkâwizzewin otuhkoshinowin , kege wâbundámin tebinowa keskezhigonán ogitchetwáwizzewin .

Giya go kokkinná omazaniegunink uhtuzzhindumink ono iuheen , ánint kago kitchesuhnágut owwe nissetotumink , uhgew kekinnoumowâsewinjig mashkâwanduhzigook , ogwakebetōnáwâ tebishko azhe gwakenumowât puhkân ozhebe-egunun tebinowa uhbenátowât weowwewân .
Opedush Barnabas giya Paul n'wândumowât o-o obego betōnâwâ agwewâjin , magwa anishanâbagdush uhpi-ittewug ázhequawât , ekettowugdush ,
Neendikit ween Jesus Christ sáságewitchegaweninnewe uhnoketunk gewetázhowin Kitche Manito otabwawin ōnje , keche sōngetōng o-o wâweendumátewin gá ezhe wâweendumowintwâ osemág .
Oweuh aninne andussheyag neenduhnumeá enandum tákobetosigdush otanuhnew , wiazhindunk tebinowa ota , otuhnumeawin kâ ningōt inábuhtusininne .

Kunwandumōk ekettowin aninnuhgook ; otoskenegamemá , kâ owushemá apetandágoozisse otogemámun apetandágoozenit ? kishpin gegooche bátáewât , keguhgooche bátáiggowâg , kishpindush gekunwandumowât neendikittowin , oguh kunwandánâwá kedikittowinewâ .
Jesusdus otinnân Jewun tabwa-anemigoojin , nuhguttunzewag neendikittowin keenowâ neendoskenegamug iáwim kagat .
Kitche buhkuttawindush , ototissiggōnâwâ Egyptink , giya Canaanink , giya kitche kotugittowin , nōsenánigdush kâ kago omikunzeenâwâ ga mejewát .
Neenkitche pâpenanim makowugwâ keenejânisug quiuk izzhewabizzewât Osemá azhe guhgekiminunk .
Kishpin oweuh we bumeásig tebinowa tabanemájin , kekinowâch , ono tebinowa owegewâmink , otágoonwatán mushkâwandumowin , owushema mutcheizzhewabizze , azhewabizzit 'ow tiabwatunzik .
Umbasino , bazbew ezhe we quetá quiuk ketainánin mushkâwandumowinink , mutcheizzhewabizzewin che ge seábáwuhchegâtag ketaináng keowwenánindush che gesebeginegâtag bánágumik nebe .
Genōndumōg atuh ween kiut ukko machetotowweyumintebun nōngum babáezheguhgequa mushkâwandumowin banájetopun ukko .
Me ōnje ketenenim , che otâpenumag weyâs , che ōnje mennobemátizzeyag : kâween pâpish bazhek kenesissewâ tuh pongesinzenōn menik andussheyag .
Kege kuhgwâtuhgito , kege be , kege uhnoke neenduhnozowin ōnje , kâ kege wunemikowwese .
Guhgekim kakâjig aninewug , che uhnissátizzewât , che pezânizzewât , che tebuhmanemowât , che sōnguninik omushkâwandumowinewân , keshawâtizzewinink , beowinink ;
Magwouh aninnewug kago kekanduhzikwâ kâween Kitche Manito onáguttuhwanemigoosewân ; nōngumdush kokkinná aninnewug oguhgâzomán che ánwanindizzowât .
Jesusdush gá tuzzhe suhsuhgáquo-ōnt cheegeiuhe nebowwewug Jesus ōgeen , ōgeendush wetiggikkoone giya Mary Cleophas wewun giya Mary Magdalene .
Beenzikowâgun gá geendábeginegâtag misgueeng otuhgwin ; otuhnozowindush Kitche Manito Odikittowin ezheweenjegâtane .
Tuttebábig , kago eu , kewânuhkewinewâ guhtuh ōnje bezogashinzewug uhgew nánuhmizzidjig .
Onjittá oge onishkânán ge nebonit , kâwekâ tuhbegishkuhnuhnese , o-o gá ekettōt , keguh menin David quiuk oshâwanjegawin .
Eu gezhigut , keguh kekandám beenjinnuh nōs keche iyáeyán , keenowâ giya neembeenjinnuhwânik keguh iám neen giya kebeenjinnuhwánewâng neenguh tiá .
Kunowandumowuk oguhgequawin me wanje kekandumunk uhkekanemung .
Me wanje eninnuhgook , kemázheninnewuggizzewinnewâng keguh nebōm . Oanje tabwatunzewag neen áweyán kemázheninnewuggizzewinnewâng keguh nebōm .
Newâbomá 'ow equa kewushquabeet anumeájig omisquemewâ ōnje , giya uhgew Jesus Christ otuhnumeawin wanje nuhninjig omisquemewâ : opedush wiábomug neen kitche mámuhkâtandum .
Kekekandánâwá náágutch ope wâshâwanemigoozit ge gooshquanegâzo kâ ningooche omikkunzeen ga ezhe gwakandungebun ánuh ogenundowâbundán gegizebeeng .
Kuhgissheguhnonittewug anishanâbag tuzzhemint ; ánint ekettowug , quiuk izzhewabizzit aninne , ánintdush ekettowug , kâween ; owiyazhemán anishanâban .
Kitche Manitodush oninj owejewegōnâwân kitche nebewádush tabwatumōg , Kitche Manitōndush uhbezindowâwât .
Azheumintigo Kitche Manito keche ezhe buhgitinumáng neowwenánin meenwâjemowinink , me azhe gegetoeyáng , káween ween uhniandumeint aninne , aniandumeint , Kitche Manito ween kagwadebandunk otaemán .
Megwach neendenánán Kitche Manito ween máninunk shágooche ewawin Neenkitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ ōnje .
Weendush quiuk shágâwit ketemágizzit buhgitinumowât Kitche Manitōn weow mozhuk uhnumeát nebádibbik giya gezhiguk .
Kiut kâwekâ , kago kegenundotunzeem neenduhnozowinink ; nundotumōk keguhtiánâwâ , kepâpenanemowinnewâ che mooshkenat .
Binná keen uhnoketweâganinne , nundōmigoeyun ? kago papámandunkan ; kishpin kushketoeyun we getishkekun .
Uhgew uhmewug uhgew bakânitojig weowwewân , weyâsemá enandumowin azhewabizzidjig , kâ Ochichâgosewug .
Nemámuhkâtandum , kitche wiebuh puhkawinag , ween gá nundominág Jesus Christ oshâwanjegawinink bakânuk meenwâjemowin uhnázekumag :
Nopenuhnitig innuhwandewinink anishanâbatōk mennobemátizzewinink kâ oweuh aninne otáwâbomáseen Kitche Manito , eu bwá izzhewabizzit .
Otinnândush kitchenikâng , enuhkuhkákayá nábequânink puggish ussub ; keguh mikám : otuhpugginnáwândush , kâdush okushkeásewân wewekobinnáwât , azhe bátieninnit kegoiun .
Gewetázhegâzowin , kâ ningōt inâbuhtussenōn gewetázhegâzoseengdush kâ ningōt inâbuhtussenōn , meatuh kunwandumink Kitche Manito otebákonegawin .

Ween kashketōt owwe guhgequat máno tuhguhgequa : ween mágewat , wawane , tuhmegewago che enandunk , ween nâgânizzit , máno oguh tuzzhekán : weendush shâwanjegat , máno tuh shâwanjega wawane che enandunk .
Otinnândush uhnew , kânuh che ōnje otissinág Kitche Manito Ochichágwun aquo tabwatumag ? otinnáwândush , kâweká nenōnduhzemin che tát Kitche Manito Ochichágwun .
Kishpin oweuh aninne tabwatunzik neendikittowininán azhenázhuhumáng o-o mazaniegunink , nánáguttuhwanemik 'ow aninne , kago wejewâ kago , konemá tá águtche .
Binná , nōngum o-o neendikit nekânissetōk , weyâs giya misque kâ Kitche Manito otegemáwewinink tá peendegamuhgusinōn ; bagishkunuk kâ tá benojemomuhgusinōn .
Kago eu ōnje uhnokekago gabánátuk , eu atuh wanje gâgega bemátizzink , eu Aninne Oguisun ga menik , ween Kitche Manito ōsemá gá ukkokewuswâjin .
Kenundotumágam , kâdush ketiáseem ōnje kâ quiuk kenundotumágaseem , keweiōm kemázheninewugizzewinewâng .
Megwach ekettoeyag gâgineek kokkinná iuheen ōnje , uhnew mánigoeyag Kitche Manito ōnje Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ otuhnozowinink ;
Tibishko Abraham azhe tabwa-anemát Kitche Manitōn , uhginjegâtanedush quiuk izzhewabizzewinink .
Otanuh kâween onundowanemáseen gezisōn , giya tibbike gezisōn , che sâgâseganit , ōnje Kitche Manito ogitchetwâwizzewin owâsashkán , Mánishtânishans me wiásashkunk .

Keenowâ kâ weyâsemáng ketiáseem ; Uhchichâgománg ketiám kishpin eu izzhewabizzeyag , Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun kegegishkowâwâ . Kishpin oweuh aninne , gegishkowâsig Jesus Christ ochichâgwun kâ odebanemigooseen .
Giya weenowâdush kishpin mozhuk ágoonwatunzigwâ tuh uhgogeáwug ; Kitche Manito okushketōn keche uhgwuhgeát minowâ .
Kâ kago kuhgianizzewin mikkunzeem otonewáng : kâ ningōtono ezhe mutchetotunzewug anosumisink Kitche Manito onámátábewin .
O-o ketá tepájemotōn o-o azheweendumowât mutche enandumowin neenduhnumeatumowâg nōsug Ogitche Manitomewân neendabwaandum kokkinná azhebe-egâtag mamándáwizzidjig ōnje ,
Kago oweuh aninne mazenumowâ kago , kago , meatuh , che sáságeitteyag , weenowâ siágeittidjig etabwatánâwâ tepákonegawin .
Aninnewugdush châgizzowug kache gezhetanik omutcheetánáwâ Kitche Manito otuhnozowin , ween anewishkunk ono nebowinun , kâdush ánwanindizzosewug keche kitchetwâweápun .

Uhsinne wâkiegunekâta kitche apetandágwut kitche ishpá , ussheneezh metoswa tusinōn squândamun uhnew ishquândamun ussheneezh metoswa mezhinowag iáwug , onozowinun ozhebe egâtanewun weowwewâng , uh me ono onozowinun asheneezhwawânuhgizzidjig Israel onejânisun otuhnozowinewân .
Christ ogetebáogonán uhnanibbekinjegâzoeyunk tebákonegawinink , uhge nuhnibbekinjegâzōt keenowint ōnje ; ezhebe egáta , tuh nuhnibbekinjegâzowug kokkinná metigōnk ga uhgoninjig .
Kege nōndám , gá ezhe bemátizzeyán Jewug otizzhetwâwinewâ , apiche neengemutchetotán Kitche Manito otuhnumeawin , neengenisshewuhnájetōn .
Otuhkonándush uhnew bebámissat mutche genabeek , 'ow okewanze genabeek , 'ow Mutche Manito giya Satan , otuhkobinán metoswâk tosto kekenonowin .
Bazhekdush aninne , Simon ezhenekâzo , kiut cheessukkeegobun ukko eu otanonk , anishanâbandush Samariaink , keche izzhewabizze che enanemigoot .
Konemá neendá kekanemá , giya mushkâwizzewin otábejebáwin , mámoweittewin okotuhgitowinink , onebowin azbeasgwutinik keche ezhenágwuk neenebowin .
Kago oweuh aninne kuhgatin ezhinekatowâkan , kago otâpenunkan ánint bakânizzit aninne omutcheizzhewabizzewinun : kunwandun keow , che benizzeyun .
Meendemoeyayug giya guhgekim , tuh wemenowizzhewabizzewug ; kago unishâ oguhwe mutchetotowâsewân oweuh ; kago oguh minnequaseenáwâ shomenâbo , wanissheshink mozhuk tuh ezhe guhgequawug .
Ween wâteganduhát mennototum weendush wâteganduhásig owushema mennototum .
Aketōnkigo izzhewabizzig , kâween atuhgo che nōndumag ; kago wiazhindun kago keowwewân .
Ono iuheen gá eeshquâ izzhewabuk , babámosat Galileeink : kâ wepeendegase Jewug andánuhkewât , ōnje Jewun owwe nesigōn .
Keenowâ ketebanemigowâ , ween Jesus Christun , ween Christun , ween Kitche Manito gá ozhittonunk nebwâkâwin , giya quiuk izzhewabizzewin , giya beneittizzowin , giya ápanemowin :
Náágutchdush , nebe ōsegenán kesebegewinágunink , omáje kesebegenumowân otoskenegamun ozitáne , ogegewândush seengwaoon e-e takobezōt .
Newekooche nissábuneeg anishanâbag uhnumeájig kiuttákobinugwâ giya kepáquowugwâ , niyazh aninnewug giya equawug .
Me papukkân wiuggeittewât tuzzhemáwât .
Usshumikōg nangowawânuhgizzidjig wâjewenágook Kitche Manito tabanemájin , uhkowâbomikōk kâween ōnjittá enandumag atuh kâween ween bejenizzewinink ; quiuk tebinowago che enandumag ;
Mázánowawin nebowin , mutcheizzhewabizzewin ; mushkâwizzewin mutcheizzhewabizzewin , tepákonegawin .

Binná , anoninjig ketuhnokewinewâ uhgew gâshkishungig keketegânewân otebáumágowinewâ , eu manjemenumowagwá kekuhgianizzewinewâng ázhequamuhgutōn ; omowwewinewân giya uhgew bashkooshegajig beendegamuhgutinewun Kitche Manito Sabbaoth otowwugán .
Eu ōnje opemaiuhe buhgitinumōk , kokkinná mázheninewug izzewin , kokkinná kuhgianizzewin , kokkinná guhgâwanindewin , kokkinná mutchegegetowinun ,

Wewemá onâbamun otebanemigōn , tebákonegawin ōnje ga áquo uhbemátizzit kishpindush onâbamun ge nebonit quiuk izzhewabut che wetegamát minowá oweuh , kishpin anandunk , meatuh Kitche Manito otebákonegawinink .
Uhgew gá wuhnisshingig tabwawinink , ekettōnk ábejebáwin ázhia ge kuhbekosa ; ogwanuhbewabinánâwâ ánint omushkâwandumowinewân .
Jesus Christ ōnje gewetázhegâzowin kâ ningōt inábuhtuhsinōn , giya gewetázhegâzoseeng kâ giya ningōt inábuhtuhsinōn , meatuh mushkâwandumowin , unnokemuhgut sâgittewinink .
Opedush wawane gá guhgekemint : gebe izzhewabizze uhkushketōt che bemájeát kokkinná tabwatágoojin .
Nōngumdush neentuhzhindán o-o , anumeájig mowōnjeittewât shoneá gá ezhe menugwâ anumeájig Galatiaink che totumowât , me giya keenowâ aninnuhgook .
Wewemág , buhgitinumowik kenâbamewág keowwewân tibishko azhe buhgitinumowag Kitche Manito .
Opedush Jesus otinnân , neen wâsayá áke : ween ga nopenuhzhit kâween kushkedibbikutōnk , tuh bamosase ; wâsayá bemátizzewin oguhtián .
Siágeinnuhgook , kunwandumōk ekettowinun Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ anonáiin gá ekettowât kiut ;
Kâween aninne oninjeeng anoketowwâse , che nundowandungebun kago ween koshá mágewat kokkinná bemátizzewin giya buggittinnámowin , kokkinná giya kago ;
Kishpin tabwatumunk aninne odikittowin , Kitche Manito odikittowin owushema apetandágwut , me o-o Kitche Manito odikittowin ogetuzzhemát Oguisun .
Pezekonittizzōk Jesus Christ , Neenkitche Manitomenán , kago nianemowinekakago mutcheizzhewabizzewin .
Mushkâwandumowin ōnje , Jericho otanuh , gá ōnje pekooshkâg Israel onejânisun ope neezhwâswogwun gá babámosawât emá .
Kitche Manitodush , kitche nebewá uhnokewinun enuhnone Paul oninjeeng ōnje .
Jesusdush otinnân , kagat , kagat , ketenenim , owwagwan miázheninnewuggizzegwan ween mázheninnewuggizzewin oguhowwâkâniggōn .
Siágeinuhgook , Kitche Manito azhe ságeinunk , ketá ságeittemin giya keenowint .
Kegekekandumōzh bemátizzewin , ga ezhe bemátizzeyán keen ga onje mooshkena pâpenanemoeyán keskezhigōnk ōnje .
Nánázh che takoshinán , mozhuk kunowâbundun mazaniegunun , che guhgequayun guhgequawin .
Neenkotuhgitomin aetowwiuhe , kâweendush neenkushkanduhzemin , newuhwanandámin , kâweendush neembuhbuhnátanduhzemin .
Ahnintdush uhgew biápishemajig , ekettowug uhgew aninnewug mooshkenashkágoonâwa ōshke shomenâbo .
Eu wâkiegun wanje ozhichegâtag jasper eu gá wâkiegunekang , bizzhisshik ozâwâ shoneá eu otanuh , tebishkogo bánuk wâsachegunábekōnk azhenágwut .

Neezhwâswa mezhinowag beságáumōg uhnumeawegumigōnk neezhwâswa inápinawinun otiánâwân , wiábishkânik bebuhgewián negin otuhgwinâwâ okákegunewângdush ozâwâ wâ shoneá ogitchepizzoonun ogitchepizzoonâwân .
Shâwanemuk uhgew kemutchetotonágook , shâwanjegag , ago kekâwetunkago .
Ozâwâbekōnk ezbenágwutinewun ozittun , tebishko chiágetagin kitche ishkotang ; otinwawin matwaáskágin inwawane .
Neengetuzzhemág uhgew ketuhnozowin , ōnjittá neenguh tuzzhemág ; sâgeittewin gá sâgeun weowwewâng tuhiáne , giyadush weowwewâng neendiá .
Ween gá muhmanowanemásig onezheka Oguisun uhge buhgittenát , uhge ōnje nanit kokkinná keowinnánin áneen ga ge ezhe menissinowunk unishá kokkinná iuheen ?
Gá ezhe weendumonágwâ tuhtáwug ga pâpenōtungig squâch uhgew ōnjittá ga n'wâpenutungig tebinowa onáguttuhwandumowinewân manito wunzinik .
Kágo kitchetwâwizzekâzokan magwaiuhe , kishpin kitchetwâwizzekâzoeyun , kâween kenetáwigittoseen ojebeek , ojebeek koshá keen kenetáwiggeigōn .
Kâween eu ōnje , uhtebandumán , kemushkâwandumowinewâ , ōnjedush kenezhokumoneme , che mennowânegoozeyag : mushkâwandumowin ōnje , ketōnje nebowwim .
Binnahdush bazhek aninne , Bethanyink , Martha giya owetiggikoon Mary ototanowewâ Lazarus ezhenekâzo wiákoozit .
Eu ōnje , ween biábápetōt ; kâween aninnewun obábápeáseen , Kitche Manitōn obábápeán , ween máninunk omenno Ochichâgwun .
Me o-o ga ōnje kekandumag quiuk Kitche Manito oguhgequawin , andusink guhgequawinun azhe guhgequang Jesus Christ ge takoshin ákeeng , Kitche Manito áwe , 'zhezhe guhgequang :
Uhgew giya aenábundungig , owenetōnâwâ weyâs , osheeagandánâwâ keche tebanemintwâ omutche tuzzhemáwân nâginizzinidjin .
Oguh ozhindán mutcheizzhewabizzewin , tuh we mennototum : oguh nundowâbundán mennoinnowandewin che nopenuttunkdush .
Kishpin mozhuk mushkâwandumag , mushkâwegábowweyag che nundowandumag meenwâjemowin eu gá nōndumag eu kokkinná gagekemintwá anámiuhe gezhigōnk ayájig , neen Paul gá ezhe guhgequayán .
Medush azhe muhmowât ásineen we bemosinnuháwat ; Jesusdush gázo , ságáumdush , kitche uhnumeawegumigōnk , nowwiuhe uhne ezhá uhne guhbikowât .
Keguh bezikowâ ōshke aninne uhnew Kitche Manito gá ozheájin quiuk izzhewabizzewinink .
Omá me uhnumeájig obeowinewâ ; omá 'ne zhiáwât kanowandungig Kitche Manito oguhgequawinun giya Jesus omushkáwandumowin .
Kitche Manitodush otonishkânán ánuh ge nebonit .
Neen nemennokunowanemág manishtânishug : menno kunnowanemát manishtânishun omenán obemátizzewin owwe bemájeát manishtânishun .
( Kishpin gá nōndumowagwan Kitche Manito oshâwanjegawin eu gá menigoeyán keenowâ che ōnje sháwandágoozeyag :
Aninne tiabwatunzik meenwâjemowin , ningōtink uhgamá neezhink ge eeshquâ guhguhnonut , nuggush ;
Jewugdush getâshkeittewug , minowâ ono ekettowinun ōnje .
Ween tiabwatágoojin otuggokewussán , Kitche Manito uhtabwat .
Eu ōnje siágeinnuhgook , ōnje kenundowâbundámin uhnetinnowun , kezhisshowwissik konemá keguh mikág innuhwandewinink keche ketuhgizzissewag .
Squawchdush , nekânissetōk , uhnumeatumowweshináng , Kitche Manito odikittowin uhwânuhkemuhgut keche kitchetwâwitchegâtag azhewabuk keenowâ :
Onje neenkekandámin , ween gá ábejebáát Kitche Manito Jesusun , me ga ábejebáinunk giya keenowint Jesus ōnje , me ga ōnje wejegâbowitonáng .
Oweuh nuh andussheyag ákoozit ? oguh nundomán nâgânizzinidjin uhnumeawinink ; oguh uhnumeatumowâwândush ; keche nuhmuhkonint pemeta , Kitche Manito otuhnozowinink :
Opedush nemetunnuh anduswo kekenonowuggizit ototissigōn , otaink mámenonandum , owwemowwuttissat wekânisun Israel otuhbenoche-emun .
Wuhow aninne Jewun oge otâpinnegōn otágenesegōndush shemágunisshug negewejewág owwe bemájeug nōndumán Romanewit ,
Kokkinnádush e-e otanuh nisshewunátandumōg , gá otâpenáwâtdush Gaiusun giya Aristarchusun Macedonia aninewun owejewâbuneen ukko Paulun papámátizzinit , kokkinná mámowy uhpi-ittewug kochewinink .
Kâ kewetabwatowâsewâ quiuk manoizzhewabizzit ; nashewashkiddush kegenundomáwâ che buggittinint ;
Kâween pekinōnk otenanemáseen enanemenunk giya keenowint , uhbenittowât otaewân che mushkâwandumowât .
Tuhguh , aninne tuh náguttuhwanindizzo , chebwâ mejit e-e puhquazhegun giya chebwâ menequat , e-e menequâchegun .

Me eu ōnje siágeinnuhgook nekânissetōk , iyângwâmezik , mushkâwandumōk , kago keguh jebinnegoseem , gâgineek uhnoketumōk Kitche Manito otuhnokewin , ōnje kekekandánâwâ ketuhnokewinewâ kâween unishá ketuhnokeseem Kitche Manito ōnje .
Eu ōnje ketuhnumeatonim keche kekinnowanemeyag .
Onje Kitche Manito onebwâkâwinink , ákeeng nebwâkâwin , kâ okekanemáseen Kitche Manitōn , Kitche Manito niandum guhgepách oguhgequawin , keche ōnje bemátizzewât tiabwatungig .

Giya keenowâ wewemátōk , tuhbussebuhgitenumowikög kenábamewâg , keowwewân ; kishpin oweuh tabwatunzik ekettowin , giya weenowâ ekettowin ánuh nōnduhzikwâ , konemá tá ōnje tabwatumōg wewewân azhewâbizzinit ōnje ;
Nōngumdush Christ ketuhnonigonán tebishko Kitche Manito azhewâwekozominág kewâwekozominineme Jesus Christ ōnje mennoinnowamik Kitche Manito .
Ween Kitche Manito nayáb gá onishkât , gá ábishkotát weessuggandumowin nebowin ōnjittá kâ pâpish otá meenjimmeniggooseen .
Kâween innuh opâpizzhinduhzeenâwâ eu mennoizzbewabizzit uhnozowin eu azhewenigoeyag ?
Kâ tá minnequase shomenâbo , kâ tá buketaegase ; kago tuh saságizzisse , kago tuh ōmbwatáse .
Owwagwandush , ga menequagwan , nebe neen gamenug , kâwekâ tuhwemenequase , nebedush neen gamenug gegishkunk ōndiebánink nebe mokidjewung aquo bemátuk .
Weendush kanowandunk odikittowininne , me 'ow siágeát Kitche Manitōn me o-o wanje kekandumunk beenjinná Kitche Manito uzzhiáeyunk .
Newâbomágdush niswa wánizzidjig ochichâgomág omuhkuhkeeng ezhenagoozewug beságáumōg mutche kenabeek otonink beōnje ságaumōg giya áwase otonink , giya gagenowishkid mamándáwizzit otonink .
Kishpin kemooshkenatōg tebákonegawin azhebe-egâtag , keguh sâgeáwâ kejetuhkewamágunewâ tebishko azhe sâgeitizzoyag , quiuk ketizzhewabizzim :
Kâween neenowint tebinowa neenguhgequasemin , Jesus Christ Kitche Manito atuh neenowint ketobemetágunenáwân neowwenánin Jesus Christ ōnje .
Kago oweuh keguh wiazhemigoseen , wetokowwintwâ mache izzhewabizzidjig , me wanje banátizzit mennoizzhewabizzewin .
Nōngum Kitche Manito otinowandásowin , ween ge ábejebát Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ , ween mámowy kanowanemát kokkinná otuhnishanâbamun , misque wâweendumátewin ōnje .

Máno tuh izzhewabut ketizzhewabizzewinewâ Christ omeenwâjemowin azhe guhgequat , kishpin bewâbominuhgook kishpin giya bewâbomissinonuhgook neenguh nōndága azhewabizzeyag keche mushkâwegâboweyag bazhek ochichâgomá bazhek enandumowin keche mámowandumink meenwâjemowin ;
Kitche Manito oge ábejebáán Neendogemámenán , giya neenowint oguh ábejebááigomin tebinowa omushkâwizzewinink .
Eu ōnje kekunwandumonim che ōmbwatoeyun Kitche Manito gá menik gagishkumun eu gá menigoeyun uhbuhgitinumonán neeninj .
Onje , me o-o gá ōnje weendumowintwâ o-o meenwâjemowin uhgew gá nabojig , konemá tá tebákonáwug , aninne weyâsink ōnje , tuh bemátizzewug Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun ōnje .
Keenowâ kege kishpinnuhnigōm enik gá nuhginjegâ zoeyag , kago ween aninne otuhnoketâgaweninnemun áwe kago .
Kago nanáwudjemo kago , ánint uhgew gá azhe nanáwudjemowât , uhge banátizzewât bánáje-ewanidjin ōnje .

Kâween e-e ketezhewabizzisseem azhewabizzewât banajetojig Kitche Manito oguhgequawin ; quiuk tabwáwin ketezhegegetomin , Kitche Manito apetanemungid , anosumeet Kitche Manito neengegetomin Jesus Christ ōnje neendōnje gegetonim .
Neenowint menik muskâwizzeyáng , ketá nezhokomowwânánig nanuhmizzidjig , kâween weenigo chewe niandumeittizzoeyunk .
Wiebuhdush neen tebinowa neenguh be-ezhá kishpin Kitche Manito enandunk .

Gah eeshquâ izzhewabukdush ono iuheen , newin mezhinowag newâbomág nebowwewug aeeshquaiuhe ákeeng , uhmeenjimenumowât náwingin notinôn ákeeng , keche notinzinōk ákeeng , kitchegumeeng , giya kâween , giya ningooche metigōnk .

Eu ope kabekosag kebemátizzewininánin tatussin keche enuhnokeyunk miátáwizzidjig , meenwandumowât magwouh uhbamosayunk bisshegwâtizzewinink mutche enandumowinink , kewushquabewinink , ōmbuhkumegizzewinink , wekoongawinink , uhsáságewinintwâ muzzenineeg :
Kishpin oweuh aninne we mutchetotowât , ishkota otonewâng ōnje ságitchebetane obanájeándush omiátáwizzemun : kishpindush oweuh aninne we mutchetotowât me o-o ga ezhe nesint .
Pauldush eketto , kâ neengekekanemáse , nekânissetōk kitche ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewit , ōnje ezhebe-egáta , kago mutche ená kago , kenegânizzemewâg .
Onje áqutchink anemōg iáwug giya châsuhkejig giya bashegwâtizzidjig kokkinná giya uhgew manwandungig guhgenowishkewât .

Pungee neendiánun iuheen wâeninán , ōnje ánint iáwug keenowâ tabwatungig Balaam oguhgequawin , ween gá guhgekemát Balakun keche oppuhgitowât bezogashinowin anosumewát Israel onejánisun , che mejewât iuheen siáságewinintwâ muzzininneeg , che bisshegwâtizzewâtdush .

Onjittá enandágwut nekânissetōk , megwach che enungid Kitche Manito , keenowâ ōnje ; ōnje kemushkâwandumowinewâ ashkum ápiche netáwigge , keshawâtizzewinewâdush kokkinná kitche bátienut , uhgeshawâtizzenotáteyag ;
Kekekandánâwâ , miátáwizzidjig uhgeáweyag , uhnopenuhnagwâ uhgew natágegetosigwâ muzzineneeg sagábeginitingin 'zhizhewabizzeyag .
Onâbamemág , ságeikōg kewewâg tibishko Christ azhe ságitōt uhnumeawin , uhge ōnje buhgitinunk weow ;
Kago ázhetowâákan aninne ningōtono ezhe mutchetotōk , quiuk izzhewabizzin che kushketoeyun kago anosumewât kokkinná aninnewug .
Tuhbussebuhgitenumowik eu ōnje keowwewâng Kitche Manito anámiuhe oninjeeng , konemá keguh ishpebuhgitinumowâ ope ochichesag :

Kâwekâ kege ezhe nuhgunnegoosenán gâgineek kekekandumonigonán kunowaneminunk , eu keche mennototum kegemenigonán kemewun gezhigōnk ōnje , netáwiggingin kekenonowinink , omooshkenatōndush ketaenánin netáwiggingin giya pâpenanemowin ,
Giya owewewân , me go ga izzhewabizzinit , che bakâtizzewât , kago tuh netá tuzzhemásewân oweuh , che unisátizzewât , nabwâkâjig kokkinná kago .
Neenge mena che ánwanmdizzōt obisshegwâtizzewin , kâdush ween we ánwanindizzose .

Heroddush onishkâtizzetowân uhnew Tyreink , giya Zidonink , aeendánidjin , obeotissiggoondush mámowy , owângoweáwândush Blastus , Herod omezhinowamun okuhquajemáwândush che innowandewât ; ōnje e-e andánuhkewât mego wanje bemátuttinik ogemán andánuhkenit .
Jesusdush , oguhnonán , káween neendiáwâse Mutche Manito ; neengitchetwâwanemá nōs ; keenowâdush kâween kekitchetwâwanemisseem .
Kitchegummedush kitche mámángâshkâ ōnjè kitche notink .
Neendenandum o-o kuhgwâtuhgittowin , o-o bemátizzewin kâ tá apetandágoosinōn che tuzzhindumingebun anduhzhindumungoon kitchetwâwizzewin che nágwuk keowinnáng .
Ketoshebeumonenim uhbenōcheitōk , ōnje kemutcheizzhewabizzewinewân kemennoweshâwandágoozim otuhnozowinink ōnje .

Ween gá bemájeinunk uhgenundominunk menno nundōndewinink , kâween ween menik anuhnokeyung ōnje meatuh weenigo tebinowa otenandumowin oshâwanjegawin ōnje eu gá meninunk Christ Jesus ōnje chebwâ ozhetōng áke .

Ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewug giya shemágunisshe ogemág ope wiábomáwât , ázhequawug ekettowug suhsuhgáquoōk . Pilatedush otinnân , keenowá otâpenik , suhsuhgáquo ōk kâ kago neen neengemikumowâse chegemutche izzhewabizzit .
Eu gâgega bemátizzewin , mamándáwizzidjig nandowandumowât ápiche , uhgew gá ōnwâchegajig shâwandágoozewin ga otisigoeyag .
Nebewá kagianizzidjig takoshinōg ákeeng keche ekettowât Jesus Christ kâ muhshe takoshinze , aninneeng che be-ezhenágoozit . Me 'ow kagianizzit giya Anti-Christ , ( shánganemát Christun . )
Nemikowânán wuhow anione papámegooshkâche-ewat , otōmbwaán kokkinná Jewun kokkinná otuhnunkewinink nágânizzit Nazareneug .

Ningōtono nuhkowa keche gweenowe eketoseeng , kitche apetandágwut Kitche Manitowewin , Kitche Manito weyâsink genágooze , quiuk ge ezhichegâzo Ochichágománg , mezhinowan ogewâbomigōn , tabwa-anemá ákeeng , ishpemink ge ōnje otápenegâzo kitchetwâwizzewinink .

Kitche mikwumenánewun gezhigōnk ōnje pongesin , pongesinotágowât aninnewug andusso menuhguk ningo tebábishkochegun uhpetinegutōn , aninnewugdush omutchetuzzhemáwân Kitche Manitōn ōnje e-e mikqumenánewunk nebowin ōnje kitche apetandágwut .
Keenowintdush eu wâweendumágawin ōnje kenundowábundámin ōshke gezhik giya ōshke áke , eu quiuk izzhewabizzewin uzzhiág .
Gezhikdush májámuhgut tebishko mazaniegun tatebishkágin ; kokkinná wudjewun giya menissun ningooche azhe bejenishkáwun uzzhiágebun .
Eu enandumowin wanje mennobemátizzeyâng ningōtinkigo Jesus Christ weow osáságewitchegat me kokkinná ge sáságewitchegaintwâ .
Megwach neendenáná Kitche Manito gâgineek keenowâ ōnje ;
Minowâ bazhek bazhekokashe ságáum miskooze ; mushkâwizzewindush mená uhow bamomigoot keche ikkoonunk innuhwandewin ákeeng ; keche nesitewât mamashqut : kitche uzzhowweshkdush mená .
Mahno kokkinná uhnoketâgaweninnewug , menik anoketágawât oguh gitchetwâwanemáwân otogemámewân konemá Kitche Manito otuhnozowin giya otizzhetwâwin ningōtono che ittunzeeng .
Kago guhgenowishkindig kago , ōnje kegisikowâ gata aninne , otinuhnokewinun giya ;
Pungee iuheen neendiámm wâeninán , ōnje máno ketenanemá 'ow equa Jezebel ōnwâchega equa anwátunk weow che bisshegwâtizzewât giya chesáságewinát muzzinineen .

Mazaniegundush negân uhwiábundumink Kitche Manito otá bemájeán miátáwizzinidjin mushkáwandumowin ōnje gá weendumowât Abraham kiut Jesus Christ otuhnumeawin ( ekettōnk ) keen ōnje kokkinná bamátizzidjig ga ōnje shâwandágoozewât .
Kegewuhnandánâwâdush e-e guhgequawin gagekemigoyag tebishko uhbenocheug gagekemintwâ ; neenguis kago pâpenotunkan Kitche Manito obuhshunzhaowawin , kago wekâ nikâbundunkan kishpin ánwanemik .

Tabwatowik uhgew tabaneminágwuk tuhbusanindizzōk , otuhkowâbomáwân kechichâgowâng tibishko uhgew tabohgindâzojig konemá mennowânegoozewinink tuh totumōg kâween ween osittáwandumowinink ; eu kâ ningōt ketá inábuhchetoseem .
Opedush gá banájeát neezhwâswawân ákeeng Canaan , omátáonán eu áke uzzhuhtátewât .
Kishpin oweuh aninne puhkân ezhe guhgequat , uhtabwaanduhzik wanissheshingin ekettowinun , Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ odikittowinun ezhetwâwin azhe guhgekindink Kitche Manito oguhgequawin .
Oweuh otissig o-o guhgequawin betosig , kago peendegunákan andáeyun , kago nuhnândotumowâkan Kitche Manitōn keche shâwanemigoot .
Onje Jesus Christ okotuhgitowin nebewá kegegishkámin me eu niandumowin azhe ōndinuhmunk giya keenowint Jesus Christ ōnje .
Tuhsuhnágizzewug uhgew ! Cainun azhánit ezbáwug , ono penutánâwâ Balaam omázheninewugizzewin che tebáumátewizzewât , banátizzewug Core omutchegegetowinink .
Uhgewdush omutche tuzzhindánâwâ e-e kakanduhzikwâ onoedush iuheen kakandumowâjin tábishko áwaseink , ono ini een ōnje banájeittezowug .

Noah omushkâwandumowin ōnje , Kitche Manitōn uhge ezhe guhgekimigoot , azhe sagizzit , gá ōnje uhnokeet che ozhetōt chemán , che ōnje bemájeát kokkinná andussotawizzit o-o uzzhenuhnokeet obátátōn áke , medush biezhe sazekizzekundunk quiuk izzhewabizzewin mushkâwandumowin ōnje .
Ope ono iuheen gá geschichegâtag sáságewitchegaweninnewugdush mozhuk peendegawug eu uhnetamichegâtag wegewâm , uhnoketowât Kitche Manitōn .
Keenowâ chábuhchegwiyuhwaeyag , gáwetázhegâzosewag , mushkâwetahayag , gágineek kenânânduhquoáwâ Kitche Manito ochichâgwun : kōsewâgigo gá izzhewabizzewât mego giya keenowâ azhewabizzeyag .

Kekekandámin tebákonegawin kâween quiuk izzhewabizzit aninne ge ozhitowâse , meatuh miázheninnewugizzidjig , mache izzhewabizzidjig , uhgew kakanemásigook Kitche Manitōn mache bemátizzidjig uhgew báneta-asigook , mache gegetōshkidjig , nasájig ōsewân , nasájig ogewân , nasájig aninnewun .
Kege oshebeumonim mazaniegunink , che wetokowâsewagwâ bisshegwâtizzidjig :
Ope Kitche Manito anandunk , ween gá puhkat neenguh omisutáng uhnundomit oshâwanjegawin ōnje .
Aeendotumán kâ nemeenwanduhze che izzhewabuk : wiánuhwe izzhewabizzeyán , kâ neendizzhewabizzisse ; shângandumán me izzhewabizzeyán .
Máno ashkum mushkâwandumōk ashkum kekandumōk . Kitche Manito gá Bemájeinunk Jesus Christ okekandumowin . Ween tuh gitchetwâwizze nōngum gâgineek . Amen .
Neenguhgebátizzemin Christ ōnje , keenowâdush kenebwâkâm Christ ōnje ; neen neenuhmizzemin , keenowâdush kemushkâwizzim , keenowâ kekitche apetandágoozim , neenowintdush neennisshewuhnátizzemin .
Metágwanázho-ōk mushkâwegâbowig mushkâwandumowinink ōnje kekandánâwâ kekânissewâg ákeeng giya weenowâ tebishko azhe kuhgwâtuhgitowát .
Uhnoketâgaweninnewetōk , tabwatowwikōk ketogemámewâg weyâsink , kokkinná kago , kâween ween oskezhikomá uhnokewin uhniandumeint aninne , meatuh ezheka otaemán uhgosint Kitche Manito .
Metoswa ashkunug wiábomutwâ me metoswa ogemán , kâ muhshe oweuh ogemáwewin otiáseen , otiánâwâdush mushkâwizzewin mámowy áwaseun bazhek tebiegun tebishko ogemág azhe iámowât .
Kâween neenge otissigoosemin Ochichâgomá omá ákeeng meatuh Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun ; keche ōnje kekandumunk iuheen wanepuzh Kitche Manitōm máninunk .
Mahjahg nōngum wiánutizzeyag aninnewetōk , mowwik wâōnōk , kekotuhgitowinewân keguh otissigōnâwâ .

Kago gotunkan ono iuheen ga ōnje kotuhgitoeyunin : binná , Mutche Manito ánint keguh kepáquogowâ , che kuhgwadebanemigoeyag , metoswogwun keguh kotuhgandán , mushkâwegâbowik nánázh nebowin , keguhmenin wewoquân bemátizzewin .
Keendush Kitche Manito oteninnemun , ozhindun ono iuheen ; nopenutun quiuk izzhewabizzewin , Kitche Manito otizzhetwâwin mushkâwandumowin sâge-ewawin , beowin , bakâtizzewin .
Kege mennowânegoozim uhbemátizzeyag omá ákceng kege mutcheizzhewabizzim ; kege totám keta , tebishko e-e gezhigut oweuh gá nisshewajin .

Gá gewetáiuhe námátábewinink neezhtunnuh usshenewin námátábewinun ; námátábewininkdush neezhtunnuh usshenewin okewanzeug newâbomág , uhnámátábewât , wâbishkekoniawug ; ozâwâ shoneá owewoquânun agowâjin ōshtegwânewâng .

Menik gá ezhe kitchetwâweittezoot , ápiche owânutizzit , menik kotuhgitowin kushkandumowin menik ; ōnje eketto otaink , ogemáqua neendenub , kâween neshegáwisse , káween kago kushkandumowin neenguh wâbunduhzeen .

Giya keenowâ onâbamemátōk , wetegamikōg uhgew , quiuk kekandumowinink ōnje , kitchetwâwanemint weowwemá tebishko nánuhmuk otossowin , azhe wuhweej sazekizzeendink shâwandágoozewin bemátizzewin , ketuhnumeawinun keche bánáchichegâtasinōk .
Kâween oweuh equa neenguh enanemáse che guhgequat , giya keche weuhnewishkowâsigwá aninnewun meatuh keche pezân uhbewât .
Onjittá Kitche Manito tuhtabwa , enik aketōt , ween gá undominag che wejeweag Oguisun Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christun .
Nekánissetōk , kegenundomigōm che wânuhkeyag ; kago weenigo kago e-e wânuhkewin weyâsemá ōnje iyuhnoketátig ságeittewinink .
Me go ezhe gegetōk , tebishko uhgew ga tebákonegowizzidjig tebákonegawinink wânuhkewin .
Papuhkânuttōn uhnokewinun , bazhekgo Manito .
Uhgew waōsidjig , me wanjebát Jesus e-e weow , ween anewishkunk kokkinná áke , shâwandágoose ween Kitche Manito gâgineek . Amen .

Kishpin neenowint suhnágizzeyâng , me keenowâ keche ōnje mennowânegwandumag , keche ōnje bemátizzeyag kekotuhgitowinewâ ōnje ; me giya neenowint wanje kotuhgitoeyáng kishpindush mennowânegoozeyâng , me e-e keche ōnje mennowánegoozeyag , keche ōnje bemátizzeyag .
Ween máninung mushkâwandumowin , keche ōnje mushkâwegâboweyung , che tabwatowwung Christ , ween gá onuhgeminunk , me uhow Kitche Manito .
Onōndowándush , oweuh gegetonit minowâ , kokkinná kago Kitche Manito bánetōt kago ween wenut etungan .
Giya ogemág ákeeng gá weje bisshegwâtizzemájig gá menno wejetuhkewamájig oguh mowwemáwân , oguh netágetowâwân , ope wâbundumowât puhquana e-e che châgizzōt .
Jesusdush otinnân , aninne sâgeát , oguh , kunwandánum neendikitowinun ; nōsundush oguh sâgeigōn , neenguh be otissánán , neenguh wetegamánándush .
Me o-o ságe-ewawin ; kâween ween keenowint uhsâgeunk Kitche Manito , ween Kitche Manito osâgeinunk , biezhenázhowâtdush Oguisun , uhsáságewitchegat kemutche izzhewabizzewininánin ōnje .
Kishpin wâsayáng bamosayáng , weendush wâsayág ayát , newetokotátemin mamashkōt Kitche Manito Oguisun , Jesus Christ omisqueem kesebeginegomin kokkinná kemutcheizzhewabizzewinenán .
Eu ōnje kâween kiábe ketuhnoketâgaweninnewisse , ketoguisemigo , kishpin ogisemáweyun ketián Kitche Manito owáweendumágawin Christ ōnje .
Otinân koshá Oguisemán , kenámátábewin , Kitche Manito , gâgegasin : mushkâwizzewin ketogemáwewinink quiuk izzbewabizzewin .
Jewundush otigowân , kâween wanissheshingin uhnokewinun ketōnje bemosinnuhissenonim ; mutche gegetowin ōnje , koshá , ōnje keteninne-ewdush Kitche Manitowe áwakâzoeyun .

Puhquanag okotuhgitowinewâ ōmbishkâne gâgineek : kâ unwashemonosewug gázhegukin giya dabekukin uhgew anumeatowâjig áwaseun giya otizzhenágoozewin muzzineneen kokkinná watâpenungig otozhebe-egun otuhnozowin .
Eu ōnje , ōnje uzzhiáyung o-o ezhetwâwin , azhe otissigoeyâng shâwandágoozewin kâ newuhnemikkowwissemin .
Ketá ezhe mushkâwegeezhwamin , Kitche Manito neenguh nezhokomág che ekottoeyunk kâween neenguh gotunzeen aninne ga ieendōtōwit .
Wuhow májit , kago oguh pâpizhemáseen uhow májissinit , weendush májesig , kago oguh tebugemáseen , uhnew májinit ; ōnje Kitche Manito , oge otâpinegōn .
Nōngum Kitche Manito ween mágewat mennowânegwandumowin ápadush meninunk kokkinná tebishko keche enandumag Jesus Christ ga ezhe meenwandunk .

Kâween uhgew kitche sáságewitchegaweninewug aeendotumowápun andusso gezhiguk kâween ieendotunze she ōnje sáságewitchegat tebinowa omutcheizzhewabizzewin netam , eeshquâchdush anishanábag omutcheizzhewabizzewinewâ kokkinna osáságewitchegatumowân , ope ningōtink sáságewitchegat tebinowa eu weow .
Owwagwan wiánutizzegwan owâbomátdush wekânisun katemákizzinit shâwanemásigdush ; áneen ga ge ezhe ságeát Kitche Maniton ?
Kemushkâwandámin , neendikit , ketenandámin che buhkawittoeyunk kebikokeowwenánin konemá che ōnje wejewunk Kitche Manito .
Siágeinnuhgook , keguhgâzominenim , tebishko miátáwizzingin giya babámátizzingin , metágwietumōk weyâse enandumowin , eu mágánát ochichâgomá ;
Kitchetwâwanim kokkinná aninnewug . Sâgeikōg wekánissemág . Gosik Kitche Manito : kitchetwâwanemik kitche ogemá .
Enandum wekânisun che kekanduminit Kitche Manitōn keche buggittinnegowât , ween ōnje ; kâdush okekanduhzeenâwâ .
Tuttebábumikōg anemōg , tuttebábumikōg mache uhnokejig , tuttebabumikōg concisianug .

Omushkâwetōnâwân odikitowinewân neenkekanemánán Kitche Manito uzzheketowât , otuhnokewinewângdush otágoonwatowâwân , mázheninnewugizzewug , kâ tabwatunzewug , ogooshquaetánâwâ kokkinná wanissheshink uhnokewin .
Neenkekanemág uzzhenandumowât we uhnoketowât Kitche Manito , kâdush okekanduhzeenâwâ ga ezhe uhnoketowâwât .
Ween niandumeinunk kokkinná kesuhnágizzewinenánin me giya keenowint ga ezhe niandumeungwâbun wasitáwandungig .
Wekooche wâbundiewan keow che keshizzowwe uhnoketowwint Kitche Manito unoketâgaweninne uzzhuhgutchissik , quiuk onuhonittink uhnokewin tabwawin .

Ween gagânjeát Kitche Manitōn owushema negânandunk weow kokkinná kago Kitche Manito atumink , kokkinná anumeatumink , ween Kitche Manitōng anuhbit Kitche Manito otuhnumeawegumigōnk owâbundiewan weow , ween Kitche Manito uzzhiáwit .
Keenowâdush oōsemátōk , kago guhgânjeketaokago keenejânissewâg , ezhe netáwiginikōg keche ságeáwât che gosáwât Kitche Manito .
Kagat nemushkâwizzemin kokkinná ono ween siágeinunk ōnje .

Opedush kokkinná bangeshináng ákeeng neennōndán gegetowin guhnonigoyán Hebrew inwawinink ekettōnk , Saul , Saul , wagonan wanje mutche totowweyun ? kitche sunnágut e-e chetungishkowutwâ menasagâwunjeeg .

Neenkekandánun ketuhnokewinun kesuhnágizzewinun keketemágizzewin ( kewânuttizdush ween , ) neenkekandánun omutchegegetowinewân uhgew neen Jewew aketojig , kâdush áwissewug , Mutche Manito otuhnumeawegumigónk wetokâzowug .
Kâ mennowânegwanduhze mutche izzhewabizzewinink , mennowânegwandum quiuk izzhewabizzewinink ;
Eu ōnje , pemaiuhe buhgitinumōk kokkinná wenizzewin , kokkinná mázheninewugizzewin ; otâpenumōk bakâtizzewinink ekettowin me eu ga ōnje bemátizzewât kechichâgowâg .
Neengeketega , Apollos oseguhundán ; Kitche Manitodush megewa menekân .
Minowâ bazhek mezhinowa nopenuhke , ekettōnk , Babylon pongesin , pongesin , eu kitche otanuh , ōnje ototowân kokkinná azheweenzonidjin che minequanit shomenâbo , nishkâtizzewin obisshegwâtizzewin .
Keenowâ neendinowamágunun kishpin izzhewabizzeyag , azhe guhgekeminuhgook .
Uhbenōcheitōk metágwaetowik muzzineneensug . Amen .
O-o tinnouh biábeendega otamuhguk kemōch wegewamink kuhgepách equawizzhishug uzzhowâkânekang uhbwâwuhnawât mutcheizzhewabizzewinun ningooche 'znezhewinegowât omutche náguttuhwandumowinewân .
Umbasinno , tabwatá sâgeittewinink , konemá ween Christ nâgânizzit izzhewabizzit ketá izzhewabizzim :
Wekoochetōk che kunwandumag ochichâgomá obazhekowin , tuhkobizzowinink innowandewinink .
Ekettodush , owwanan keen Kitche Manito ? Kitche Manitodush eketto , neen Jesus mache totowweyun ; kitche sunnágut , keen che tungishkumun gánágin .
Kitchetwâwanemik Kitche Mánito ketaewâng , gâgineek washowandumōk keche nuhquatowag oweuh kuhquajeminág buhgoosanemowin gagishkumag bakâdizzewinink sagizzewinink .
Kitche Manitodush otigōn , kezekun kemukkizzenun kezittáng , Kitche Manito otukkeem , emá nebowweyun .
Máno gegishkumōk gá nōndumag wiazhkut miájetáng . Wiazhkut miájetáng gá nōndumag gegishkumag keguh beenjenuhwânashkowâwâ Oguisemá giya Osemá .
Kagat , kagat , ketenenim , oweuh aninne , kunwandunk aketoeyán kâwekâ oguh wâbunduhzeen nebowin .
Newábundán wâbishkág kitche námátábewin , weendush 'ow námátábit , anosumeet oskezhigōnk áke giya gezhik oshemomuhgut , kâ ningooche mikegâtasenōn keche iáwât .
Mejim omissutámá ōnje , omissutámádush mejim ōnje ; Kitche Manito oguhbanájetonun niyazh ; weowwemán kâween bisshegwâtizzewin ōnje ; Kitche Manito koshá ōnje ; Kitche Manitodush weowwemá ōnje .
Me giya keenowâ ga izzhewabizzeyag , kishpin kegenayag mutcheizzhewabizzewin , kishpin Kitche Manito apanemoeyag che bemátizzeyag Kekitche Manitomenán Jesus Christ ōnje .
Nōngum megwach ketenánán Kitche Manito , ween mozhuk meninunk shágooche-ewawin , Jesus Christ ōnje ; owâbundiewandush onebwâkâwin , mizzewa , keenowint ōnje .
Me ekettowin gá nōndumowungid keweendumoneme , Kitche Manito wâsayá , kâdush kago kushkedibbikut ogegishkunzeen .
Kokkinná , ōsemá mázhit neenguh otissigōn ; weendush gabe otezhit kâwekâ neenguh wabenáse .
Wekaunissemahtok , sâge-ewatá gâgineek .
Me eu ōnje kushketōt kokkinná che bemájeát uhgew buhnázekowâjig Kitche Manitōn ween ōnje : ōnje gâgega bemátizze zhiuh uhnumeatumowât .

Azhequawug , ningooche ezhewish , ezhewish , suhsuhgáquo-ōk , Pilatedush otinnân , neenguhsuhsuhgáquowâ nuh ketogemámewâ ? Ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewugdush ekettowug , kâ oweuh neendogemámenán meatuh Caesar .
Mego azhewabuk nōngum , ánint ge onábomáwug shâwandágoozewinink ōnje .
Ween uhow bashegwâcheigoot ogemán ákeeng , ákeeng andánuhkejig kewushquabunáwug shomenâbo eu obisshegwátizzewin .
Mennoweshâwanindig mamáshkōt , kitchetwâweittig mamáshkōt .
Menik Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun sagábeginnegajig , Kitche Manito otōnejânissenun .
Minowâ bazhek mâmuhkâtandumowin nágwut gezhigōnk ; binná miskooze babámisat kitche kenabeek , neezhwâchininewun ōshtegwânun metáchewun otashkunun , neezhwâswadush wewoquânun ōshtegwânink átanewun .
Kishpin onejânisseminunk , sazekizzidjig Kitche Manito onejânisun áweyunk , wejewunk mámowy Christ , kishpin wejekuhgwâtuhgitomin , konemá keguh wejekitchetwâwizzemánan .
Máno okewanzeug quiuk wagemákundungig , neezhink menik tuh kitchetwâwanemáwug , maminduhga uhgew anokejig uhnokewinink guhgequawinink .
Kaweendush kokkinná aninnewug okekanduhzeenâwâ eu , kekandumink , uhsáságewinnint muzzeninne omejináwâ eu siáságewinint muzzeninne uhneennuhmuttinik onáguttuhwandumowinewâ banátuttinne .
Kokkinná otikqunun mánewunzenōk , ototápenán ; kokkinnádush otikqunun mánewungin , obenitonun minowâ owushema che menewung .
Kâ giya wagemákundumingin Kitche Manito tabandunk , keguh totunzeem , keche kekinoumowagwâgo nangōtwawânuhgizzidjig .
Kenundowaneminenim che kekanemagwâ uhgew nabájig , keche ositáwanduhzewag ánint azhe ositáwandumowât uhgew buhgoosanemowin ayásigwâ .
Mushkâwandumowin ōnje otuhkumishkánâwâ misko kitchegumme tibishko biangwuhkumigágin ; uhgew Egyptianug ánuh gewekooche totumowât kokkinná ge tuhpinawug nebeeng .
Opedush , Moses nágit , ápiche ge onisshisshe , niswogezisdush ge netáwiggeá , ōsun owegewamink ,
Otá shâwaneman ono kakandunzinit kago , giya ono wanisshinidjin ween giya tebinowa weow azhe nenuhmizzeyunk ezhe nenuhmizze .
Dibbikut kagâ eeshquâsa , gezhigut bazhew tuhgoo ; umbasinno wabenuntá kushkedibbikut uhnokewin , pezekundámin wâsayá ushwewenun .
Keenowâdush wagemákundumag , me go e-e giya totowwikōg , kago kuhgwasageákagwânik , ōnje kekekanemáwâ ketogemánewâ gezhigōnk uzzhiat , weendush kâween oweuh pekinōnk otuhpetanemáseen .
Weje mennowânegoozemikōg , manowânegoozidjig , wege mowemikōg mawidjig .

Uhnopenuttumun uhmushkâwâg tebinowa keta , kenissittiz Kitche Manito onishkâtizzewin nánázh e-e gezhigut enishkâtizzewin che tuhgook , nánázh Kitche Manito quiuk otepákonegawin che mizzhishshowinágwuk .
Be-ezháwugdush emá , ánint Jewug Antiochink giya Iconiumink uhguhgâzomáwât anishanâban che bemosinuháwât Paulun , che sâgitchenázho-ōnt otanuh , keche nesint ge nebodush otenanemáwân .
Ope Jesus gá eeshquâ ekettōt ono iuheen , kitche osittáwandum ochichâgōnk ekettodush , kagat , kagat , ketenenim , bazhek andussheag oguh buggittiunumágan neow .
Mazaniegundush azhebe-egâta ōnje , kekandágwut , kokkinná bamátizzidjig uhmutcheizzhewabizzewât e-e wâweendumátewin mushkâwandumowin Jesus Christ ōnje tá menáwug uhgew tiabwatungig .
Opedush , gezhetáwât eu odikitowinewâ , áwase bowōnje ságáunk weembápeká wayaquiásinōk oguhmegânán , oguh mámázheán , oguhnesán .
Kege ezheigomin ánint Jesus Christ otizzhetwâwin cbe otâpenumunk , kishpin mushkâwe meenjimenumunk gá áquo bemátizzeyunk ;
Kishpin Christ kegishkowag ; weowemá nebomuhgut mutcheizzhewabizzewin ōnje Uhchichâgomá bemátizze , ōnje quiuk izzhewabizzawin .
Ahneen o-o mamándáwizzit kōsewâg kâ wegooche nissáwâpun ? ogenesáwândush uhnew negân gá tepájemonidjin , takoshin 'ow Quiuk Bazhek , Kitche Manito Oguisun , ween gá buggittenumátink , gá nesint :

Nissittewin , kewushquabewin , megooshkâtuhkumegizzewin , uhnōch mutche izzhewabizzewin ; ono iuheen keweendumonim maweshádush gá ezhe weendumonuhgogobun ; uhgew aeendotungig ono iuheen kâ pâpish tá beendegasewug Kitche Manito otogemáwewin .
Magwouh zhiáeyag wâsayá , tabwa-andumōk wâsay konemá wâsayá onejánisun keguh áwim . Jesusdush gá eesh quâ ekettōt ono iuheen ningooche ezhá owwe gázotowât .
Ween quiuk totum azhe guhnonigoot anonigoojin tebishko Moses quiuk gá ezhe izzhewabizzit kokkinná andussogat .
E-e nebená gá meninunk , Jesus Christ gá Bemájeinunk ōnje ;
Joses , anoninjig Barnabas azheweenâwât , ( azhe ánekunotumink omeenwandumink oguisun , ) Leviteun Cyprusink andánukkeet .
Kago iakoozissetá che mennototumunk , wiábetagin ketegân , keguh mámámin kishpin wuhnemikowwissewung .
Neen , tebákonegawin ōnje , neennib tebákonegawinink kokemá Kitche Manito che ōnje bemátizzeyán .

Uhsahgunusk nemenigo suhkáoonink ezhenágwut : mezhinowadush nebowwe , ekettōnk , pusegween , tebáun , Kitche Manito otuhnumeawegumik , giya sáságewitchegun ukko 'zhutag , giya uhgew anumeájig emá beendik .

Me uhgew banáschichegâzosigwâ equa ōnje ; ōshkenegewug . Uhmewug uhgew n'wâpenánájig Mánishtánishansun aezhánitigo : gá kishpinuhninjig magwa aninne , netam mánekânewidjig Kitche Manito giya Mánishtânishans ōnje .
Bazhekokazbeg gázhetáwâjin owwe megâzowât ezhenágoozewug uhtisáwiasheun , ōshtegwânewâng ozâwâ shoneá wewoquân ezhenágwutinewun , oskezhikowândush eninneeng enutangwawug .
Wiánuhkeengin uzzhioseeng kewânuhkewinewâ , kitchebuhbeenzikowâgun che gátōng mutcheta-awin , Kitche Manito otoskenegamunigo izzhewabizzik .
Eu me wanje uhnokeyâng uhmutche tuzzhemigoeyâng , ōnje neendabwatámen giágega bemátizzit Kitche Manito ween Bamájeát kokkinná aninnewun , maminduhga tiabwatungig .

Ahneen menik buhshunzhaogowizzewin owushema ga iát , ketenandám , ween tatuhkokânigoot Kitche Manito Oguisun , wâweendumátewin misque , kâ ningōt inâbuhtusinōn anandunk , ga ge beneigopun , ween gá sheenganemát Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun ?
Jesusdush minowâ otinnân , mennoinnowandeyeuk ; nōs biezhenázho-ōt , me giya neen azhe ezhenázho-onuhgook .
Me uhgew nanáwudjemojig , ubnopenuttumowât tebinowa otenandumowinewá ; otonewán gegetomuhgutinewun kitche muhmechâg gegetowinun , owushema otuhpetanemáwân ánint aninnewnn uhwânutinit ōnje .

Ogemágdush ákeeng , kitche apetandágoozidjig aninnewug , giya wiánutizzidjig aninnewug , kitche menisseno ogemag , kitche mushkáwizzidjig aninnewug , kokkinná giya awâkânewidjig kokkinná giya tabanindizzojig gázowug wâweembápekânink ázhebekōnk .

Uhgew gwatáchishkidjig , giya tiabwatunzigōg mache izzhewabizzidjig nashewashkidjig , giya bashegwâtizzidjig , giya châsuhkejig muzzineneen anumeatowâjig kokkinná kagenowishkidjig , ánint oguhtiyánâwâ e-e gitchegume e-e chiágetag wazhâwushqukunag ōnje , me o-o áneka nebowin .
Wagonandush nōngum , bátoeyun ? onishkân keguh baptizeá keseábáwetōn kemutche izzhewabizzewin uhnumeatow , Kitche Manito otuhnozowinink .
Wenississewân equa wenississink ezhehágwutinewun , webetáwân mishebezhe webetáng ezhenágwutinewun .
Kitche Manito otoskenegamun kâ tá kekâwetunze , oguh bakátizzetowân kokkinná aninnewun , mennoguhgequaweninne , bakâtizze ;
Ahnuh kewejewisinonim neowwink kewejewinimdush ween ochichâgomá nemeenwandum uhwâbominuhgook azhe mennoizzhewabizzeyag azbe mushkâwandumag nebwâkâwin Christink .
Onje Kitche Manito oskezhikōn kunowâbomán quiuk izzhewabizzinidjin , otowwugun bákissininnewun uhnōndumowât otánumbawininne : Kitche Manitodush oskezhigōnk mutcheenanemán machetotuminidjin .

Neendenandágoozemin megwach che enungid Kitche Manito keenowâ ōnje , nekânissetōk , Kitche Manito siágeinág , ōnje wiazhkut miájetáng Kitche Manito kegeonuhgimigowâ che bemátizzeyag , Ochichâgwun uhbeneinág ōnje , ōnjedush uhtabwatumag tabwawin :

Ween mache izzhewabizzit máno tuh mutcheizzhewabizze kiábe , ween wânizzit máno guttuh wenizze kiábe , ween quiuk azhewabizzit máno go tuh quiuk izzhewabizze kiábe ween giya manoizzhewabizzit máno go tuh mennoizzhewabizze .
Peterdush otinnân uhnew , anwanindizzōk keguh baptizeág kokkinná andussheyag , Jesus Christ otuhnozowinink , che mennoweshâwandágooseyag keguhtianâwâ Kitche Manito ochichágwun .
Tuttebábig , kago oweuh mamáshkwut tuh totátissewug , nopenutumōk eu quiuk izzhewabizzewin , mennototowikōg kokkinná aninnewun .
Giya aninne uhbonetōt anuhnokánát equawun tebinowadush weenowâ uzzheninnewewât ieendotátewât e-e wekâ ga getotunzikwâbun , ozhittowâtdush kuhgwâtuhgitowin eu azhe onissheshininik che iámowât .
Eu ōnje keguh wejemojegizzemin giya .
Me ga ōnje osittáwandumagobun , nánáguttuhwandumōk , kemutche izzhewabizzewinnewâ konemá tuh ikkowabinnegâta , magwouh uzzhōshkenágwittōng pichenuk she ōnjebámugguk Kitche Manito uzzhiát ;
Squandamewung , kâwekâ tuh kepáquiegâtasinōn , gázhegukin kâwekâ emá tuh tibikusinōn .
Owwagwan ga meiegwan neweyâs , ga menequatdush nemisqueem tuh gâgega bemátizze : neenguh onishkâbenádush squâch che gezhiguk .
Jesusdush otinnân kâween ketá kushketoseen mushkâwizzewin ga totowweyumbun meatuh ishpemink ōnje menegoeyun ; me ōnje ween bagittinnumōk , neow mámowy mázheninnewuggizzit .
Mego tebishko , mushkâwandumowin , kishpin uhnokewinun áwunzenōk , nebomuhgut , ōnje uhnezhekawizzemuhguk .

Tepákonekawin gashketosig nánumuk ōnje go atuh weyâsemá , Kitche Manito uhbe-ezhenázhowât onezheka Oguisun , anineeng uhbe-ezhenágoozit uhbeōnje na mutche izzhewabizzewin che banájetōt mutcheizzhewabizzewin oweyâsemáng .
Kishpindush kuhgwâtuhgitoeyag quiuk izzhewabizzewin ōnje , kemennowânegoozim ; kago gosá kago , kago giya kushkandun kago .
Oōsemátōk , kago nanibbekimákagwânik keenejânissewâg , che ōnje nishkâtizzewât keche ōnje shâgwanemosigwâ .

Anegōk ázhequa , eketto , Babylon kache apetandágwuk , banátut , banátut , Mutche Manitōg otuhnokenotánâwâ , owâzhewân kokkinná wânizzidjig ochichâgomág , otokokobenágunewâ kokkinná wânizzidjig benasheug .
Owwanan kagenowishkid , kâween nuh ween , Jesus kâween Christ áwisse aketōt ween ayágoonwatunk Osemá giya Oguisemá ween Anti-Christ .
Eu ōnje owwagwan ga mejegwan o-o puhquazhegun giya ga menequagwan Kitche Manito omenequâchegun , anandágoozissig ; omutchetotágoon Jesus Christ weowinne , giya omisquemene .
Kewekekandán innuh kagebátizzeyun aninne , e-e mushkâwandumowin uhnokewinun uhtuhgoosinōk nebomuhgut ?

Judasdush ogeiáwân ningōtwawân aninnewun giya shemágunisshe ogemán , ogemá sáságewitchegaweninnewun giya Phariseeun ōnje , betakoshinōgdush emá wâsâkoninjegunne tebinoegunun giya wâswâgunun , giya ushwewinun , obetukkonánâwân .
Kitche Manitodush quiuk tabwa , ween keguh mushkâwandumeigowâ keguh kunwanemigowâ che mutchetotunzewag .
Opedush siágitchewabinát , Pharaoh odânisun omikowân ototâpenándush , medush azhe netáwijggeát uzzhoguisekát .

Mezhinowadush ototâpenán weengwusk wusegun otossowin , omooshkenatōn ishkota sáságewitchegun uzzhutag ōnje , otuhpuhgitōndush ákeeng , medush inwawinwinun uhnemikewun , wâsumowinun , giya áke nuhningishkâ .

Onje kokkinná azheweenzhojig ogeminequanâwâ shomenâbo obisheshegwâtizzewin onishkâtizzewin , ogemág ákeeng ogewejebisshegwâtizzemigōn , átáwaweninnewug ákeeng ashkum wânuttizzewug , ween owânuttizzewin ōnje .
Me ono iuheen ōnje , Jewug wanje tunnuhkumegizzewát , owwe nisshewât .
Ningooche oguh ezhe gooshquanánâwân otowugáwân tabwawinink , ádissokânun oguh otâpenánâwân .
Ahnint keenowâ , kâ ketabwatunzeem . Oanje Jesus ogeekandán wiazhkut miájetáng uhgew tabwatumikwâ , giya ga uggittinumáganidjin .
Jesusdush otinnân , me 'ow ga menik puhquazhegun , ge uhgwinjetowweyán ; gá uhgwinjetōtdush , omenán Judasun Iscariotun , Simon oguisun .
Keen Timothy kunwan bagitenumágoeyun che kunwandumun , metágwietun kuhgepáche nuhnândokoondewinun .

Jewugdush kâween tabwatunzewug kuhgâwandumōg , ototâpenáwândush bashegwâtandágoozinidjin omowōnjeáwândush kitche nebewá , ōmbwaáwugdush anishanâbag otanuh owekooch buggonaánâwân Jason owegewam , owekooche sâgizzeáwân , owwe betowâwât anishanâban .

Oweuh aninne wâbomát wekânisun mutcheizzhewabizze omutcheizzhewabizzewin nebowinewunzinik , oguh nundotumowân Kitche Manitōn oguhmenándush bemátizzewin uhgew nabowinewunzinig omutcheizzhewabizzewinewâ . Tuhgomuhgut mutcheizzhewabizzewin uhnebowinewung , kâween neendikittose che uhnumeatumink .
Kagat , kagat , ketenenim , ween tiabwanemát biezhenázho-ōnidjin neen tabwayanemik weendush tiabwayanemit otabwayanemán biezhenázho-ōnidjin .
Me eu ōnje neendotâpenámin ogemáwewin kashketosink che mátenumink tuh we onisshenōn ketaenánin ween atuh Kitche Manito che uhnoketowunk sagizzewinink .

Ahnint bashegwâchandágoozidjig Jewug quazâbundungig nábetotumōg uhnumeánidjin andotuminit Mutche Manitōn ga gishkowânidjin otowwe nebowittowâwân owâweennáwât Kitche Manitōn Jesusun otuhnozowin che sâgizzenotágonit .
Pauldush , Silasun ototâpenán medush bukkawenát ope wekânissemán gá uhnumeatummágoot .
Kunowâbundizzōk keche wuhnetosewunk uhnokewin , menik gá ieendotumunk , quiuk tepáumátewin ōnjitá keguhtiámin .

Me uhgew mushkâwizzewin ayájig keche kepáquhumowât gezhigōnk , kâ tá kemewunzenōn uhnew gezhegutōn magwouh uhtepájemowât mushkâwizzewin giya otiánâwâ misqueen keche ezhenágwitowât nebeen , keche buhkitaumowât áke uhnōch tinnouh kago nebowin menikigo anandumowâjin .
Kâween keen kedebanduhzeen punge o-o uhnokewin ; kâween quiuk keta attasenōn , anosumit Kitche Manito .
Kokkinná tabanemugik , keen ketebanemág , kokkinnádush tabanemudjig ; neen neentabanemág , neengitchetwâwizzedush weenowâ ōnje .
Kokkinná puhkaiuhe ezháwug kâ ningōt inábuhtissewug nisshewuhnátizzewug ; kâ oweuh mennoizzhewabizzisse , kâ pâpish bazhek .
Kago tuh izzhewabussinōn che we guhgwauhnewishkotáteyag kuhgenowishke kitchetwâwanemowinink , kokkinná andussheyag mennonáguttuhwanemik bakânizzit azhe náguttuhwandumag keowwewân .
Nowwiunedush neezhwâswa wâsâkoninjegunâtigōn oweuh Aninne Oguisun azhenágoozit ezhenágooze , buhbeenzikowâgun otuhgwin ozitáng uhquagutinne , guhkitchepizzo okákegunink ozâwâ shoneá kitche pizzoon .
Kâ kago nuhnibekindewin minowâ tuh tuhgoosinōn , Kitche Manito giya Mánishtânishans giya onámátábewin guttuh iá beenjeiuhe e-e otanuh otuhnoketâgaweninemun oguh tuhuhketágōn .
Uhwaquiág kokkinná iuheen bazhew tuhgoo : e-e ōnje we uhnesátizzig , uhkowâbig , uhnumeág .
Antiochinkdush enáshewug , emá wiazhkut gá máje guhgequat .

Kispin quiuk wetegayun , kâ kemutcheizzhewabizzisse ; kishpindush oskenegequa quiuk wetegat , kâ mutcheizzhewabizzisse , e-e tinnouhdush , tuh kuhgwâtuhgitto weyâsink kâweendush minowâ ningōtono ketinissenonim .

Kâween ketizzhe kuhgwajewâzhewasemin weyâsemá giya nisque , ogemáwewindush ketizzhe kuhgwajewâzhewamin , gia mushkâwizzewinun uhgewedush tabandungig kushkedibbiut omá ákeeng , giya ochichâgomá mázheninnewugizzewin shpágin .
Kishpin oweuh andusheyag ayásik nebwâkâwin Kitche Manitōn oguh nundotumowân ween mánát wanepuzh kokkinná aninnewun ; oweuhdush wiágoonwatowâsig , tuh menádush .
Kago ikkoonázhowâ kago Ochichâgwun .
Mutche-egin ge oschichegâta áqutcheiuhe bátōchegâtâg wâsâkoninjegunâtik uhbuhtuhkisink , giya otopowin , giya puhquazhegun wiábundi-ittink o-o wegewâm Sanctuary ezhenekâta .

Keguhgâzomin che gishpinuttoweyun ozâwâ shoneá ayáyán gá kuhgwadebandumink ishkotang , ketá ōnje wânutix , giya wâbishke beenzikowâgun konemá ketá uhgwin , águtchewin kepingwoshshâgittewin che nágwussinōk ; pemeta winun keskezhigōn mushkeke bemeta , keche wâbeyun .
Ono iuheen wazhebeumonuhgook keenowâ tiabwatumag Kitche Manito Oguisun otuhnozowinink che kekandumag ayáeyag gâgega bemátizzewin konemá ketá tabwa-andám Kitche Manito Oguisun otuhnozowinink .

Ween tebinowa aekettōtigo anandunk ; ween tebinowa ogitchetwâwizzewin onundowâbundán ; ween nandowâbundunk ogitchetwâwizzewininne azhenázhuhōgoojin , ween tabwa , quiuk mázheninnewuggizzewin ga gishkunzik .
Ahkeeng otosowinink ketiámin o-o kitchetwâwizzewin ; mushkáwizzewin Kitche Manito che tebandunk , kâween keenowint ketebanduhzemin .

Siágeinnuhgook , kago wekâ tebinowa oweuh mutchetotowâ kago , oweuh enishkâtizzetonag kago keenowâ ázhetá nishkâtizzetowâ kago , oshebe-egâta neendebandán buhshunzhaogowizzewin , neen neenguh tebáán , eketto Kitche Manito .
Jesusdush otinnân , kitchetwâwindizzoyán , kâ ningōt inâbuhtussinōn , nōs kitchetwâwanemit , kedikittōmdush , Kekitche Manitōmewâ .
Kago banájetokan Kitche Manito otuhnokewin wesenewin ōnje . Kokkinná iuheen bánuk , mutcheizzhewabut koshá 'ow aninne ketwan májit ánuh kekandunk mutche izzhewabutinik .
Ototâpenánâwâ Jesus weow , bebuhgewyán neginōnkdush owweoqui-eginánâwâ mámowy e-e mushkeke , andotátewât Jewug uhni-isshemáwât .
Magwouh uzzhowâkâneweyán kegeshâwanim kemeenwandám che banájetoeyag ketinotawizzewinewâ uzzhiáeyag owushema onissheshin tebinowawizzewin gezhigōnk .
Wuhow aninne onejânisun Kitche Manito gá ezhe wâweendumágat opusegweendenát bazhek che bemájeáwât Israelun , me eu Jesus :
Azhebe-egâtag koshá skezhigomá kâ wâbemuhgussinōn , otowwugámá kâ nōndumomuhgussinōn , aninne ota kâ onáguttuhwanduhzenun ono iuheen Kitche Manito gá ozhetowât uhnew siágeigoojin .
Uhchichâgomán wuhow , gá ábejebáát Jesusun nebowiniuk , gegishkowag , ween gá ábejebáát Christun nebowinink , giya keenowâ keguh ábejebáigowâ , gá nebomuhguk keowewân ochichâgwun ōnje gagishkowag .
Uhchichâgomá ween tebinowa wetokâzo kechichâgonánin Kitche Manito uzzhojânisseminunk .
Kago keguh wiazhemigoseem ; Kitche Manito kâween pâpenotowâse , aninne kategâtunk , me e-e minowâ ga mámōt .

Náguttuhwandun , Kitche Manito oshâwanjegawin , giya quiuk otizzhewabizzewin , nágwuttinne , uhgew bangeshingig buhshunzhaogowizzewin , keendush enuhkuhkayá shâwandágoozewin kishpin mozhuk meenjimenumowut oshâwanjegawin , kishpindush meenjimenuhzewun keguh buhkawabinnego .

Eu ōnje beōk , nekânisetōk , nánázh ope Kitche Manito che tuhkoshink . Binná ketegaweninne obetōn gache apetandágwutinik menekân ákeeng , kitche keenwazh obetōn nánázh keche otisigoot wiebuh che kemewung , giya squâch che kemewung .
Kitche Manito oguh megewan oshâwanjegawin Onesipho rus owegewamink , nuhningim neendunwashemonoik ká águtchese uhtákobizzoyán .
Nōngumdush binná uhbenocheitök , beenjiná Kitche Manito iyáeyeuk nánázh che takoshink che águtchissewag ope takoshin .
Me o-o akettoeyán , Kitche Manito Ochichâgwun weowwink bamosag , kago mooshkena tabwatokago weyâsemá izzhewabizzewin .
Me o-o quiuk tabwa ekettowin , mozhuk tá tabwachegâta , Christ Jesus uhgetuhkoshink ákeeng , owwe bemájeát mache izzhewabizzinidjin ; neen bazhek owushema mache izzhewabizzeyán .
Eeshquâch akettoeyán nekânissetōk mushkâwandumōk Kitche Manito ōnje giya omushkâwizzewinink .
Eu ōnje ween enandunk mushkâwegâbowit , máno tuh iyângwâmandum keche we pongeshinzik .
Ningōtinkigo sáságewitchegat me ge gezhetáát uhnew quiuk izzhewabizzinidjin ga áquo ákewung .
Jewugdush minowâ omámonâwâ ásineen we beosináwât .
Apadush kekandumoninnuhgook Christ uhnegânezekundowât kokkinná aninnewun , aninnedush onegânizzekundowân equawun , Kitche Manito onegânizzekundowân Christun .
Ahnintdush ge kuhgwadebanemáwug uhge nuhnisshepápenotowintwâ , buhshunzhawâwug kushkâbekiegâzowug kepáquiegâzowug :
Eu buhgoosanemowin meenjemukiegun kechichâgonánig ōnjittá mushkâwesin , beendegasa ágoyegunink ;
Kago ningōtono inâbuhchetokago ono ningōt inâbuhtusinōk kushkedibikutōnk izzhewabizzewinun tiágwuchigo ketá muhmikuhwâmáwâg .

Kago mutchetuzzhindig kago , nekânisetōk , ween mache tuzzhemát wekânisun tebákonát wekânisun omutchetuzzhindán tebákonegawin otebákonán tebákonegawin : kishpindush tebákonumun tebákonegawin , kâween kekunwanduhzeen tebákonegawin , ketebákonán .
Ussheneezh squândamun , ussheneezh megissug andusink squândamun babazhek megis iá , mikundush eu otanuh bizzhisshik ozáwâ shoneá tebishko bánuk wâsáchegunâbeek azhenágwuk .
Christdush Oguisemáng enandágooze tabandunk kokkinná owegewâm ; keenowintdush Christ owegewâm ketáwemin , kishpin mushkâwandumunk buhgoosanemoyunk , bâpenanemoyunk ga áquo bemátizzeyunk .
Kesâge-ewawin , kago kuhgianizzewin guhtuh tuhgoosinōn . Sheengandun miánátuk , meenjimenun wanissheshink .

Mego e-e tebiegun áke kitche nuhningishkâ , ánintdush e-e kitche otanuh pongesin , neezhwâswa tusso metoswák aninnewug nesáwug : ánintdush sagizzewug , okitchetwâweáwândush Kitche Manitōn ween gezhigōnk ayát .
Binná 'ow wiánekashkowât kâween weenigo bazhekoose Kitche Manitodush ween bazhekgo .
Pilatedush otinnân , kánuh keguhnozhisse ; kânuh kekekanduhzeen keche suhsuhgáquoinnámbán giya ketá buggittinnin anandumán ?

Emá uhguhguhnotunk e-e mazeniegun azhebe-egâtag ; manishtânish azhe suggábeginninjin wâtuzzhe nesint ezhenágoose , manistânishans natágegetosig anosuminit bashkooshogoojin ezhenagoose , kâ pâpish ōnje báketōnanisse .
Náágutchdush , kitche ogemá onundomáwân ; Kitche Manitodush Saulun , omenán , Cis oguisun , aninne Benjamin azheweenzojig , nemetunnuh tusso kekenonowin .
Onje batienowug kagepájegágegetojig wiazhingashkidjig , mamwach uhgew gáwetázhegâzojig ;
Kokkinnádush nowogâtajig áwasseug giya buggwutch áwasseug giya babámotajig giya babámissajig benasseug kok kinná beenzowug .
Kitchetwâwizzewin gá mezheun , neengemenág ; tuh bazhekowug azhe bazhekoeyunk .
Mushkâwe meenjimenun menno ekettowinun , eu n'wândumowweyun , mushkâwandumowinink sâge-ewawinink eu Christ Jesus ōnje .
Ningōtwâswa ásineen nátobágunun , emá attawun ozhissittowâwât Jewug , ope beneittizzowât .
Kooshkoozetumōk quiuk izzhewabizzewin , kago mutcheizzhewabizzekago , ōnje , ánint kâ okekanemásewân Kitche Manitōn : keche ōnje águtcheyag o-o wanje aninnuhgook .
Kokkinná tuhbuhsanemowin , bakâdizzewin , keenwazh kuhvâtuhgitōng , uhguskittōng , uhsáságeittink ;
Ahnintdush bemájeikōg sagizzewin ōnje che sâgitche wekobinagwâ ishkotang ; uhsheengandumink kagat buhbeenzikowâgun uhgetuhgág oweyâsemá ōnje .
Kekekandámin , kokkinná iuheen mámowy uhnokemuhgut , che ōnje mennoizzhewabizzewât siágeájig Kitche Manitōn ; uhgew ōnje Kitche Manito ga meenwandunk .
Kemennoizzhewabizzewin kokkinná kekanjegâta , neenitche pâpenanim keenowâ ōnje , umbadush ōnjittá kekandumag wanissheshink kekáduhzewagdush mánátuk .

Beendik e-e mutche-egin ozâwâ shoneá weengusqusegawin , otossowin wáweendumágawin kokkinná ágwuniegâta ozâwâ shoneá ōnje , beenjeiuhedush ozâwâ shoneá akeek abit , gezhigōnk gá ōnjeeg puhquazhegun uzzhuttag , Aarondush osuhkáoon gá ōnje ságebuhguk giya otopowinun wâweendumátewin .
Ande anduhgonik muhmequâzowin ? Ahqutchink átáquiegâta ; tepákonegawin uhnokewin innuh eu ? kâween ; tepákonegawin mushkâwandumowin koshá ōnje .
Kânuh ketabwayanduhze , neen ōsemá weowwink neendiá , ōsemádush neowwink iá ? ekettowinun aeninnuhgook , kâ tebinowa neendikettose , ōsemádush neowwink ayát ween uhmoke uhnokewinun .
Kokkinnádush anishanâbag onuhmuhchetowâwân ; tabákonegajigdush obegobetowâwân okonâsinne uhnokewugdush che buhbukketaomint .
Oshke kuggequawin kemeninnim ; sâgeittig azhe sâgeinnuhgook ; me giya keenowâ ga ezhe sâgeitteyag .
Onje kekekandámin , omá ákeeng kewegewâmenán , kishpin pekooshkág , ketiámen Kitche Manito gá ozhetōt , wegewâm oninjemá gá ōnje ozhetoseeng , ga gâgegasink gezhigōnk .
Jesusdush ázhequa eketto , ween tiabwayanemit kâween neen tabwayanemigoose , biezhenázho-ōnidjin otabwayanemán .
Ananiasdush eketto , Kitche Manito kitche nebewá nenōndowâg anishenâbag tuzzhemint wuhow aninne menik gá ezhe mámutchetotowát ketuhnumeánidjin Jerusalemink .

Onje aninnewug oguh sâgetōnâwân tebinowá weowwewân , tuh suhságizzewug , tuh sōnganemowug , tuh kitchetwâwanemowug , tuh mutchegegetowug , kâ oguh tabwatowwâsewân onegeigowân , kâ megwach tuh ekettosewug , kâ tuh mennoizzhewabizzissewug .
Owushema , minowâ , kemennoweshâwandágoozemin , omisqueem ōnje , ga ōnje buhshunzhaogowizzissewung ween ōnje .
Neenkekandán Jesus Kitche Manito neengeguhgâzomik kâween kago benezik , kâween ussinōn oweuh atuh wenut enandungin kago , wenuttinne .
Kishpin totowutwâ wekânissemág che kunwandumowât ono iuheen , quiuk keguh uhnoketowâ , Christ , uhsōngitchegâzoeyun ekettowinun mushkâwandumowin , quiuk guhgequawinink eu gá kekandumun .
